original: atthaṅgamapadampi yojetabbaṃ, avijjādayo pana rūpe vuttasadisā evāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: atthaṅgama padam pi yojetabbam avijjā ādayaḥ pana rūpe vutta sadisāḥ evā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasenāti paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā udayalakkhaṇānaṃ,

original: paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā eva vayalakkhaṇānaṃ cāti samapaññāsāya
analyzed: paccayataḥ vīsati khaṇataḥ pañca ati pañcavīsatiyāḥ eva vaya lakkhaṇānam ca ati sama paññāsāya

original: udayavayalakkhaṇānaṃ vasena. Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayo lakkhīyati etehīti
analyzed: udaya vaya lakkhaṇānam vasena tattha pañcannam khandhānam udayaḥ lakkhīyati etehi iti

original: lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādisamudayoti, tathā tesaṃ anuppādanirodho lakkhīyati

original: etehīti lakkhaṇānīti vuccanti avijjādīnaṃ accantanirodho. Nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni

original: pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇamevāti. Evaṃ etāni samapaññāsalakkhaṇāni sarūpato veditabbāni.
analyzed: pana saṅkhata lakkhaṇam eva ati evam etāni sama paññāsa lakkhaṇāni sarūpataḥ veditabbāni

original: Yathānukkamena vaḍḍhiteti yathāvuttaudayabbayañāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne hutvā vahante
analyzed: yathā anukkamena vaḍḍhitā iti yathā vutta udaya bbaya ñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne hutvā vahante

original: tato paraṃ vattabbānaṃ bhaṅgañāṇādīnaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭiyā buddhippatte paramukkaṃsagate

original: tathā vimuccati, yathā sabbañeyyāvaraṇappahānaṃ hoti. Yaṃ kilesānaṃ “savāsanappahāna”nti
analyzed: tathā vimuccati yathā sabba ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānam hoti yam kilesānam sa vāsanā ppahānam ti

analyzed: kilesehi iti bhavataḥ ā bha vaggam dhammataḥ ā gotrabhum savanataḥ pavattanataḥ āsava saññitehi

analyzed: rāgaḥ diṭṭhi moho ti imehi kilesehi lakkhaṇa vacanam ca itam pāḷiyam yat idam āsavehi iti

original: tadekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehipi kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccati. Aggahetvāti
analyzed: tad ekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehi pi kilesehi sabbehi pi pāpa dhammehi cittam vimuccati aggahetvā ati

original: tesaṃ kilesānaṃ lesamattampi aggahetvā.
analyzed: tesam kilesānam lesa mattam pi aggahetvā

analyzed: magga kkhaṇe vimuccati nāma taṃ taṃ magga vajjha kilesehi phala kkhaṇe vimuttam nāma magga kkhaṇe

original: yathāsakaṃ pahātabbehi vimuccati ca. Phalakkhaṇe vimuttamevāti sabbasmimpi phalakkhaṇe

original: vimuttameva, na vimuccati nāma.
analyzed: vimuttam eva na vimuccati nāma

original: Sabbabandhanāti orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitā sabbasmāpi bhavasaññojanā, vippamutto
analyzed: sabba bandhanā ti orambhāgiya uddhambhāgiya saṅgahitā sabbasma api bhava saññojanā vippamutto

original: tesaṃ ekadesena dassanaṃ. Nippadesato dassanaṃ pana parato āgamissati, tasmā tattheva
analyzed: tesam ekadesena dassanam nippadesataḥ dassanam pana paratas āgamissati tasmā tattha eva

original: tāni vibhajissāma. Sakale ca buddhaguṇeti atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇādike sabbepi buddhaguṇe.

original: Yadā hi lokanātho aggamaggaṃ adhigacchati, tadā sabbe guṇe hatthagate karoti nāma.
analyzed: yadā hi loka nāthaḥ aggamaggam adhigacchati tadā sabbe guṇe hattha gate karoti nāma

original: Tato paraṃ “hatthagate katvā ṭhito”ti vuccati.
analyzed: tato param hattha gate katvā ṭhitaḥ iti vuccati

analyzed: paripuṇṇa saṅkappo ti vatvā paripuṇṇa saṅkappa tā paridīpanam udānam dassetum aneka jāti saṃsāra nti ādi

original: jātavedasoti jalayamānassa aggissa, anādare vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Anupubbūpasantassāti
analyzed: jātavedasaḥ iti jalayamānassa aggissa anādare vai etam sāmi vacanam anupubbūpasantassa ati

analyzed: paññāpetum natthi na upalabbhati yathā vutta jātavedaḥ viya a paññattika bhāvam eva te

original: Dutiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dutiya bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Brahmayācanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: brahma yācana kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: yat nūna iti parivitakkana atthe nipātaḥ ahan ti bhagavā attānam niddisati iti āha yadi

original: panāha”nti. “Aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi yathā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanādivasena
analyzed: pana aham ti aṭṭhame sattāhe itiādi yathā amhākam bhagavā abhisambuddhaḥ hutvā vimutti sukha paṭisaṃvedanā ādi vasena

analyzed: sattasu sattāhesu paṭipajji tato parañca dhamma gambhīra tā paccavekkhaṇa ādi vasena

analyzed: tathā iva vavatthapīyanti iti ayam sabbesam pi buddhānam dhamma tā tasmai vipassī bhagavā

analyzed: na pallaṅka sattāhassa viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa vavatthitassa labbhamāna ttā

original: Anantaroti “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo”tiādiko vitakko.
analyzed: anantaraḥ ti adhigataḥ kho myā ayam dhammo ti ādikaḥ vitakko

original: Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto,

original: yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. Dhammoti catusaccadhammo tabbinimuttassa paṭivijjhitabbadhammassa
analyzed: yathābhūtam avabuddhaḥ ti atthaḥ dhammo ti catu sacca dhammo tad vinimuttassa paṭivijjhitabba dhammassa

original: aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho. Tenāha “uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanameta”nti.

original: Alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti
analyzed: ogāhitum a sakkuṇeyya tāya sarūpataḥ visesataḥ ca passitum na sakkā ati

original: āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti. Dukkhena daṭṭhabboti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: āha gambhīra ttā ava duddasaḥ ti dukkhena daṭṭhabbo ti kicchena kenaci kadācid eva daṭṭhabbo

original: Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti
analyzed: yam pana daṭṭhum eva na sakkā tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthi iti

original: āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti. Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato.

original: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti

original: suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya vā santo. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya nibbuto.

original: Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā paṇīto. Atittikaraṭṭhena atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya.

original: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ, maggasaccaṃ santaṃ, santārammaṇañcāti
analyzed: ettha ca nirodha saccam santam ārammaṇanti santa ārammaṇam magga saccam santam santa ārammaṇam ca ati

analyzed: santa ārammaṇam kilesānam saṅkhārānam ca abhāvataḥ santaḥ nibbuta sabba pariḷāha ttā

original: nibbuto, santapaṇītabhāveneva tadatthāya asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha
analyzed: nibbutaḥ santa paṇīta bhāvena iva tad atthāya asecanakatāya atappaka tā daṭṭhabbā tena āha

original: “idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Uttamañāṇassa visayattā na takkena

original: avacaritabbo, tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya, saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca nipuṇo. Bālānaṃ

original: avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena

original: sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ālayā, taṇhāvicaritāni.
analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇāḥ ālayanti abhiramaṇa vasena sevanti iti ālayanti taṇhā vicaritāni

original: Ālayaratāti ālayaniratā. Suṭṭhu muditā ativiya muditā anukkaṇṭhanato. Ramatīti ratiṃ
analyzed: ālaya ratā ati ālaya niratā suṭṭhu muditā ativiya muditā an ukkaṇṭhanataḥ ramati iti ratim

original: vindati kīḷati laḷati. Ime sattā yathā kāmaguṇe, evaṃ rāgampi assādenti abhinandanti
analyzed: vindati kīḷati laḷati ime sattāḥ yathā kāma guṇe evam rāgam pi assādenti abhinandanti

original: yevāti vuttaṃ “duvidhampī”tiādi.
analyzed: yā iva ati vuttam duvidham pi itiādi

original: Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana “ṭhāna”nti ca paṭiccasamuppādo
analyzed: ṭhānam sandhāya ati ṭhāna saddam sandhāya atthato pana ṭhānam ti ca paṭiccasamuppādaḥ

original: Vuttanayanti ettha yaṃ avuttanayaṃ “kallacitte”tiādi, tattha kallacitteti kammaniyacitte,

original: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena

original: kammakkhamacitteti attho. Assaddhiyādayo hi yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā te vigatā,
analyzed: kamma kkhama citta iti atthaḥ assaddhi ādayaḥ hi yasmā cittassa roga bhūtā tadā te vigatā

original: tasmā arogacitteti attho. Diṭṭhimānādikilesavigamanena muducitte. Kāmacchandādivigamena

analyzed: pasanna citte yadā ca bhagavā aññāsi iti sambandhaḥ atha vā kalla cittā iti kāmacchanda vigamena

original: arogacitte. Muducitteti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akathinacitte. Vinīvaraṇacitteti
analyzed: aroga citte mudu cittā iti byāpāda vigamena mettā vasena akathina citte vinīvaraṇa cittā iti

original: uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacitte. Udaggacitteti thinamiddhavigamena
analyzed: uddhacca kukkucca vigamena vikkhepassa vigata ttā tena apihita citte udagga citte iti thinam iddha vigamena

original: sampaggahitavasena alīnacitte. Pasannacitteti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
analyzed: sampaggahita vasena alīna citte pasanna cittā iti vicikicchā vigamena sammā paṭipattiyam

original: adhimuttacitte, evampettha attho veditabbo.
analyzed: adhimutta citte evampi ittha atthaḥ veditabbo

original: “Seyyathāpī”tiādinā upamāvasena nesaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ, ariyamagguppādañca dasseti.

original: Apagatakāḷakanti vigatakāḷakaṃ. Sammadevāti suṭṭhu eva. Rajananti nīlapītādiraṅgajātaṃ.
analyzed: apagata kāḷakam ti vigata kāḷakam sammat eva ati suṭṭhu eva nīla pīta ādi raṅga jātam

original: hoti. Virajanti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena virajaṃ. Anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamanena

analyzed: cittassa maggena pariyodapananti diṭṭha dhammā ti vatvā dassanam nāma ñāṇa dassanato

original: aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca ñāṇasampattito

original: aññampi vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ “viditadhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana viditadhammatā

original: dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammā”ti

analyzed: sesam heṭṭhā vutta nayam eva

original: Sandassesīti suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ katvā dassesi. Idhalokatthanti idhalokabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhātamatthaṃ.

original: Paralokatthanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dassesīti sāmaññalakkhaṇato, salakkhaṇato ca
analyzed: para loka atthanti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ dassesi iti sāmañña lakkhaṇato sa lakkhaṇato ca

original: dassesi. Tenāha “anicca”ntiādi. Tattha hutvā abhāvato aniccanti dassesi. Udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato
analyzed: dassesi tena āha anicca ntiādi tattha hutvā abhāvataḥ aniccanti dassesi udaya bbaya paṭipīḍanato

original: dukkhanti dassesi. Avasavattanato anattāti dassesi. Ime ruppanādilakkhaṇā pañcakkhandhāti
analyzed: dukkhanti dassesi avasavattanato anattā ati dassesi ime ruppana ādi lakkhaṇā pañca kkhandhā ti

analyzed: dassesi imāni dvāra ārammaṇa bhūtāni dvādasa āyatanāni iti dassesi

original: Ime avijjādayo jarāmaraṇapariyosānā dvādasa paccayadhammā paṭiccasamuppādoti dassesi.

original: Rūpakkhandhassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena paccayato cattāri, khaṇato ekanti imāni pañca
analyzed: rūpa khandhassa heṭṭhā vutta nayena paccayato cattāri khaṇataḥ ekanti imāni pañca

original: nānāvidhaṃ petasattalokaṃ. Asurakāyanti kālakañcikāsuranikāyaṃ. Evaṃ tāva duggatibhūtaṃ

analyzed: para loka attham vatvā idāni sugati bhūtam vattum tiṇṇam kusalānam vipāka ntiādi vuttaṃ

analyzed: gaṇhāpesi iti te dhamme samādinne kārāpesi

original: vatthehi chādāpetvā, tassa heṭṭhā suvaṇṇa…pe… vitānaṃ kārāpetvā. Mālāvacchaketi pupphamālāhi

original: Kāmañcāyaṃ rājā buddhapitā, tathāpi buddhā nāma lokagaruno, na te kenaci vase vattetabbā, atha kho te eva pare attano vase vattenti, tasmā rājā “nāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ demī”ti āha.

original: Dānamukhanti dānakaraṇūpāyaṃ, dānavattanti attho. Na dāni me anuññātāti idāni me dānaṃ na anuññātā, no na anujānantīti attho.

original: Paritassanajīvitanti dukkhajīvikā dāliddiyanti attho.

analyzed: vā saddaḥ aniyama atthaḥ tena vassa sahassa dvaya ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Viññāṇamevāti niyamavacanaṃ, ito bāhirakappitassa attano, issarādīnañca paṭikkhepapadaṃ,
analyzed: viññāṇam eva ati niyama vacanam itas bāhira kappitassa attanaḥ issara ādīnam ca paṭikkhepa padam

original: na avijjādiphassādipaṭikkhepapadaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanapadattā avadhāraṇassa. Tenāha
analyzed: na avijjā ādi phassa ādi paṭikkhepa padam paṭiyogī nivattana pada tā avadhāraṇassa tena āha

original: “eseva hetū”tiādi. Ayañca nayo heṭṭhāpi sabbapadesu yathārahaṃ vattabbo. Idāni viññāṇameva
analyzed: esa iva hetu utiādi ayam ca nayaḥ heṭṭhā api sabba padesu yathāraham vattabbaḥ idāni viññāṇam eva

original: nāmarūpassa padhānakāraṇanti imamatthaṃ opammavasena vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nāma rūpassa padhāna kāraṇanti imam attham opamma vasena vibhāvetum yathā hi itiādi vuttam

original: Paccekaṃ viya samuditassāpi nāmarūpassa viññāṇena vinā attakiccāsamatthataṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: paccekam viya samuditassa api nāma rūpassa viññāṇena vinā atta kicca asamattha tam dassetum

original: “tvaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmā”ti ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Purecāriketi pubbaṅgameva. Viññāṇañhi sahajātadhammānaṃ
analyzed: tvam nāma rūpam nāma ati ekajjham gahaṇam purecārikā iti pubbaṅgam eva viññāṇam hi sahajāta dhammānam

original: pubbaṅgamaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti. bahudhāti anekappakārena paccayo hoti.
analyzed: pubbaṅgamam tena āha bhagavā manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ati bahudhā ati aneka ppakārena paccayaḥ hoti

original: Kathaṃ? Vipākanāmassa hi paṭisandhiyaṃ aññaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhāraindriyasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
analyzed: katham vipāka nāmassa hi paṭisandhiyam aññam vā viññāṇam sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka āhāra aindriya sampayutta atthi avigata paccayehi

original: navadhā paccayo hoti. Vatthurūpassa paṭisandhiyaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhāraindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
analyzed: navadhā paccayaḥ hoti vatthu rūpassa paṭisandhiyam sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka āhāra aindriya vippayutta atthi avigata paccayehi

original: navadhā paccayo hoti. Ṭhapetvā pana vatthurūpaṃ sesarūpassa imesu navasu aññamaññapaccayaṃ
analyzed: navadhā paccayaḥ hoti ṭhapetvā pana vatthu rūpam sesa rūpassa imesu navasu aññamañña paccayam

original: apanetvā sesehi aṭṭhahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pana asaññasattarūpassa,
analyzed: apanetvā sesehi aṭṭhahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇam pana asañña satta rūpassa

original: pañcavokāre vā kammajassa suttantikapariyāyato upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo
analyzed: pañcavokāre vā kamma jassa suttantika pariyāyato upanissaya vasena ekadhā va paccayo

original: hoti. Avasesañhi paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti sabbampi viññāṇaṃ tassa nāmarūpassa yathārahaṃ
analyzed: hoti avasesam hi paṭhama bhavaṅgataḥ pabhuti sabbam pi viññāṇam tassa nāma rūpassa yathāraham

original: paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana paccayanaye dassiyamāne
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti veditabbam ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthārataḥ pana paccaya naye dassiyamāne

original: sabbāpi mahāpakaraṇakathā ānetabbā hotīti na vitthāritā. Kathaṃ panetaṃ paccetabbaṃ
analyzed: sabbā api mahā pakaraṇa kathā ānetabbā hoti iti na vitthāritā katham pana etat paccetabbam

original: “paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ viññāṇapaccayā hotī”ti? Suttato, yuttito ca. Pāḷiyañhi “cittānuparivattino
analyzed: paṭisandhi nāma rūpam viññāṇa paccayā hoti iti suttataḥ yuttitaḥ ca pāḷiyam hi citta anuparivattino

original: dhammā”tiādinā nayena bahudhā vedanādīnaṃ viññāṇapaccayatā āgatā. Yuttito pana idha
analyzed: dhamma ati ādinā nayena bahudhā vedanā ādīnam viññāṇa paccaya tā āgatā yuttitaḥ pana idha

original: cittajena rūpena diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassāpi rūpassa viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotīti viññāyati.
analyzed: citta jena rūpena diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa api rūpassa viññāṇam paccayaḥ hoti iti viññāyati

original: Cittehi pasanne, appasanne vā tadanurūpāni rūpāni uppajjamānāni diṭṭhāni, diṭṭhena
analyzed: cittehi pasanne appasanne vā tad anurūpāni rūpāni uppajjamānāni diṭṭhāni diṭṭhena

original: ca adiṭṭhassa anumānaṃ hotīti. Iminā idha “diṭṭhena cittajarūpena adiṭṭhassāpi paṭisandhirūpassa
analyzed: ca adiṭṭhassa anumānam hoti iti iminā idha diṭṭhena citta ja rūpena adiṭṭhassa api paṭisandhi rūpassa

original: viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotī”ti paccetabbametaṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hi rūpassa cittasamuṭṭhānassa
analyzed: viññāṇam paccayaḥ hoti iti paccetabbam etam kamma samuṭṭhānassa api hi rūpassa citta samuṭṭhānassa

original: viya viññāṇapaccayatā paṭṭhāne āgatāti.
analyzed: viya viññāṇa paccaya tā paṭṭhāne āgatā ti

original: 116. Idha samudaya-saddo samudāya-saddo viya samūhapariyāyoti āha “dukkharāsisambhavo”ti.
analyzed: idha samudaya saddo samudāya saddaḥ viya samūha pariyāyo ti āha dukkha rāsi sambhavo ti

original: Ekakoti asahāyo rājaparisārahito. Passeyyāma te rājabhāvaṃ amhehi vināti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ekakaḥ iti asahāyaḥ rāja parisā rahitaḥ passeyyāma te rāja bhāvam amhehi vinā iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Yathārahaṃ parisaṃ rañjetīti hi rājā. Atthatoti atthasiddhito avadantampi vadati
analyzed: yathāraham parisam rañjeti iti hi rājā atthato ti attha siddhitaḥ a vadantam pi vadati

original: viya. “Hadayavatthu”nti imināva tannissayopi gahito vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ānantariyabhāvato
analyzed: viya hadaya vatthun ti iminā ava tad nissayaḥ api gahitaḥ vā ti daṭṭhabbam ānantariya bhāvato

original: nissayanissayopi “nissayo” tveva vuccatīti. Paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ nāma bhaveyyāsi, netaṃ
analyzed: nissaya nissayaḥ api nissayo tu eva vuccati iti paṭisandhi viññāṇam nāma bhaveyyāsi na itaṃ

original: ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho. Tenāha “passeyyāmā”tiādi. Bahudhāti anekadhā paccayo hoti.
analyzed: ṭhānam vijjati iti attho tena āha passeyyāma itiādi bahudhā ati anekadhā paccayaḥ hoti

original: Kathaṃ? Nāmaṃ tāva paṭisandhiyaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
analyzed: katham nāmam tāva paṭisandhiyam sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka sampayutta atthi avigata paccayehi

original: sattadhā viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena, kiñci āhārapaccayenāti
analyzed: sattadhā viññāṇassa paccayaḥ hoti iti kiñci pana ittha hetu paccayena kiñci āhāra paccayena ati

original: evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti. Avipākaṃ pana nāmaṃ yathāvuttesu paccayesu ṭhapetvā
analyzed: evam aññathā api paccayaḥ hoti avipākam pana nāmam yathā vuttesu paccayesu ṭhapetvā

original: vipākapaccayaṃ itarehi chahi paccayehi paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena,
analyzed: vipāka paccayam itarehi chahi paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti kiñci pana ittha hetu paccayena

original: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti aññathāpi paccayo hoti, tañca kho pavattiyaṃyeva, na paṭisandhiyaṃ.
analyzed: kiñci āhāra paccayena ati aññathā api paccayaḥ hoti tat ca kho pavattiyam yeva na paṭisandhiyam

original: Rūpato pana hadayavatthu paṭisandhiyaṃ viññāṇassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavippayuttaatthi
analyzed: rūpato pana hadaya vatthu paṭisandhiyam viññāṇassa sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vippayutta atthi

original: avigatapaccayehi chadhāva paccayo hoti. Pavattiyaṃ pana sahajātaaññamaññapaccayavajjitehi
analyzed: avigata paccayehi cha dhāva paccayaḥ hoti pavattiyam pana sahajāta aññamañña paccaya vajjitehi

original: pañcahi purejātapaccayena saha teheva paccayehi paccayo hoti. Cakkhāyatanādibhedaṃ
analyzed: pañcahi purejāta paccayena saha tehi iva paccayehi paccayaḥ hoti cakkha āyatana ādi bhedam

original: pana pañcavidhampi rūpaṃ yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādibhedassa viññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
analyzed: pana pañcavidham pi rūpam yathākkamam cakkhu viññāṇa ādi bhedassa viññāṇassa nissaya purejāta aindriya vippayutta atthi avigata paccayehi

original: paccayo hotīti evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa bahudhā paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti evam nāma rūpam viññāṇassa bahudhā paccayaḥ hoti iti veditabbam

original: Yvāyamanukkamena viññāṇassa nāmarūpaṃ, paṭisandhināmarūpassa, ca viññāṇaṃ pati paccayabhāvo,
analyzed: yvā ayam anukkamena viññāṇassa nāma rūpam paṭisandhi nāma rūpassa ca viññāṇam pati paccaya bhāvo

original: so kadāci viññāṇassa sātisayo, kadāci nāmarūpassa, kadāci ubhinnaṃ sadisoti tividhopi
analyzed: so kadāci viññāṇassa sa atisayaḥ kadāci nāma rūpassa kadāci ubhinnam sadisaḥ ti tividhaḥ api

original: so “ettāvatā”ti padena ekajjhaṃ gahitoti dassento “viññāṇe…pe… pavattesū”ti vatvā
analyzed: so ettāvatā iti padena ekajjham gahito ti dassento viññāṇa īpe pavattesu iti vatvā

original: puna yamidampi viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpasaññitānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ aññamaññanissayena
analyzed: puna yam idam pi viññāṇam nāma rūpa saññitānam pañcannam khandhānam aññamañña nissayena

original: pavattānaṃ ettakena sabbā saṃsāravaṭṭappavattīti imamatthaṃ dassento “ettakena…pe…
analyzed: pavattānam ettakena sabbā saṃsāra vaṭṭa ppavattī iti imam attham dassento ettakena pe

original: paṭisandhiyo”ti āha. Tattha ettakenāti ettakeneva, na ito aññena kenaci kārakavedakasabhāvena
analyzed: paṭisandhiyā ti āha tattha ettakena ati ettakena iva na itas aññena kenaci kāraka vedaka sabhāvena

original: attanā, issarādinā vāti attho. Antogadhāvadhāraṇañhetaṃ padaṃ.
analyzed: attanā issara ādinā vāti atthaḥ padam

original: Vacanamattameva adhikiccāti dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādi-saddā viya atathattā vacanamattameva
analyzed: vacana mattam eva adhikicca ati dāsa ādīsu sirivaḍḍhaka ādi saddāḥ viya atathattā vacana mattam eva

original: adhikāraṃ katvā pavattassa. Tenāha “atthaṃ adisvā”ti. Vohārassāti voharaṇamattassa.
analyzed: adhikāram katvā pavattassa tena āha attham a disvā iti vohārassa ati voharaṇa mattassa

original: Pathoti pavattimaggo pavattiyā visayo. Yasmā saraṇakiriyāvasena puggalo “sato”ti
analyzed: pathaḥ ti pavatti maggaḥ pavattiyāḥ visayaḥ yasmā saraṇa kiriyā vasena puggalo

original: vuccati, sampajānanakiriyāvasena “sampajāno”ti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāraṇāpadesavasenā”ti.
analyzed: vuccati sampajānana kiriyā vasena sampajānoti tasmā vuttam kāraṇa apadesa vasena ati

original: Kāraṇaṃ niddhāretvā utti niruttīti. Ekameva atthaṃ “paṇḍito”tiādinā pakārato ñāpanato
analyzed: kāraṇam niddhāretvā utti nirutti iti ekam eva attham paṇḍita uti ādinā pakārataḥ ñāpanato

original: “paññattī”ti vadanti. So eva hi “paṇḍito”ti ca “byatto”ti ca “medhāvī”ti ca paññāpīyatīti.
analyzed: paññattī iti vadanti saḥ eva hi paṇḍito iti ca byatto iti ca medhāvī iti ca paññāpīyati iti

original: Paṇḍiccappakārato pana paṇḍito, veyyattiyappakārato byattoti paññāpīyatīti evaṃ pakārato
analyzed: paṇḍicca ppakārato pana paṇḍitaḥ veyyattiya ppakārataḥ byattaḥ ti paññāpīyati iti evam pakārato

original: paññāpanato paññatti. Yasmā idha adhivacananiruttipaññattipadāni samānatthāni. Sabbañca
analyzed: paññāpanataḥ yasmai idha adhivacana nirutti paññatti padāni samāna atthāni sabbañca

original: vacanaṃ adhivacanādibhāvaṃ bhajati, tasmā kesuci vacanavisesesu visesena pavattehi
analyzed: vacanam adhivacana ādi bhāvam bhajati kesuci vacana visesesu visesena pavattehi

original: adhivacanādisaddehi sabbāni vacanāni paññattiatthappakāsanasāmaññena vuttānīti iminā
analyzed: adhivacana ādi saddehi sabbāni vacanāni paññatti attha ppakāsana sāmaññena vuttāni iti iminā

original: adhippāyena ayamatthayojanā katāti veditabbā.
analyzed: adhippāyena ayam attha yojanā katā iti veditabbā

original: Atha vā adhi-saddo uparibhāve, upari vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kassa upari? Pakāsetabbassa
analyzed: atha vā adhi saddaḥ upari bhāve upari vacanam adhivacanam kassa upari pakāsetabbassa

original: atthassāti pākaṭo yamattho. Adhīnaṃ vā vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kena adhīnaṃ? Atthena.
analyzed: atthassa ati pākaṭaḥ yamatthaḥ adhīnam vā vacanam adhivacanam kena adhīnam atthena

original: Tathā taṃtaṃatthappakāsena nicchitaṃ, niyataṃ vā vacanaṃ nirutti. Pathavīdhātupurisāditaṃtaṃpakārena
analyzed: tathā taṃ taṃ attha ppakāsena nicchitam niyatam vā vacanam pathavī dhātu purisa ādi taṃ taṃ pakārena

original: ñāpanato paññattīti evaṃ adhivacanādipadānaṃ sabbavacanesu pavatti veditabbā, aññathā
analyzed: ñāpanato paññatti iti evam adhivacana ādi padānam sabba vacanesu pavatti veditabbā aññathā

original: sirivaḍḍhakadhanavaḍḍhakappakārānameva niruttitā, “paṇḍito viyatto”ti evaṃ pakārānameva
analyzed: siri vaḍḍhaka dhanavaḍḍhaka ppakārānam eva paṇḍitaḥ evam

original: ekameva atthaṃ tena tena pakārena ñāpentānaṃ paññattitā ca āpajjeyyāti. Evaṃ tīhipi
analyzed: ekam eva attham tena tena pakārena ñāpentānam paññatti tā ca āpajjeyya ati evam tīhi pi

original: nāmehi vuttassa vohārassa pavattimaggopi saha viññāṇena nāmarūpanti ettāvatāva icchitabbo.
analyzed: nāmehi vuttassa vohārassa pavatti maggaḥ api saha viññāṇena nāma rūpanti ettāvatā āva icchitabbo

original: Tenāha “itī”tiādi. Paññāya avacaritabbanti paññāya pavattitabbaṃ, ñeyyanti attho.
analyzed: tena āha iti itiādi paññāya avacaritabbanti paññāya pavattitabbam ñeyyanti atthaḥ

original: Tenāha “jānitabba”nti. Vaṭṭanti kilesavaṭṭaṃ, kammavaṭṭaṃ, vipākavaṭṭanti tividhampi
analyzed: tena āha jānitabbanti vaṭṭanti kilesa vaṭṭam kamma vaṭṭam vipāka vaṭṭanti tividham pi

original: vaṭṭaṃ. Vattatīti pavattati. Tayidaṃ “jāyethā”tiādinā pañcahi padehi vuttassa atthassa
analyzed: vaṭṭam vattati iti pavattati tayidam jāyetha atiādinā pañcahi padehi vuttassa atthassa

original: nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena itthītipurisātiādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nāmapaññattatthāyāti
analyzed: nigamana vasena vuttam ādi saddena itthī iti purisa ati ādīnam pi saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo nāma paññatta tthāya ati

original: khandhādiphassādisattādiitthādināmassa paññāpanatthāya. Vatthupi ettāvatāva. Tenāha
analyzed: khandha ādi phassa ādi satta ādi itthā ādi nāmassa paññāpana tthāya tena āha

original: “khandhapañcakampi ettāvatāva paññāyatī”ti. Ettāvatā ettakena, saha viññāṇena nāmarūpappavattiyāti attho.
analyzed: khandha pañcakam pi ettāvatā ava paññāyati iti ettāvatā ettakena saha viññāṇena nāma rūpa ppavattiyā ati attho

original: Attapaññattivaṇṇanā
analyzed: atta paññatti vaṇṇanā

original: 117. Anusandhiyati etenāti anusandhi, heṭṭhā āgatadesanāya anusandhānavasena pavattā
analyzed: etena ati anusandhi heṭṭhā āgata desanāya anusandhāna vasena pavattā

original: uparidesanā, sā paṭhamapadassa dassitā, idāni dutiyapadassa dassetabbāti tamatthaṃ
analyzed: upari desanā sā paṭhama padassa dassitā idāni dutiya padassa dassetabbā ti tam attham

original: dassento “iti bhagavā”tiādimāha. Rūpinti rūpavantaṃ. Parittanti na vipulaṃ, appakanti
analyzed: iti bhagavā ati ādim āha rūpinti rūpavantam parittam ati na vipulam appakam ti

original: attho. Yasmā attā nāma koci paramatthato natthi. Kevalaṃ pana diṭṭhigatikānaṃ parikappitamattaṃ,
analyzed: atthaḥ yasmai attā nāma koci paramatthataḥ natthi kevalam pana diṭṭhi gatikānam parikappita mattam

original: tasmā yattha nesaṃ attasaññā, yathā cassa rūpibhāvādiparikappanā hoti, taṃ dassento
analyzed: tasmā yattha nesam atta saññā yathā ca ssa rūpi bhāva ādi parikappanā hoti tam dassento

original: “yo”tiādimāha. Rūpiṃ parittanti attano upaṭṭhitakasiṇarūpavasena rūpiṃ, tassa avaḍḍhitabhāvena
analyzed: yaḥ ti ādim āha rūpim parittam ti attanaḥ upaṭṭhita kasiṇa rūpa vasena rūpim tassa avaḍḍhita bhāvena

original: parittaṃ. Paññapeti nīlakasiṇādivasena nānākasiṇalābhī. Tanti attānaṃ. Anantanti
analyzed: parittam paññapeti nīla kasiṇa ādi vasena nānā kasiṇa lābhī attānam

original: kasiṇanimittassa appamāṇatāya paricchedassa anupaṭṭhānato antarahitaṃ. Ugghāṭetvāti
analyzed: kasiṇa nimittassa appamāṇa tāya paricchedassa an upaṭṭhānataḥ antarahitam ugghāṭetvā ati

original: bhāvanāya apanetvā. Nimittaphuṭṭhokāsanti tena kasiṇanimittena phuṭṭhappadesaṃ. Tesūti
analyzed: bhāvanāya apanetvā tena kasiṇa nimittena phuṭṭha ppadesam tesu iti

original: catūsu arūpakkhandhesu. Viññāṇamattamevāti “viññāṇamayo attā”ti evaṃvādī.
analyzed: catūsu arūpa kkhandhesu viññāṇam attam eva ati viññāṇa mayaḥ attā ati evaṃvādī

original: padhānabhāvaṃ nītanti katvā, idhāpi kappo asaṅkhyeyyakappavaseneva veditabbo paripuṇṇassa
analyzed: padhāna bhāvam nītanti katvā idha api kappaḥ asaṅkhyeyya kappa vasena iva veditabbaḥ paripuṇṇassa

original: mahākappassa asambhavato. Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārena. Teti “brahmakāyikā”ti vuttā
analyzed: mahākappassa asambhavataḥ iti iti evam vutta ppakārena tā iti brahmakāyikā ati vuttā

original: tividhāpi brahmāno. Saññāya ekattāti tihetukabhāvena saññāya ekattasabhāvattā. Na
analyzed: tividhā api brahmāno saññāyaḥ ekattā ati ti hetuka bhāvena saññāyaḥ ekatta sabhāva ttā na

original: hi tassā sampayuttadhammavasena aññopi koci bhedo atthi.
analyzed: hi tassā sampayutta dhamma vasena aññaḥ pi koci bhedaḥ atthi

original: Evanti iminā nānattakāyaekattasaññinoti dasseti.
analyzed: evam ti iminā nānatta kāya ekatta saññino ti dasseti

original: Daṇḍaukkāyāti daṇḍadīpikāya. Saratīti dhāvati viya. Vissaratīti vippakiṇṇā viya dhāvati.
analyzed: daṇḍaukkāya ati daṇḍadīpikāya sarati iti dhāvati viya vissarati iti vippakiṇṇā viya dhāvati

original: Dve kappāti dve mahākappā. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
analyzed: dve kappā ti dve mahākappā itas paresu pi esā iva nayaḥ idha āti imasmin sutte ukkaṭṭha pariccheda vasena

original: ābhassaraggahaṇeneva sabbepi te parittābhā, appamāṇābhāpi gahitā.
analyzed: ābha ssara ggahaṇena iva sabbe pi te paritta ābhā appamāṇa ābhā api gahitā

original: Sobhanā pabhā subhā, subhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe ā-kārassa rassattaṃ, antima-ṇa-kārassa
analyzed: sobhanā pabhā subhā subhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇā iti vattabbe ākārassa rassa ttam antima ṇakārassa

original: ha-kārañca katvā “subhakiṇhā”ti vuttā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃpana niccalāya ekagghanāya pabhāya
analyzed: hakāram ca katvā subhakiṇhā ti vuttā aṭṭhakathāyam pana niccalāya ekagghanāya pabhāya

original: subhoti pariyāyavacananti “subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā”ti attho vutto, etthāpi antima-ṇa-kārassa
analyzed: subhaḥ ti pariyāya vacanam ti subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā ti atthaḥ vuttaḥ ettha api antima ṇakārassa

original: ha-kārakaraṇaṃ icchitabbameva. Na chijjitvā chijjitvā pabhā gacchati ekagghanattā.
analyzed: hakāra karaṇam icchitabbam eva na chijjitvā chijjitvā pabhā gacchati ekaggha nattā

original: Catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti kāyassa, saññāya ca ekarūpattā. Vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalattā
analyzed: catuttha viññāṇa ṭṭhitim eva bhajanti kāyassa saññāya ca eka rūpa ttā vipula santa sukha āyu vaṇṇa ādi phala ttā

original: vehapphalā. Etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ.
analyzed: vehapphalāḥ ettha āti viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyam

original: Vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhitā napunarāvattanato. “Na sabbakālikā”ti vatvā tameva asabbakālikattaṃ
analyzed: vivaṭṭa pakkhe ṭhitā na punarāvattanataḥ na sabbakālikā iti vatvā tam eva a sabbakālika ttam

original: vibhāvetuṃ “kappasatasahassampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Soḷasakappasahassaccayena uppannānaṃ
analyzed: vibhāvetum kappa sata sahassam pi itiādi vuttam soḷasa kappa sahassa ccayena uppannānam

original: suddhāvāsabrahmānaṃ parinibbāyanato, aññesañca tattha anuppajjanato buddhasuññe loke
analyzed: suddhāvāsa brahmānam parinibbāyanataḥ aññesañca tattha anuppajjanataḥ buddha suññe loke

original: suññaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā suddhāvāsā na sabbakālikā, khandhāvāraṭṭhānasadisā
analyzed: suññam tam ṭhānam hoti tasmā suddhāvāsā na sabba kālikā khandhāvāra ṭṭhāna sadisā

original: honti suddhāvāsabhūmiyo. Iminā suttena suddhāvāsānaṃ sattāvāsabhāvadīpaneneva viññāṇaṭṭhitibhāvo
analyzed: honti suddhāvāsa bhūmiyaḥ iminā suttena suddhāvāsānam sattā vāsa bhāva dīpanena iva viññāṇa ṭṭhiti bhāvaḥ

original: dīpito, tasmā suddhāvāsāpi sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ navasu
analyzed: tasmā suddhāvāsā api sattasu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu catuttha viññāṇa ṭṭhitim navasu

original: sattāvāsesu catutthasattāvāsaṃyeva bhajanti.
analyzed: sattāvāsesu catuttha sattāvāsaṃya iva bhajanti

original: Sukhumattāti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattattā. Paribyattaviññāṇakiccābhāvato neva
analyzed: sukhuma ttā ati saṅkhāra avasesa sukhuma bhāva ppatta ttā paribyatta viññāṇa kicca abhāvataḥ na iva

original: viññāṇaṃ, sabbaso aviññāṇaṃ na hotīti nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā paripphuṭaviññāṇakiccavantīsu
analyzed: viññāṇam sabbasas aviññāṇam na hoti iti na aviññāṇam tasmā paripphuṭa viññāṇa kiccavantīsu

original: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu avatvā.
analyzed: viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu a vatvā

original: 128. Tañca viññāṇaṭṭhitinti paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sarūpato,
analyzed: tat ca viññāṇa ṭhitim ti paṭhamam viññāṇa ṭṭhitim heṭṭhā vutta nayena sarūpataḥ

original: manussādivibhāgato, saṅkhepato, “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti bhedato ca pajānāti. Tassā samudayañcāti
analyzed: manussa ādi vibhāgato saṅkhepataḥ nāmañca rūpañca ati bhedato ca pajānāti tassā samudayañca ati

original: tassā paṭhamāya viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā pañcavīsatividhaṃ samudayañca pajānāti. Atthaṅgamepi
analyzed: tassā paṭhamāya viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyā pañcavīsatividham samudayam ca pajānāti atthaṅgame pi

original: eseva nayo. Assādetabbato, assādato ca assādaṃ. Ayaṃ aniccādibhāvo ādīnavo. Chandarāgo
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ assādetabbataḥ assādataḥ ca assādam ayam anicca ādi bhāvaḥ ādīnavaḥ chanda rāgaḥ

original: vinīyati etena, ettha vāti chandarāgavinayo, saha maggena nibbānaṃ. Chandarāgappahānanti
analyzed: vinīyati etena ettha vāti chanda rāga vinayaḥ saha maggena nibbānam chanda rāga ppahānan ti

original: etthāpi eseva nayo. Mānadiṭṭhīnaṃ vasenāhanti vā, taṇhāvasena mamanti vā abhinandanāpi
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayaḥ māna diṭṭhīnam vasena ahanti vā taṇhā vasena vā

original: mānassa paritassanā viya daṭṭhabbā. Sabbatthāti sabbesu sesesu aṭṭhasupi vāresu.
analyzed: mānassa paritassanā viya daṭṭhabbā sabbattha ati sabbesu sesesu aṭṭhasu pi vāresu

original: Tatthāti upari tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu dutiyāyatanesu. Tattha hi rūpaṃ natthi. Puna
analyzed: tattha ati upari tīsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu dutiya āyatanesu tattha hi rūpam natthi puna

original: tatthāti paṭhamāyatane. Tattha hi eko rūpakkhandhova. Etthāti ca tameva sandhāya
analyzed: tattha ati paṭhama āyatane tattha hi ekaḥ rūpa kkhandhaḥ uva ettha ati ca tam eva sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha hi rūpassa kammasamuṭṭhānattā āhāravasena yojanā na sambhavati.
analyzed: vuttam tattha hi rūpassa kamma samuṭṭhāna ttā āhāra vasena yojanā na sambhavati

original: Yato khoti ettha to-saddo dā-saddo viya kālavacano “yato kho, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu
analyzed: yatas kho ti ettha to saddaḥ dā saddaḥ viya kāla vacanaḥ yatas kho sāriputta bhikkhu saṅghaḥ ti ādīsu

original: viyāti vuttaṃ “yadā kho”ti. Aggahetvāti kañcipi saṅkhāraṃ “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā aggahetvā.
analyzed: viya iti vuttam yadā kho ti aggahetvā ti kañcipi saṅkhāram etam mama ati ādinā aggahetvā

original: Paññāvimuttoti aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ anadhigatattā sātisayassa samādhibalassa abhāvato
analyzed: paññā vimutto ti aṭṭhannam vimokkhānam anadhigata ttā sa atisayassa samādhi balassa abhāvato

original: paññābaleneva vimutto. Tenāha “aṭṭha vimokkhe asacchikatvā paññābalenevā”tiādi. Appavattinti
analyzed: paññā balena iva vimuttaḥ tena āha aṭṭha vimokkhe a sacchikatvā paññā balena iva ātiādi appavattin ti

original: āyatiṃ appavattiṃ katvā. Pajānanto vimuttoti vā paññāvimutto, paṭhamajjhānaphassena
analyzed: āyatim appavattim katvā pajānantaḥ vimutto ti vā paññā vimutto paṭhamajjhāna phassena

original: vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri saccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā
analyzed: vinā parijānana ādi ppakārehi cattāri saccāni jānantaḥ paṭivijjhantaḥ tesam kiccānam matthaka ppattiyā

original: niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto. So paññāvimutto. Sukkhavipassakoti samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena
analyzed: niṭṭhita kicca tāya visesena mutto ti vimuttaḥ so paññā vimutto sukkha vipassako ti samatha bhāvanā sineha abhāvena

original: sukkhā lūkhā, asiniddhā vā vipassanā etassāti sukkhavipassako. Ṭhatvāti pādakakaraṇavasena
analyzed: sukkhā lūkhā asi niddhā vā vipassanā etassa ati sukkha vipassakaḥ ṭhatvā ati pādaka karaṇa vasena

original: ṭhatvā. Aññatarasminti ca aññataraaññatarasmiṃ, ekekasminti attho. Evañhissa pañcavidhatā
analyzed: aññatarasmin ti ca aññatara aññatarasmin eka ekasmin ti attho evam hi sa pañcavidha tā

original: siyā. “Na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatī”ti iminā sātisayassa samādhibalassa
analyzed: siyā na ha iva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati iti iminā sa atisayassa samādhi balassa

original: abhāvo dīpito. “Paññāya cassa disvā”tiādinā sātisayassa paññābalassa bhāvo. Paññāya
analyzed: abhāvaḥ dīpito paññāya cassa disvā ati ādinā sa atisayassa paññā balassa bhāvo paññāya

original: cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti na āsavā paññāya passanti, dassanakāraṇā pana
analyzed: cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti iti na āsavā paññāya passanti dassana kāraṇā pana

original: parikkhīṇā “disvā parikkhīṇā”ti vuttā. Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ
analyzed: parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇā ati vuttā dassana āyatta parikkhaya ttā eva hi dassanam

original: āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyā hoti.
analyzed: āsavānam khayassa purima kiriyā hoti

original: Aṭṭhavimokkhavaṇṇanā
analyzed: aṭṭha vimokkha vaṇṇanā

original: 129. Ekassa bhikkhunoti sattasu ariyapuggalesu ekassa bhikkhuno. Viññāṇaṭṭhitiādinā
analyzed: ekassa bhikkhuno ti sattasu ariya puggalesu ekassa bhikkhuno viññāṇa ṭṭhiti ādinā

original: parijānanādivasappa vattaniggamanañca paññāvimuttanāmañca. Itarassāti ubhatobhāgavimuttassa.
analyzed: parijānanā divasa ppa vatta niggamanañca paññā vimutta nāmañca itarassa ati ubhatobhāga vimuttassa

original: Ime sandhāya hi pubbe “dvinnaṃ bhikkhūna”nti vuttaṃ. Kenaṭṭhenāti kena sabhāvena.
analyzed: ime sandhāya hi pubbe dvinnam bhikkhūnam ti vuttam kenaṭṭhena ati kena sabhāvena

original: Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato “attho”ti vuccati, so eva ttha-kārassa
analyzed: sabhāvaḥ hi ñāṇena yāthāvataḥ araṇīyataḥ ñātabbataḥ atthaḥ ti vuccati saḥ eva tthakārassa

original: ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā “aṭṭho”ti vutto. Adhimuccanaṭṭhenāti adhikaṃ savisesaṃ muccanaṭṭhena,
analyzed: ṭṭhakāram katvā aṭṭhaḥ ti vuttaḥ adhimuccana ṭhena ati adhikam sa visesam muccana ṭṭhena

original: etena satipi sabbassāpi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve
analyzed: etena sati api sabbassa api rūpāvacara jhānassa vikkhambhana vasena paṭipakkhataḥ vimutta bhāve

original: yena bhāvanāvisesena taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati, so bhāvanāviseso
analyzed: yena bhāvanā visesena tam jhānam sa atisayam paṭipakkhataḥ vimuccitvā pavattati saḥ bhāvanā visesaḥ

original: dīpito. Bhavati hi samānajātiyuttopi bhāvanāvisesena pavattiākāraviseso, yathā taṃ
analyzed: dīpitaḥ bhavati hi samāna jāti yuttaḥ api bhāvanā visesena pavatti ākāra visesaḥ yathā tam

original: saddhāvimuttatā diṭṭhippattassa. Tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya, evaṃ
analyzed: saddhā vimutta tā diṭṭhi ppattassa tathā paccanīka dhammehi suṭṭhu vimutta tāya evam

original: aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho.
analyzed: a niggahita bhāvena nirāsaṅka tāya abhirati vasena suṭṭhu adhimuccana ṭṭhena api vimokkhaḥ

original: Tenāha “ārammaṇe cā”tiādi. Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho pacchime vimokkhe
analyzed: tena āha ārammaṇe ca atiādi ayam pana atthaḥ ti ayam adhimuccana ṭṭho pacchime vimokkhe

original: nirodhe natthi, kevalo vimuttaṭṭho eva tattha labbhati, taṃ sayameva parato vakkhati.
analyzed: nirodhe na atthi kevalaḥ vimutta ṭṭhaḥ eva tattha labbhati tam sayam eva paratas vakkhati

original: Rūpīti yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena
analyzed: rūpī iti yena ayam sa santati pariyāpannena rūpena samannāgataḥ tam yassa jhānassa hetu bhāvena

original: visiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti, yena visiṭṭhena rūpena “rūpī”ti vucceyya rūpī-saddassa atisayatthadīpanato,
analyzed: visiṭṭham rūpam hoti yena visiṭṭhena rūpena rūpī iti vucceyya rūpī saddassa atisaya ttha dīpanato

original: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpavasena paṭiladdhaṃ jhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpībhāvasādhakanti
analyzed: tat eva sa santati pariyāpanna rūpa vasena paṭiladdham jhānam idha paramatthataḥ rūpībhāva sādhakanti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “ajjhatta”ntiādi. Rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ uttarapadalopena. Rūpānīti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam tena āha ajjhatta ntiādi rūpa jjhānam rūpam uttara pada lopena rūpāni iti

original: panettha purimapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “nīlakasiṇādirūpānī”ti. Rūpe kasiṇarūpe
analyzed: pana ittha purima pada lopo daṭṭhabbo tena vuttam nīla kasiṇa ādi rūpāni iti rūpe kasiṇa rūpe

original: saññā rūpasaññā, sā etassa atthīti rūpasaññī, saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Tappaṭikkhepena
analyzed: saññā rūpa saññā sā etassa atthi iti rūpa saññī saññā sīsena jhānam vadati tad paṭikkhepena

original: arūpasaññī. Tenāha “ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī”tiādi.
analyzed: arūpa saññī tena āha ajjhattam na rūpa saññī itiādi

original: “Anto appanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthī”ti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti
analyzed: antar appanā ayam subhanti ābhogo natthi iti iminā pubba ābhoga vasena tathā

original: siyāti dasseti. Evañhettha tathāvattabbatāpatticodanā samatthitā hoti. Yasmā suvisuddhesu
analyzed: siyā ti dasseti evañhi ittha tathāvattabba tā āpatti codanā samatthitā hoti yasmā su visuddhesu

original: nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho
analyzed: nīla ādīsu vaṇṇa kasiṇesu tattha kata adhikārānam abhirati vasena suṭṭhu adhimuccana ṭṭho

original: sambhavati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito, yasmā pana mettāvasena
analyzed: sambhavati tasmai aṭṭhakathā ayam tathā tatiyaḥ vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito yasmai pana mettā vasena

original: pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahanti tesu tato adhimuccitvāva pavattati,
analyzed: pavattamānā bhāvanā satte a paṭikūlataḥ dahanti tesu tatas adhimuccitvā ava pavattati

original: tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge “brahmavihārabhāvanā subhavimokkho”ti vuttā, tayidaṃ ubhayampi
analyzed: tasmā paṭisambhidā magge brahmavihāra bhāvanā subha vimokkhā ti vuttā tayā idam ubhayam pi

original: tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tena tena pariyāyena vutta ttā na virujjhati iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Sabbasoti anavasesato. Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avassissati.
analyzed: sabbaso ti anavasesataḥ na hi catunnam arūpa kkhandhānam eka desaḥ api tattha avassissati

original: Visuddhattāti yathāparicchinnakāle nirodhitattā. Uttamo vimokkho nāma ariyeheva samāpajjitabbato,
analyzed: visuddha ttā ati yathā paricchinna kāle nirodhita ttā uttamaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma ariyeha iva samāpajjitabbato

original: ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.
analyzed: ariya phala pariyosāna ttā diṭṭhe iva dhamme nibbāna ppatti bhāvato ca

original: 130. Ādito paṭṭhāyāti paṭhamasamāpattito paṭṭhāya. Yāva pariyosānā samāpatti, tāva.
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya ati paṭhama samāpattitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā samāpatti tāva

original: Aṭṭhatvāti katthaci samāpattiyaṃ aṭṭhito eva, nirantarameva paṭipāṭiyā, uppaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: a ṭhatvā ti katthaci samāpattiyam aṭṭhitaḥ eva nirantaram eva paṭipāṭiyā uppaṭipāṭiyā

original: ca samāpajjatevāti attho. Tenāha “ito cito ca sañcaraṇavasena vutta”nti. Icchati
analyzed: ca samāpajjatā iva iti attho tena āha itas ca itas ca sañcaraṇa vasena vuttanti icchati

original: samāpajjituṃ. Tattha “samāpajjati pavisatī”ti samāpattisamaṅgīpuggalo taṃ taṃ paviṭṭho

analyzed: buddha ādīsu uppajjanaka pasādaḥ pasāda saddhā evam etat ti

original: okkantitvā pakkhanditvā saddahanavasena kappanaṃ okappanaṃ. Duvidhāpīti pasādasaddhāpi
analyzed: okkantitvā pakkhanditvā saddahana vasena kappanaṃ okappanam duvidhā api iti pasāda saddhā api

original: okappanasaddhāpi. Tattha pasādasaddhā aparaneyyarūpā hoti savanamattena pasīdanato.
analyzed: okappana saddhā api tattha pasāda saddhā apara neyya rūpā hoti savana mattena pasīdanato

original: Okappanasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā “evameta”nti paccakkhaṃ karontī
analyzed: okappana saddhā saddheyya vatthum ogāhetvā an upavisitvā evam etat ti paccakkham karontī

original: viya pavattati. Tenāha “saddhādhimutto vakkalittherasadiso hotī”ti. Tassa hīti okappanasaddhāya
analyzed: viya pavattati tena āha saddhā adhimuttaḥ vakkalitthera sadisaḥ hoti iti tassa hi iti okappana saddhāya

original: samannāgatassa. Hirī etassa atthīti hiri, hiri mano etesanti hirimanāti āha “pāpa…pe…
analyzed: samannāgatassa hirī etassa atthi iti hiri hiri manaḥ etesanti hirimanā ti āha pāpape

original: cittā”ti. Pāpato ottappenti ubbijjanti bhāyantīti ottappī.
analyzed: pāpataḥ ottappenti ubbijjanti bhāyanti iti ottappī

original: Bahu sutaṃ suttageyyādi etenāti bahussuto, sutaggahaṇaṃ cettha nidassanamattaṃ dhāraṇaparicayaparipucchānupekkhanadiṭṭhinijjhānānaṃ
analyzed: bahu sutam sutta geyya ādi etena ati bahussutaḥ suta gahaṇam ca ittha nidassana mattam dhāraṇa paricaya paripucchā an upekkhana diṭṭhi nijjhānānam

original: pettha icchitabbattā. Savanamūlakattā vā tesampi taggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pa ittha icchitabba ttā savana mūlaka ttā vā tesam pi tad gahaṇena iva gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam

original: Atthakāmena pariyāpuṇitabbato, diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthasiddhiyā pariyattabhāvato
analyzed: attha kāmena pariyāpuṇitabbataḥ diṭṭhadhammika ādi purisattha siddhiyā pariyatta bhāvataḥ

original: ca pariyatti, tīṇi piṭakāni. Saccappaṭivedho saccānaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ. Tadapi bāhusaccaṃ

analyzed: yathā vutta bāhusacca kicca nipphattitaḥ pariyatti adhippetā sacca paṭivedha āvahena bāhusaccena

original: bahussutabhāvassa idha icchitattā. Soti pariyattibahussuto. Catubbidho hoti pañcamassa
analyzed: bahussuta bhāvassa idha icchita ttā saḥ ti pariyatti bahussutaḥ catubbidhaḥ hoti pañcamassa

original: pakārassa abhāvato. Sabbatthakabahussutoti nissayamuccanakabahussutādayo viya padesiko
analyzed: pakārassa abhāvataḥ sabbatthaka bahussuto ti nissayamuccanaka bahussuta ādayaḥ viya padesiko

original: ahutvā piṭakattaye sabbatthakameva bāhusaccasabbhāvato sabbassa atthassa kāyanato

original: mūlabhūte pariyattisaddhamme suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
analyzed: mūla bhūte pariyatti saddhamme suppatiṭṭhita bhāvataḥ

original: Āraddhanti paggahitaṃ. Taṃ pana duvidhampi vīriyārambhavibhāgena dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekakāti ekākino, vūpakaṭṭhavihārinoti attho.
analyzed: āraddham ti paggahitam tam pana duvidham pi vīriya ārambha vibhāgena dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam tattha ekakā iti ekākinaḥ vūpakaṭṭha vihārinaḥ ti attho

original: Pucchitvāti parato pucchitvā. Sampaṭicchāpetunti “tvaṃ asukanāmo”ti vatvā tehi “āmā”ti
analyzed: pucchitvā iti paratas pucchitvā tvam asuka nāmā iti vatvā tehi

original: paṭijānāpetunti attho. Evaṃ cirakatādianussaraṇasamatthasatinepakkānaṃ appakasireneva
analyzed: paṭijānāpetunti atthaḥ evam cirakata ādi anussaraṇa samattha sati nepakkānam appaka sirena iva

original: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “apicā”tiādi.
analyzed: vuttam tena iva āha apica itiādi

original: 139. Bujjhati etāyāti “bodhī”ti laddhanāmāya sammādiṭṭhiādidhammasāmaggiyā aṅgoti
analyzed: bujjhati etāya ati bodhī iti laddha nāmāya sammādiṭṭhi ādi dhamma sāmaggiyā

original: bojjhaṅgo, pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇoti kāyavedanācittadhammānaṃ
analyzed: bojjhaṅgo pasattho sundaraḥ vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo upaṭṭhāna lakkhaṇo ti kāya vedanā citta dhammānam

original: asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvasallakkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti
analyzed: asubha dukkha anicca anatta bhāva sat lakkhaṇa saṅkhātam ārammaṇe upaṭṭhānam lakkhaṇam etassa ati

original: upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo. Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pīḷanādippakārato vicayo upaparikkhā lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna lakkhaṇo catunnam ariya saccānam pīḷana ādi ppakārataḥ vicayaḥ upaparikkhā lakkhaṇam

analyzed: etassa ti pavicaya lakkhaṇaḥ anuppannā kusala anuppādana ādi vasena cittassa paggahaḥ paggaṇhanaṃ

original: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti paggahalakkhaṇo. Pharaṇaṃ vipphārikatā lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti pharaṇalakkhaṇo.
analyzed: lakkhaṇam etassa ati paggaha lakkhaṇaḥ pharaṇam vipphārika tā lakkhaṇam etassa ati pharaṇa lakkhaṇaḥ

original: Upasamo kāyacittapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti upasamalakkhaṇo. Avikkhepo
analyzed: upasamaḥ kāya citta pariḷāhānam vūpasamanam lakkhaṇam etassa ati upasama lakkhaṇaḥ avikkhepaḥ

original: vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte
analyzed: vikkhepa viddhaṃsanam lakkhaṇam etassa ati avikkhepa lakkhaṇaḥ līn uddhacca rahite adhi citte

analyzed: pavattamāne paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsanesu a byāvaṭa tā ajjhupekkhanam paṭisaṅkhānam

original: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo.
analyzed: lakkhaṇam etassa ati paṭisaṅkhāna lakkhaṇaḥ

original: Catūhi kāraṇehīti satisampajaññaṃ, muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanā, upaṭṭhitassatipuggalasevanā,

original: indriyasamattapaṭipādanā, duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā, paññavantapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti

original: kāraṇehīti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇā, gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇā, piṇḍapātassa apacāyanatā,
analyzed: kāraṇehi iti apāya bhaya paccavekkhaṇā gamana vīthi paccavekkhaṇā piṇḍapātassa apacāyana tā

analyzed: kāraṇehi mahāsati paṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā ayam pana ānisaṃsa dassāvitā jāti mahatta paccavekkhaṇā ti

analyzed: tad adhimutta tā ti imehi sattahi dasahi kāraṇehi iti vatthu visada kiriyā indriya samatta paṭipādanā

original: pavattantīti. Lokiyavipassanāpīti pi-saddena missakāpettha santīti atthato āpannanti

original: atthāpattisiddhamatthaṃ niddhāretvā sarūpato dassetuṃ “virāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: atthāpatti siddham attham niddhāretvā sarūpataḥ dassetum virāga uti ādi vuttam tattha

original: 141. Mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, cittaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ.

original: Esa nayo sesadvayepi. Imānipi mettākāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni tesaṃ

original: seṭṭhaparisabhāvato. Yathā pana bhikkhūsupi labbhanti, evaṃ gihīsupi labbhanti catuparisasādhāraṇattāti
analyzed: seṭṭha parisa bhāvataḥ yathā pana bhikkhū supi labbhanti evam gihī supi labbhanti catu parisa sādhāraṇa ttā ati

original: labbhanti, nippariyāyato pana cārittadhammassavanena ayamattho icchitoti dassento
analyzed: labbhanti nippariyāyataḥ pana cāritta dhamma ssavanena ayam attho icchito ti dassento

original: “ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇa”nti āha. Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ paripucchanaatthakathanavasena
analyzed: ābhisamācārika dhamma pūraṇanti āha tepiṭakam pi buddha vacanam paripucchana attha kathana vasena

original: pavattiyamānaṃ hitajjhāsayena pavattitabbato.
analyzed: pavattiyamānam hita jjhā sayena

original: Āvīti pakāsaṃ, pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa sammukhabhāvatoti

original: tassa paccakkhābhāvatoti āha “parammukhā”ti. Sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ tesaṃ purato. Ubhayehīti

original: navakehi, therehi ca.
analyzed: navakehi therehi ca

original: Paggayhāti paggaṇhitvā uccaṃ katvā.
analyzed: paggayha ati paggaṇhitvā uccam katvā

original: Kāmaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanā, pasannena mukhena olokanañca mettaṃ

original: Lābhasaddo kammasādhano “lābhāvata, lābho laddho”tiādīsu viya, so cettha “dhammaladdhā”ti

analyzed: vacanataḥ atīta kālikaḥ iti āha cīvara ādayaḥ laddha paccayā ati dhammataḥ āgatā ati dhammikā

original: Tenāha “dhammaladdhā”ti. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kuhanādī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittena
analyzed: tena āha dhamma laddhā iti imam eva hi attham dassetum kuhanā ādi itiādi vuttam cittena

original: vibhajanapubbakaṃ kāyena vibhajananti mūlameva dassetuṃ “evaṃ cittena vibhajana”nti

analyzed: vuttam tena cittuppāda mattena api paṭivibhāgaḥ na kātabbaḥ ti dasseti appaṭivibhattam ti

analyzed: ānanda yācana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 178. Bodhīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tañhi “catumaggañāṇapaṭivedha”ntveva vuttaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭivedhassa

original: Catumahāpadesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu mahā padesa vaṇṇanā

original: Saṃsandetvā dassanaṃ sandassananti āha “vinaye saṃsandetabbānī”ti.

original: Asantuṭṭhiyāti asantuṭṭhibhāvāya. Saṅgaṇikāyāti kilesasaṅgaṇagaṇasaṅgaṇavihārāya.

original: Kosajjāyāti kusītabhāvāya. Dubbharatāyāti dupposatāya. Virāgāyāti sakalavaṭṭato virajjanatthāya.
analyzed: kosajjāya ati kusīta bhāvāya dubbharatāya ati dupposatāya virāgāya ati sakala vaṭṭataḥ virajjana tthāya

original: Visaññogāyāti kāmabhavādīhi visaṃyujjanatthāya. Apacayāyāti sabbassāpi vaṭṭassa apacayanāya,

original: Santuṭṭhiyāti dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhibhāvāya. Pavivekāyāti pavivittabhāvāya, kāyavivekāditadaṅgavivekādivivekasiddhiyā.

analyzed: vīriya ārambhāya ati kāyikassa ca iva cetasikassa ca vīriyassa paggahaṇa atthāya subhara tāya ati

analyzed: tam pacchima dassanam daṭṭhum āgatānam devatānam daṭṭhum yogyatā vasena vuttam keci

original: Sīhaseyyanti. Ettha sayanaṃ seyyā, sīhassa viya seyyā sīhaseyyā, taṃ sīhaseyyaṃ. Atha vā sīhaseyyanti seṭṭhaseyyaṃ, yadidaṃ atthadvayaṃ parato āgamissati.
analyzed: sīhaseyyanti ettha sayanam seyyā sīhassa viya seyyā sīha seyyā tam sīhaseyyam atha vā sīhaseyyanti seṭṭha seyyam yat idam attha dvayam paratas āgamissati

original: “Vāmena passena sentī”ti evaṃ vuttā kāmabhogiseyyā, dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādiyogakkhamato, purisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vāmena passena senti iti evam vuttā kāmabhogi seyyā dakkhiṇa passena sayānaḥ nāma na atthi dakkhiṇa hatthassa sarīra ggahaṇa ādi yogakkhamato purisa vasena ca itam vuttam

original: Ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti dukkhuppattito.
analyzed: ekena passena sayitum na sakkonti dukkha uppattito

analyzed: appesakkha miga jāta pariharaṇa attham

original: sarīraṃ dhāretuṃ samatthaṃ iddhānubhāvena pathaviṃ māpesuṃ.
analyzed: sarīram dhāretum samattham iddha anubhāvena pathavim

original: Kāmaṃ domanasse asatipi ekacco rāgo hotiyeva, rāge pana asati domanassassa asambhavo
analyzed: kāmam domanasse asati pi ekaccaḥ rāgaḥ hotiyā iva rāge pana asati domanassassa asambhavo

original: evāti tadekaṭṭhabhāvatoti āha “vītarāgāti pahīnadomanassā”ti. Silāthambhasadisā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikāratāya.
analyzed: eva iti tad ekaṭṭha bhāvato ti āha vīta rāgā iti pahīna domanassā iti silā thambha sadisā iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu nibbikāra tāya

original: Catusaṃvejanīyaṭṭhānavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu saṃvejanīya ṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: 202. Apāragaṅgāyāti gaṅgāya orambhāge. “Saṅkārachaḍḍakasammajjaniyo gahetvā”tiādi
analyzed: apāragaṅgāya ati gaṅgāya orambhāge saṅkāra chaḍḍaka sammajjaniyaḥ gahetvā atiādi

original: attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne vattakaraṇākāradassanaṃ. “Evaṃ dvīsu kālesū”tiādi nidassanatthaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ vasana ṭṭhāne vatta karaṇa ākāra dassanam evam dvīsu kālesu utiādi nidassana attham

original: paccāmasanaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā adhigataṃ.
analyzed: paccāmasanam tam heṭṭhā adhigatam

original: Kammasādhano sambhāvanattho bhāvanīya-saddoti āha “manasā bhāvite sambhāvite”ti. Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvanaṃ, vaḍḍhanañca paṭipakkhapahānatoti āha “ye vā”tiādi.
analyzed: kamma sādhanaḥ sambhāvanā atthaḥ bhāvanīya saddaḥ iti āha manasā bhāvite sambhāvitā iti dutiya vikappe pana bhāvanam vaḍḍhanam ca paṭipakkha pahānato ti āha ye vā itiādi

original: Buddhādīsu tīsu vatthūsu pasannacittassa, na kammaphalasaddhāmattena. Sā cassa saddhāsampadā
analyzed: buddha ādīsu tīsu vatthūsu pasanna cittassa na kamma phala saddhā mattena sā ca ssa saddhā sampadā

original: evaṃ veditabbāti phalena hetuṃ dassento “vattasampannassā”ti āha. Saṃvego nāma sahottappañāṇaṃ,
analyzed: evam veditabbā iti phalena hetum dassentaḥ vatta sampannassa iti āha saṃvegaḥ nāma sahottappa ñāṇam

original: abhijātiṭṭhānādīnipi tassa uppattihetūni bhavantīti āha “saṃvegajanakānī”ti.
analyzed: abhijāti ṭṭhāna ādīni pi tassa uppatti hetūni bhavanti iti āha saṃvega janakāni iti

original: Cetiyapūjanatthaṃ cārikā cetiyacārikā. Sagge patiṭṭhahissantiyeva buddhaguṇārammaṇāya kusalacetanāya saggasaṃvattaniyabhāvato.
analyzed: cetiya pūjana attham cārikā cetiya cārikā sagge patiṭṭhahissantiyā iva buddha guṇa ārammaṇāya kusala cetanāya sagga saṃvattaniya bhāvato

original: Ānandapucchākathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ānanda pucchā kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 203. Etthāti mātugāme. Ayaṃ uttamā paṭipatti, yadidaṃ adassanaṃ, dassanamūlakattā
analyzed: ettha ati mātugāme ayam uttamā paṭipatti yat idam adassanam dassana mūla kattā

original: tappaccayānaṃ sabbānatthānaṃ. Lobhoti kāmarāgo. Cittacalanā paṭipattiantarāyakaro
analyzed: tad paccayānam sabbānatthānam lobho ti kāma rāgo citta calanā paṭipatti antarāya karo

original: cittakkhobho. Murumurāpetvāti saaṭṭhikaṃ katvā khādane anuravadassanaṃ. Aparimitaṃ
analyzed: citta kkhobhaḥ murumurāpetvā ti sa aṭṭhikam katvā khādane anurava dassanam aparimitam

original: kālaṃ dukkhānubhavanaṃ aparicchinnadukkhānubhavanaṃ. Vissāsoti visaṅgo ghaṭṭanābhāvo.
analyzed: kālam dukkha anubhavanam aparicchinna dukkha anubhavanam vissāsaḥ ati visaṅgaḥ ghaṭṭana abhāvaḥ

original: Otāroti tattha cittassa anuppaveso. Asihatthena verīpurisena, pisācenāpi khāditukāmena.
analyzed: otāro ti tattha cittassa anuppavesaḥ asi hatthena verī purisena pisācena api khāditu kāmena

original: Āsīdeti akkamanādivasena bādheyya. Assāti mātugāmassa. Pabbajitehi kattabbakammanti
analyzed: āsīda iti akkamana ādi vasena bādheyya assa āti mātu gāmassa pabbajitehi kattabba kammanti

original: āmisapaṭiggahaṇādi pabbajitehi kātabbaṃ kammaṃ. Satīti vā kāyagatāsati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
analyzed: āmisa paṭiggahaṇa ādi pabbajitehi kātabbam kammam satī iti vā kāya gatā asati upaṭṭhāpetabbā

original: 204. Atantibaddhāti abhāravahā. Pesitacittāti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittā.
analyzed: a tanti baddhā ati abhāra vahā pesita cittā ati nibbānam pati pesita cittā

original: 205. Vihatenāti kappāsavihananadhanunā pabbajaṭānaṃ vijaṭanavasena hatena. Tenāha
analyzed: vihatena ati kappāsa vihanana dhanunā pabbajaṭānam vijaṭana vasena hatena tena āha

original: “supothitenā”ti, asaṅkaraṇavasena suṭṭhu pothitenāti attho, dassanīyasaṃvejanīyaṭṭhānakittanena
analyzed: su pothitena ati asaṅkaraṇa vasena suṭṭhu pothitena ati atthaḥ dassanīya saṃvejanīya ṭṭhāna kittanena

original: ca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: ca vasanaṭṭhānam kathitam

original: Ānandaacchariyadhammavaṇṇanā
207. Theraṃ adisvā āmantesīti tattha adisvā āvajjanto therassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ, pavattiñca ñatvā āmantesi.
analyzed: theram a disvā āmantesi iti tattha a disvā āvajjantaḥ therassa ṭhita ṭṭhānam pavattim ca ñatvā āmantesi

original: Kāyakammassa hitabhāvo hitajjhāsayena pavattitattāti āha “hitavuddhiyā katenā”ti.
analyzed: kāya kammassa hita bhāvaḥ hita ajjhāsayena pavatti tattā ti āha hita vuddhiyā katena ati

original: Sukhabhāvo kāyikadukkhābhāvo, cetasikasukhabhāvo cetasikasukhasamuṭṭhitattā cāti
analyzed: sukha bhāvo kāyika dukkha abhāvo cetasika sukha bhāvo cetasika sukha samuṭṭhita ttā ca ati

original: vuttaṃ “sukhasomanasseneva katenā”ti. Āvirahovibhāgato advayabhāvato advayenāti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: vuttam sukha somanassena iva katena ati ā viraha uvibhāgataḥ advaya bhāvataḥ advayena ati imam attham

original: dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Satthu khettabhāvasampattiyā, therassa ajjhāsayasampattiyā
analyzed: dassetum yathā itiādi vuttam satthu khetta bhāva sampattiyā therassa ajjhāsaya sampattiyā

original: ca “ettakamida”nti pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pamāṇavirahitattā tassa kammassāti
analyzed: ca ettakam idam ti pamāṇam gahetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya pamāṇa virahita ttā tassa kammassa ati

original: āha “cakkavāḷampī”tiādi.
analyzed: āha cakka vāḷampi itiādi

original: Evaṃ pavattitenāti evaṃ odissakamettābhāvanāya vasena pavattitena. Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ
analyzed: evam pavattitena ati evam odissaka mettā bhāvanāya vasena pavattitena vivaṭṭu upanissaya bhūtam

original: kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ etenāti katapuñño, arahattādhigamāya katādhikāroti attho. Tenāha
analyzed: katam upacitam puññam etena ati kata puññaḥ arahattā adhigamāya kata adhikāraḥ ti attho tena āha

original: “abhinīhārasampannosīti dassetī”ti.
analyzed: abhinīhāra sampanno asi iti dasseti iti

original: 208. Katthaci saṅkucitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya, paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ
analyzed: katthaci saṅkucitam hutvā ṭhitam mahā pathavim pattharantaḥ viya paṭisaṃhaṭam

original: hutvā ṭhitaṃ ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya, catusaṭṭhādhikayojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ cakkavāḷagiriṃ
analyzed: hutvā ṭhitam ākāsam vitthārentaḥ viya catu saṭṭha adhika yojana sata sahassa ubbedham cakkavāḷa girim

original: adho osārento viya, aṭṭhasaṭṭhādhikasahassayojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ ukkhipento
analyzed: adhas osārentaḥ viya aṭṭha saṭṭha adhika sahassa yojana sata sahassa ubbedham sinerum ukkhipentaḥ

original: viya, satayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viyāti pañca hi
analyzed: mahā jambum khandhe gahetvā cālentaḥ viyāti pañca hi

original: upamā hi therassa guṇakathā mahantabhāvadassanatthañceva aññesaṃ dukkaṭabhāvadassanatthañca
analyzed: upamā hi therassa guṇa kathā mahanta bhāva dassana attham ca iva aññesam dukkaṭa bhāva dassana attham ca

original: āgatāva. Eteneva cāti ca-saddena “ahaṃ etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”, “sadevakasmiṃ
analyzed: āgatāva etena iva ca ati ca saddena aham etarahi araham sammāsambuddhaḥ sa devakasmin

original: lokasmiṃ natthi me paṭipuggalo”ti ca evaṃ ādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Byattoti khandhakosallādisaṅkhātena
analyzed: lokasmim natthi me paṭipuggalo ti ca evam ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo byattaḥ ti khandha kosalla ādi saṅkhātena

original: veyyattiyena samannāgato. Medhāvīti medhāsaṅkhātāya sammābhāvitāya paññāya samannāgato.
analyzed: veyyattiyena samannāgataḥ medhāvī iti medhā saṅkhātāya sammābhāvitāya paññāya samannāgataḥ

original: 209. Paṭisanthāradhammanti pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ, upagatānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: paṭisanthāra dhamman ti pakati cāritta vasena vuttam upagatānam pana bhikkhūnam

original: bhikkhunīnañca pucchāvissajjanavasena ceva cittarucivasena ca yathākālaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam ca pucchā vissajjana vasena ca iva citta ruci vasena ca yathākālam dhammaṃ

original: desetiyeva, upāsakopāsikānaṃ pana upanisinnakathāvasena.
analyzed: upāsaka upāsikānam pana upanisinna kathā vasena

original: Mahāsudassanasuttadesanāvaṇṇanā
210. Khuddaka-saddo patirūpavācī, ka-saddo appatthoti āha “khuddakanagaraketi nagarapatirūpake
analyzed: khuddaka saddaḥ patirūpa vācī ka saddaḥ appatthaḥ ti āha khuddaka nagaraka iti nagara patirūpake

original: sambādhe khuddakanagarake”ti. Dhuparavisālasaṇṭhānatāya taṃ “ujjaṅgalanagaraka”nti
analyzed: sambādhe khuddaka nagaraka iti dhupara visāla saṇṭhāna tāya tam ujjaṅgala nagarakam iti

original: vuttanti āha “visamanagarake”ti. Aññesaṃ mahānagarānaṃ ekadesappamāṇatāya sākhāsadise.
analyzed: vuttanti āha visama nagaraka iti aññesam mahā nagarānam eka desa ppamāṇa tāya sākhā sadise

original: Ettha ca “khuddakanagarake”ti iminā tassa nagarassa appakabhāvo vutto, “ujjaṅgalanagarake”ti
analyzed: ettha ca khuddaka nagaraka iti iminā tassa nagarassa appaka bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ ujjaṅgala nagarakā iti

original: iminā bhūmivipattiyā nihīnabhāvo, “sākhānagarake”ti iminā appadhānabhāvo. Sārappattāti
analyzed: iminā bhūmi vipattiyā nihīna bhāvaḥ sākhānagaraka iti iminā appadhāna bhāvaḥ sāra ppattā ati

original: vibhavasārādinā sāramahattaṃ pattā.
analyzed: vibhava sāra ādinā

original: Kahāpaṇasakaṭanti ettha “dvikumbhaṃ sakaṭaṃ. Kumbho pana dasambaṇo”ti vadanti. Dve pavisantīti dve kahāpaṇasakaṭāni dve āyavasena pavisanti.
analyzed: ettha dvi kumbham sakaṭam kumbhaḥ pana vadanti dve pavisanti iti dve kahāpaṇa sakaṭāni dve āyavasena pavisanti

original: Subhikkhāti sulabhāhārā, sundarāhārā ca. Tenāha “khajjabhojjasampannā”ti. Saddaṃ
analyzed: subhikkhā ati sulabha āhārā sundara āhārā ca tena āha khajja bhojja sampannā iti saddam

original: karonteti ravasārinā tuṭṭhabhāvena koñcanādaṃ karonte. Avivittāti asuññā, kadāci
analyzed: karontā iti ravasārinā tuṭṭha bhāvena koñca nādam karonte avivittā ati asuññā kadāci

original: ratho paṭhamaṃ gacchati, taṃ añño anubandhanto gacchati, kadāci dutiyaṃ vuttaratho
analyzed: ratho paṭhamam gacchati tam aññaḥ anubandhantaḥ gacchati kadāci dutiyam vutta ratho

original: paṭhamaṃ gacchati, itaro taṃ anubandhati evaṃ aññamaññaṃ anubandhamānā. Etthāti kusāvatīnagare.
analyzed: paṭhamam gacchati itaraḥ tam anubandhati evam aññam aññam anubandhamānāḥ ettha iti kusāvatī nagare

original: Tassa mahantabhāvato ceva iddhādibhāvato ca niccaṃ payojitāneva bheriādīni tūriyāni,
analyzed: tassa mahanta bhāvataḥ ca iva iddha ādi bhāvataḥ ca niccam bheri ādīni tūriyāni

original: samma sammāti vā aññamaññaṃ piyālāpasaddo samma-saddo. Kaṃsatāḷādisabbatāḷāvacarasaddo
analyzed: samma samma iti vā aññam aññam piya alāpa saddo samma saddo kaṃsa tāḷa ādi sabba tāḷa avacara saddo

original: tāḷa-saddo, kūṭabheri-saddo kumbhathūṇasaddo.
analyzed: tāḷa saddo kūṭa bheri saddo kumbha thūṇa saddo

original: Evarūpā saddā honti kacavarākiṇṇavīthitāya, araññe kandamūlapaṇṇādiggahaṇāya, tattha
analyzed: evarūpā saddāḥ honti kaca vara ākiṇṇa vīthitāya araññe kanda mūla paṇṇa ādi gahaṇāya tattha

original: dukkhajīvikatāya cāti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Idha na evaṃ ahosi devaloke viya sabbaso
analyzed: dukkha jīvika tāya ca ati yathākkamam yojetabbam idha na evam ahosi deva loke viya sabbaso

original: paripuṇṇasampattikatāya.
analyzed: paripuṇṇa sampattika tāya

original: Mahantaṃ kolāhalanti saddhāsampannānaṃ devatānaṃ, upāsakānañca vasena purato purato
analyzed: mahantam kolāhalanti saddhā sampannānam devatānam upāsakānam ca vasena puratas puratas

original: mahatī ugghosanā hoti. Tattha bhagavantaṃ uddissa katassa vihārassa abhāvato, bhikkhusaṅghassa
analyzed: mahatī ugghosanā hoti tattha bhagavantam uddissa katassa vihārassa abhāvataḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa

analyzed: ca mahanta bhāvato te āgantvā āpe pesesi pesento ca katham hi nāma bhagavā pacchime

original: kāle attano pavattiṃ amhākaṃ nārocesi, nesaṃ domanassaṃ mā ahosī”ti “ajja kho vāseṭṭhā”tiādinā sāsanaṃ pesesi.
analyzed: kāle attanaḥ pavattim amhākam na arocesi na isam domanassam mā ahosi iti ajja kho vāseṭṭha ati ādinā sāsanam pesesi

original: Mallānaṃ vandanāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: mallānam vandanā vaṇṇanā

original: 211. Aghaṃ dukkhaṃ āventi pakāsentīti aghāvino, pākaṭībhūtadukkhāti āha “uppannadukkhā”ti.
analyzed: agham dukkham āventi pakāsenti iti aghāvino pākaṭībhūta dukkhā ati āha uppanna dukkhā iti

original: Ñātisālohitabhāvena kulaṃ parivattati etthāti kulaparivattaṃ. Taṃ taṃkulīnabhāgena
analyzed: ñāti sālohita bhāvena kulam parivattati ettha ati kula parivattam tam taṃkulīna bhāgena

original: ṭhito sattanikāyo “kulaparivattaso”ti vuttanti āha “kulaparivatta”nti. Te pana taṃtaṃkulaparivattaparicchinnā
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ satta nikāyaḥ kula parivattaso ti vuttanti āha kula parivattanti te pana taṃ taṃ kula parivatta paricchinnā

original: mallarājāno tasmiṃ nagare vīthiādisabhāgena vasantīti vuttaṃ “vīthisabhāgena ceva
analyzed: malla rājāno tasmin nagare vīthi ādi sabhāgena vasanti iti vuttam vīthi sabhāgena ca iva

original: racchāsabhāgena cā”ti.
analyzed: ca ati

original: Subhaddaparibbājakavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: subhadda paribbājaka vatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 212. Kaṅkhā eva kaṅkhādhammo. Ekato vāti bhūmiṃ avibhajitvā sādhāraṇatova. Bījato
analyzed: kaṅkhā eva kaṅkhā dhammo ekatas vā ati bhūmim a vibhajitvā sādhāraṇataḥ iva bījataḥ

original: ca aggaṃ gahetvā āhāraṃ sampādetvā dānaṃ bījaggaṃ. Gabbhakāleti gabbhadhāraṇato paraṃ
analyzed: ca aggam gahetvā āhāram sampādetvā dānam bīja aggam gabbha kāla iti gabbha dhāraṇataḥ param

original: khīraggahaṇakāle. Tenāha “gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ niharitvā”tiādi. Puthukakāleti
analyzed: khīra ggahaṇa kāle tena āha gabbham phāletvā khīram niharitvā atiādi puthuka kāla iti

original: sassānaṃ nātipakke puthukayogyaphalakāle. Lāyanagganti pakkassa sassassa lavane lavanārambhe
analyzed: sassānam na ati pakke puthuka yogya phala kāle pakkassa sassassa lavane lavana ārambhe

original: dānaṃ adāsi. Lunassa sassassa veṇivasena bandhitvā ṭhapanaṃ veṇikaraṇaṃ. Tassa ārambhe

original: dānaṃ veṇaggaṃ. Veṇiyo pana ekato katvā rāsikaraṇaṃ kalāpo. Tattha aggadānaṃ kalāpaggaṃ.
analyzed: dānam veṇaggam veṇiyaḥ pana ekatas katvā rāsi karaṇam kalāpo tattha agga dānam kalāpaggam

original: Kalāpato nīharitvā maddane aggadānaṃ khalaggaṃ. Madditaṃ ophuṇitvā dhaññassa rāsikaraṇe

original: aggadānaṃ khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ. Dhaññassa khalato koṭṭhe pakkhipane aggadānaṃ koṭṭhaggaṃ.
analyzed: aggadānam khalabhaṇḍaggam dhaññassa khalato koṭṭhe pakkhipane aggadānam koṭṭhaggam

original: Uddharitvāti koṭṭhato uddharitvā.
analyzed: uddharitvā iti koṭṭhataḥ uddharitvā

original: “Nava aggadānāni adāsī”ti iminā “kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu santike aggatova mucceyya”nti
analyzed: nava agga dānāni adāsi iti iminā katham nu kho aham satthu santike aggataḥ uva mucceyyanti

original: aggaggadānavasena vivaṭṭūpanissayassa kusalassa katūpacitattā, ñāṇassa ca tathā paripākaṃ
analyzed: aggagga dāna vasena vivaṭṭu upanissayassa kusalassa kata upacita ttā ñāṇassa ca tathā paripākam

original: gatattā aggadhammadesanāya tassa bhājanabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “imaṃ aggadhammaṃ
analyzed: gata ttā agga dhamma desanāya tassa bhājana bhāvam dasseti tena āha imam agga dhammaṃ

original: tassa desessāmī”tiādi. Ohīyitvā saṅkocaṃ āpajjitvā.
analyzed: tassa desessāmi itiādi ohīyitvā saṅkocam āpajjitvā

original: Antepurassāti anurādhapure rañño antepurassa. Uttarasīhapañjarasadiseti tadā rañño
analyzed: antepurassa ati anurādhapure raññaḥ antepurassa uttara sīha pañjara sadisā iti tadā raññaḥ

original: pāsāde tādisassa uttaradisāya sīhapañjarassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Sukhena sakkāti
analyzed: pāsāde tādisassa uttara disāya sīha pañjarassa labbhamāna ttā vuttam sukhena sakkā iti

original: kiñci anāruhitvā, sarīrañca anullaṅghitvā yathāṭhiteneva hatthena pupphamuṭṭhiyo

analyzed: khipitvā sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetum

original: Nānāvirāgaratanappabhāsamujjalanti nānāvidhavicittavaṇṇaratanobhāsapabhassaraṃ. Ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatteti āgantvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato upari ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
analyzed: nānā virāga ratana ppabhāsam ujjalanti nānāvidha vicitta vaṇṇa ratana ubhāsa pabhassaram ākāsam abbhut gantvā pavatteti āgantvā ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ upari ākāsam abbhut gantvā pavatte

analyzed: sinerum vāma passena katvā tassa dhurataram gacchantaḥ vāma passena sinerum pahāya iti vuttam

original: Vinibbedhenāti tiriyaṃ vinivijjhanavasena. Sannivesakkhamoti khandhāvārasannivesayogyo. Sulabhāhārupakaraṇoti sukheneva laddhabbadhaññagorasadārutiṇādibhojanasādhano.
analyzed: vinibbedhena ati tiriyam vinivijjhana vasena sannivesa kkhamaḥ ti khandhāvāra sannivesa yogyaḥ sulabha āhāra upakaraṇaḥ ti sukhena iva laddhabba dhañña gorasa dāru tiṇa ādi bhojana sādhanaḥ

original: Paracakkanti parassa rañño senā, āṇā vā.
analyzed: paracakkanti parassa rañño senāḥ āṇāḥ vā

original: Āgamananandanoti āgamanena nandijanano. Gamanena socetīti gamanasocano. Upakappethāti

original: uparūpari kappetha, saṃvidahatha upanethāti attho. Upaparikkhitvāti hetutopi sabhāvatopi

analyzed: oramanti iti veditabbam

original: Ogacchamānanti osīdantaṃ. Yojanamattanti vitthārato yojanamattaṃ padesaṃ. Gambhīrabhāvena

original: udakena senāya anajjhottharaṇatthaṃ. Puratthimo mahāsamuddo pariyanto etassāti puratthimamahāsamuddapariyanto,

original: Cāturantāyāti catusamuddantāya, puratthimadisādicatukoṭṭhāsantāya vā. Sobhayamānaṃ

original: Pāḷiyampi hi “upasobhayamānaṃ” tveva vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyam pi hi upasobhayamānam tu eva vuttam

original: Hatthiratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: hatthi ratana vaṇṇanā

analyzed: satta patiṭṭho ti bhūmiphusanakehi vāladhi varaṅgam hattho ti imehi ca tīhi catūhi

original: chaddantakulahatthīhi hīno. Uposathakulā sabbajeṭṭhoti uposathakulato āgacchanto
analyzed: chaddanta kula hatthīhi hīnaḥ uposatha kulā sabbajeṭṭho ti uposatha kulataḥ āgacchantaḥ

original: Apanetvāti attano ānubhāvena apanetvā. Gandhameva hi tassa itare hatthī na sahanti.

original: Gharadhenuvacchako viyāti ghare paricitadhenuyā tattheva jātasaṃvaddhavacchako viya. Sakalapathavinti sakalaṃ jambudīpasaññitaṃ pathaviṃ.
analyzed: ghara dhenu vat śakaḥ viyā ti ghare paricita dhenuyā tattha iva jāta saṃvaddha vat śakaḥ sakala pathavinti sakalam jambudīpa saññitam pathavim

original: Assaratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: assa ratana vaṇṇanā

original: 247. Sindhavakulatoti sindhavassājānīyakulato.

248. Sakaṭanābhisamapariṇāhanti pariṇāhato mahāsakaṭassa nābhiyā samappamāṇaṃ. Ubhosu
analyzed: sakaṭa nābhi sama pariṇāhanti pariṇāhataḥ mahā sakaṭassa nābhiyā samappamāṇam ubhosu

original: antesūti heṭṭhā, upari cāti dvīsu antesu. Kaṇṇikapariyantatoti dvinnaṃ kañcanapadumānaṃ

analyzed: aruṇuggamana velā viyāti aruṇuggamana sīsena sūriya udaya kkhaṇam upalakkheti

original: Itthiratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: itthi ratana vaṇṇanā

original: 249. “Itthiratanaṃ pātubhavatī”ti vatvā kutassā pātubhāvoti dassetuṃ “maddarājakulato”tiādi

original: Saṇṭhānapāripūriyāti hatthapādādisarīrāvayavānaṃ susaṇṭhitāya. Avayavapāripūriyā
analyzed: saṇṭhāna pāripūriyā ati hattha pāda ādi sarīra avayavānam su saṇṭhitāya avayava pāripūriyā

original: hi samudāyapāripūrisiddhi. Rūpanti sarīraṃ “rūpaṃ tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu

original: viya. Dassanīyāti surūpabhāvena passitabbayuttā. Tenāha “dissamānāvā”tiādi. Somanassavasena
analyzed: viya dassanīyā ati surūpa bhāvena passitabba yuttā tena āha somanassa vasena

analyzed: cittam pasādeti yonisas cintentānam kamma phala saddhāya vasena kāraṇa vacanena

original: yathā pāsādikatāya vaṇṇapokkharatāsiddhi vuttā, evaṃ dassanīyatāya pāsādikatāsiddhi,

original: pāsādikatāsiddhi, pāsādikatāya dassanīyatāsiddhi, dassanīyatāya abhirūpatāsiddhi
analyzed: pāsādika tā siddhi pāsādika tāya dassanīya tā siddhi dassanīya tāya abhirūpa tā siddhi

original: yojetabbā. Evaṃ sarīrasampattivasena abhirūpatādike dassetvā idāni sarīre dosābhāvavasenapi
analyzed: yojetabbā evam sarīra sampatti vasena abhirūpa tā ādike dassetvā idāni sarīre dosa abhāva vasena api

original: Ārohasampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato. Pariṇāhasampatti vuttā kisathūladosābhāvato.
analyzed: āroha sampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādika bhāvataḥ pariṇāha sampatti vuttā kisa thūla dosa abhāvato

original: Vaṇṇasampatti vuttā vivaṇṇatābhāvato. Kāyavipattiyāti sarīradosassa. Satavāravihatassāti
analyzed: vaṇṇa sampatti vuttā vivaṇṇa tā bhāvato kāya vipattiyā ati sarīra dosassa sata vāra vihatassa ati

original: sattakkhattuṃ vihatassa, “satavāravihatassā”ti ca idaṃ kappāsapicuvasena vuttaṃ,
analyzed: satta kkhattum vihatassa sata vāra vihatassa ati ca idam kappāsa picu vasena vuttam

original: tūlapicuno pana vihananameva natthi. Kuṅkumatagaraturukkhayavanapupphāni catujjāti.

original: “Tamālatagaraturukkhayavanapupphānī”ti apare.
analyzed: tamāla tagara turukkhaya vana pupphāni iti apare

original: Aggidaḍḍhā viyāti āsanagatena agginā daḍḍhā viya. Paṭhamamevāti rājānaṃ disvāpi kiccantarappasutā
analyzed: aggi daḍḍhā viya ati āsana gatena agginā daḍḍhā viya paṭhamam eva ati rājānam disvā api

analyzed: a hutvā paṭhamam eva dassana sama kālam eva ati atthaḥ raññaḥ nisajjāya pacchā

original: nipātanaṃ nisīdanaṃ sīlaṃ etissāti pacchānipātinī. Taṃ taṃ attanā rañño kātabbakiccaṃ

original: Mātugāmo nāma yebhuyyena saṭhajātiko, itthiratanassa pana taṃ natthīti dassetuṃ “svāssā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mātugāmaḥ nāma yebhuyyena saṭha jātiko itthi ratanassa pana tam natthi iti dassetum svāssa atiādi vuttam

original: Guṇāti rūpaguṇā ceva ācāraguṇā ca. Purimakammānubhāvenāti katassa purimakammassānubhāvena

analyzed: parivāra sampatti saṃvattaniyam puñña kammam tādisassa phala visesassa upanissayaḥ hotiya iva

original: Tenāha “cakkavattino puññaṃ upanissāyā”ti, etena sesesupi saviññāṇakaratanesu attano
analyzed: tena āha cakkavattinaḥ puññam upanissāya iti etena sesesu pi saviññāṇaka ratanesu attanaḥ

original: kammavasena nibbattesupi tesaṃ tesaṃ visesānaṃ tadupanissayatā vibhāvitā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kamma vasena nibbattesu pi tesam tesam visesānam tad upanissaya tā vibhāvitā eva ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Pubbe ekadesavasena labbhamānā pāripūrī rañño cakkavattibhāvūpagamanato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: pubbe eka desa vasena labbhamānā pāripūrī rañño cakkavatti bhāva upagamanataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: sabbākāraparipūrā jātā.
analyzed: sabba ākāra paripūrā jātā

original: Gahapatiratanavaṇṇanā
250. Pakatiyā vāti sabhāveneva cakkaratanapātubhāvato pubbepi. Yādisaṃ rañño cakkavattissa
analyzed: pakatiyā vāti sabhāvena iva cakka ratana pātubhāvataḥ pubbe pi yādisam raññaḥ cakkavattissa

original: puññabalaṃ nissāya yathāvuttā cakkaratanānubhāvanibbatti, tādisaṃ etassa puññabalaṃ

original: nissāya gahapatiratanassa kammavipākajaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetīti āha “cakkaratanānubhāvasahita”nti.

original: Kāraṇassa hi ekasantatipatitatāya, phalassa ca samānakālikatāya tathāvacanaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇassa hi eka santati patita tāya phalassa ca samāna kālika tāya tathā vacanam

original: Pariṇāyakaratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pariṇāyaka ratana vaṇṇanā

original: 251. “Ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ adhammo”tiādinā kammassakatāvabodhanasaṅkhātassa paṇḍitabhāvassa
analyzed: ayam dhammaḥ ayam adhammaḥ ti ādinā kammassaka tā avabodhana saṅkhātassa paṇḍita bhāvassa

original: atthitāya paṇḍito. Bāhusaccabyattiyā byatto. Sabhāvasiddhāya medhāsaṅkhātāya pakatipaññāya
analyzed: atthitāya paṇḍitaḥ bāhu sacca byattiyā byattaḥ sabhāva siddhāya medhā saṅkhātāya pakati paññāya

original: atthitāya medhāvī. Attano yāthāvabuddhamatthaṃ paresaṃ vibhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ samatthatāya
analyzed: atthitāya medhāvī attanaḥ yāthāvabuddham attham paresam vibhāvetum pakāsetum samattha tāya

original: vibhāvī. Vavatthapetunti nicchituṃ.
analyzed: vibhāvī nicchitum

original: Catuiddhisamannāgatavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu iddhi samannāgata vaṇṇanā

original: 252. Vipaccanaṃ vipāko, vipāko eva vepāko yathā “vikatameva vekata”nti. Samaṃ nātisītanāccuṇhatāya avisamaṃ bhuttassa vepāko etissā atthīti samavepākinī, tāya samavepākiniyā.
analyzed: vipaccanam vipākaḥ vipākaḥ eva vepākaḥ yathā vikatam eva vekatanti samam na ati sītanāt cuṇha tāya avisamam bhuttassa vepāko etissā atthi iti samavepākinī tāya samavepākiniyā

original: Dhammapāsādapokkharaṇivaṇṇanā
253. Janarāsiṃ kāretvā tena janarāsinā khaṇitvā na māpesi. Kiñcarahīti āha “rañño
analyzed: jana rāsim kāretvā tena jana rāsinā khaṇitvā na mā āpesi kiñcarahi iti āha rañño

original: panā”tiādi. Tattha kāraṇaṃ parato āgamissati. Ekāya vedikāya parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyo.
analyzed: pana ati ādi tattha kāraṇam paratas āgamissati ekāya vedikāya parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyaḥ

original: Pariveṇaparicchedapariyanteti ettha pariveṇaṃ nāma samantato vivaṭaṅgaṇabhūtaṃ pokkharaṇiyā
analyzed: pariveṇa pariccheda pariyantā iti ettha pariveṇam nāma samantataḥ vivaṭaṅgaṇa bhūtam pokkharaṇiyā

original: tīraṃ, tassa paricchedabhūte pariyante ekāya vedikāya parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyo. Etadahosīti
analyzed: tīram tassa pariccheda bhūte pariyante ekāya vedikāya parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyaḥ etat ahosi iti

original: etaṃ “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imāsu pokkharaṇīsū”tiādikaṃ ahosīti. Sabbotukanti sabbesu utūsu
analyzed: etam yat nūna aham imāsu pokkharaṇīsu uti ādikam ahosi iti sabbotukam ti sabbesu utūsu

original: pupphanakaṃ. Nānāvaṇṇauppalabījādīnīti rattanīlādinānāvaṇṇapupphena pupphanakauppalabījādīni.

original: Jalajathalajamālanti jalajathalajapupphamālaṃ.
analyzed: jalaja thala ja mālanti jalaja thala ja puppha mālam

original: 254. Paricāravasenāti taṅkhaṇikaparicāravasena, idañca paṭhamaṃ paṭṭhapitaniyāmeneva
analyzed: paricāra vasena ati taṅkhaṇika paricāra vasena idam ca paṭhamam paṭṭhapita niyāmena iva

original: vuttaṃ, pacchā pana yānasayanādīni viya itthiyopi atthikānaṃ pariccattā eva. Tenāha
analyzed: vuttam pacchā pana yāna sayana ādīni viya itthiyaḥ api atthikānam pariccattā eva tena āha

original: “itthīhipī”tiādi. Pariccāgavasenāti nirapekkhapariccāgavasena. Dīyatīti dānaṃ, deyyavatthu.

original: Taṃ aggīyati nissajjīyati etthāti dānaggaṃ, parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tādisāni atthīti yādisāni
