original: rañño dānagge khomasukhumādīni vatthāni, tādisāni yesaṃ attano santakāni santi. Ohāyāti
analyzed: raññaḥ dāna gge khoma sukhuma ādīni vatthāni tādisāni yesam attano santakāni santi ohāya ati

original: pahāya tattheva ṭhapetvā. Attho atthi yesaṃ teti atthikā. Evaṃ anatthikāpi daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pahāya tattha iva ṭhapetvā atthaḥ atthi yesam te iti atthikā evam anatthikā api daṭṭhabbā

original: 255. Kalahasaddopīti pi-saddena dānādhippāyena gehato nīhataṃ puna gehaṃ pavesetuṃ na yuttanti imamatthaṃ samucceti. Tenāha “na kho etaṃ amhākaṃ patirūpa”ntiādi.
analyzed: kalaha saddaḥ api iti pi saddena dāna adhippāyena gehataḥ nīhatam puna geham pavesetum na yuttam ti imam attham samucceti tena āha na kho etam amhākam patirūpam tiādi

original: 257. Uṇhīsamatthaketi sikhāpariyantamatthake. Paricchedamatthaketi pāsādaṅgaṇaparicchedassa matthake.
analyzed: uṇhīsa matthake iti sikhā pariyanta matthake pariccheda matthake iti pāsāda aṅgaṇa paricchedassa matthake

original: 258. Haratīti ativiya pabhassarabhāvena cakkhūni paṭiharantaṃ duddikkhatāya diṭṭhiyo harati apanentaṃ viya hoti. Taṃ pana haraṇaṃ nesaṃ paripphandanenāti āha “phandāpetī”ti.
analyzed: harati iti ativiya pabhassara bhāvena cakkhūni paṭiharantam duddikkha tāya diṭṭhiyaḥ harati apanentam viya hoti tam pana haraṇam na īsam paripphandanena ati āha phandāpeti iti

original: Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Jhānasampattivaṇṇanā
analyzed: jhāna sampatti vaṇṇanā

original: 260. Mahatiyā iddhiyāti mahantena icchitatthasamijjhanena. Tesaṃyeva icchiticchitatthānaṃ.

original: “Anubhavitabbāna”nti iminā ānubhāva-saddassa kammasādhanataṃ dasseti. Pubbe sampannaṃ

original: dameti etenāti damo.
analyzed: dama iti etena ati

original: Bodhisattapubbayogavaṇṇanā
analyzed: bodhisatta pubba yoga vaṇṇanā

original: thero. Theraṃ disvāti aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā. Kaṭṭhattharaṇanti kaṭṭhamayaṃ

original: attharaṇaṃ, dāruphalakanti attho.
analyzed: attharaṇam dāru phalakanti

original: Paribhogabhājananti pānīyaparibhojanīyādiparibhogayogyaṃ bhājanaṃ. Ārakaṇṭakanti sūcivijjhanakakaṇṭakaṃ. Pipphalikanti khuddakasatthakaṃ. Udakatumbakanti kuṇḍikaṃ.
analyzed: paribhoga bhājanam ti pānīya paribhojanīya ādi paribhoga yogyam bhājanam ārakaṇṭakanti sūci vijjhanaka kaṇṭakam pipphalikanti khuddaka satthakam udaka tumbakanti kuṇḍikam

original: Kūṭāgāradvāreyeva nivattesīti kūṭāgāraṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ pavattiyā okāsaṃ nādāsi.
analyzed: kūṭāgāra dvāreya iva nivattesi iti kūṭāgāram paviṭṭha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya tesam micchā vitakkānam pavattiyā okāsam na adāsi

original: 261. Kasiṇameva paññāyati mahāpurisassa tattha tattha katādhikārattā, tesañca padesānaṃ suparikammakatakasiṇasadisattā.
analyzed: kasiṇam eva paññāyati mahāpurisassa tattha tattha kata adhikāra ttā tesam ca padesānam su parikamma kata kasiṇa sadisa ttā

original: Caturāsītinagarasahassādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: catur āsīti nagara sahassa ādi vaṇṇanā

analyzed: āvaṭṭetvā ati ativisitvā yam yam raññaḥ icchitam dānu upakaraṇam ca iva bhogu upakaraṇam ca tassa tassa tathā iva samiddha bhāvam

original: Tena vuttaṃ “mā heva kho rājā”tiādi. Tenevāha “tassa kālaṅkiriyaṃ anicchamānā”tiādi.

analyzed: ārammaṇam etāya na vissajjeti iti apekkhā taṇhā

original: 267. Garahitāti ettha kehi garahitā, kasmā ca garahitāti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ vissajjento

analyzed: ekamantam gantvā ati rañño cakkhu patham vijahitvā

analyzed: brahma loka upagamana vaṇṇanā

analyzed: soṇassa ati koḷivīsassa soṇassa ekā bhattapātī iti ekam bhattavaḍḍhitakam tādisam bhattam ti tathārūpam garum madhuram siniddham bhattam bhuttānam iti bhuttavantānam

analyzed: dāsa manussā ati dāsā ca iva āyuttaka manussā ca

analyzed: viya a paññattika bhāvam gatā ati

original: Nātikiyādibyākaraṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: na ati kiyā ādi byākaraṇa vaṇṇanā

original: Purimesūti pāḷiyaṃ vutte sandhāyāha. Dasasuyevāti tesu eva dasasu janapadesu. Paricārake
analyzed: purimesu iti pāḷiyam vutte sandhāya āha tesu eva dasasu janapadesu paricārake

original: byākaroti byakātabbānaṃ bahūnaṃ tattha labbhanato. Nātike bhavā nātikiyā.
analyzed: byākaroti bya kātabbānam bahūnam tattha labbhanataḥ na atike bhavā na atikiyā

original: Niṭṭhaṅgatāti niṭṭhaṃ nicchayaṃ upagatā.
analyzed: niṭṭhaṅga tā ati niṭṭham nicchayam upagatā

original: Ānandaparikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ānanda parikathā vaṇṇanā

original: 276. Yasmā saṅghasuppaṭipatti nāma dhammasudhammatāya, dhammasudhammatā ca buddhasubuddhatāya,
analyzed: yasmai saṅgha suppaṭipatti nāma dhamma su dhamma tāya dhamma su dhamma tā ca buddha su buddha tāya

original: tasmā “aho dhammo, aho saṅgho”ti dhammasaṅghaguṇakittanāpi atthato buddhaguṇakittanā
analyzed: tasmai aho dhammaḥ aho saṅgho ti dhamma saṅgha guṇa kittanā api atthataḥ buddha guṇa kittanā

original: eva hotīti “bhagavantaṃ kittayamānarūpā”ti padassa “aho dhammo”tiādināpi attho vutto.
analyzed: eva hoti iti bhagavantam kittayamāna rūpā ti padassa aho dhammaḥ ti ādinā api atthaḥ vutto

original: 278. Ñāṇagatīti “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”tiādinā āgataṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa gatī iti pañcannam orambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam parikkhaya ati ādinā āgatam

original: pahātabbapahānavasena pavattaṃ maggañāṇagamanaṃ. Yasmā tassā eva ñāṇagatiyā vasena
analyzed: pahātabba pahāna vasena pavattam magga ñāṇa gamanam yasmā tassāḥ eva ñāṇa gatiyāḥ vasena

original: tassa tassa ariyapuggalassa opapātikatādiviseso, tasmā taṃ tādisaṃ tassa abhisamparāyaṃ
analyzed: tassa tassa ariya puggalassa opapātika tā ādi viseso tasmā tam tādisam tassa abhisamparāyam

original: sandhāyāha “ñāṇābhisamparāyamevā”ti.
analyzed: sandhāya āha ñāṇa abhisamparāyam eva iti

original: 279. Upasantaṃ pati sammati ālokīyatīti upasantapatiso. Upasantadassano upasantaussanno. Bhātirivāti ettha ra-kāro padasandhikaro, iva-saddo bhusatthoti āha “ativiya bhātī”ti.
analyzed: upasantam pati sammati ālokīyati iti upasantapatisaḥ upasantadassanaḥ upasantaussannaḥ bhātiḥ iva ati ettha rakāraḥ pada sandhi karaḥ iva saddaḥ bhu sattho ti āha ativiya bhāti iti

original: Janavasabhayakkhavaṇṇanā
280. Jeṭṭhakabhāvena jane vasabhasadisoti janavasabhoti assa devaputtassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
analyzed: jeṭṭhaka bhāvena jane vasabha sadisaḥ iti janavasabhaḥ iti assa devaputtassa nāmam ahosi

original: Ito devalokā cavitvā sattakkhattuṃ manussaloke rājabhūtassa. Manussalokā cavitvā
analyzed: itas deva lokā cavitvā sattakkhattum manussa loke rāja bhūtassa manussa lokā cavitvā

original: sattakkhattuṃ devabhūtassa. Etthevāti etasmiṃyeva cātumahārājikabhave, etthāpi vessavaṇassa sahabyatāvasena.
analyzed: sattakkhattum deva bhūtassa ettha iva ati etasmin yeva cātumahārājika bhave ettha api vessavaṇassa sahabya tā vasena

original: 281. Āsisanaṃ āsā, patthanā. Āsāsīsena cettha kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ vadati.
analyzed: āsisanam āsā patthanā āsā sīsena ca ittha kattu kamya tā kusala chandam vadati

original: Tenevāha “sakadāgāmimaggatthāyā”tiādi. Yadaggeti ettha agga-saddo ādipariyāyoti āha
analyzed: tena iva āha sakadāgāmi magga atthāya atiādi yat aggā iti ettha agga saddo ādi pariyāyo ti āha

original: “taṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā”ti. “Purimaṃ…pe… avinipāto”ti idaṃ yathā tattakaṃ kālaṃ sugatito
analyzed: tam divasam ādim katvā ati idam yathā tattakam kālam sugatitaḥ

original: sugatūpapattiyeva ahosi, tathā katūpacitakusalakammattā. Phussassa sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: sugata upapattiyā iva ahosi tathā katu upacita kusala kammattā phussassa sammāsambuddhassa

original: kālato pabhuti hi sambhatavivaṭṭūpanissayakusalasambhāro esa devaputto. Anacchariyanti
analyzed: kālataḥ pabhuti hi esa devaputto

original: anu anu acchariyaṃ. Tenāha “punappunaṃ acchariyamevā”ti. Sayaṃparisāyāti sakāya parisāya.
analyzed: anu anu acchariyam tena āha punappunam acchariyam eva ati sayaṃparisāya ati sakāya parisāya

original: Bhagavato diṭṭhasadisamevāti āvajjanasamanantaraṃ yathā te bhagavato catuvīsatisatasahassamattā
analyzed: bhagavataḥ diṭṭha sadisam eva ati āvajjana samanantaram yathā te bhagavataḥ catuvīsati sata sahassa mattā

analyzed: sattāḥ ñāṇa gatitaḥ diṭṭhāḥ evam tumhehi diṭṭha sadisam eva vessavaṇassa sammukhā sutam mayā iti vadati

original: Devasabhāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: deva sabhā vaṇṇanā

original: 282. Vassūpanāyikasaṅgahatthanti vassūpanāyikāya ārakkhāsaṃvidhānavasena bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: vassūpanāyika saṅgahattham ti vassūpanāyikāya ārakkhā saṃvidhāna vasena bhikkhūnam

original: saṅgahaṇatthaṃ “vassūpagatā bhikkhū evaṃ sukhena samaṇadhammaṃ karontī”ti, pavāraṇasaṅgaho
analyzed: saṅgahaṇa attham vassu upagatāḥ bhikkhū evam sukhena samaṇa dhammam karonti iti pavāraṇa saṅgaho

original: panassa pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarāmagge parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ.
analyzed: panassa pavāretvā satthu santikam gacchantānam bhikkhūnam antarāmagge parissaya pariharaṇa attham

original: Dhammassavanatthaṃ dūraṭṭhānaṃ gacchantesupi eseva nayo. Attanāpi āgantvā dhammassavanatthaṃ
analyzed: dhamma ssavana attham dūra ṭṭhānam gacchantesu pi esa iva nayaḥ attanā api āgantvā dhamma ssavana attham

original: sannipatiyeva. Etthetthāti ettha ettha ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: sannipatiyā iva ettha itthā ati ettha ettha vasanaṭṭhāne

original: Tadāpīti “purimāni bhante divasānī”ti vuttakālepi. Eteneva kāraṇenāti vassūpanāyikanimittameva.
analyzed: tadā api iti purimāni bhante divasāni iti vutta kāle pi etena iva kāraṇena ati vassūpanāyika nimittam eva

original: Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “tadahuposathe pannarase vassūpanāyikāyā”tiādi. Āsanepi nisajjāya
analyzed: tena āha pāḷiyam tadahu uposathe pannarase āsane pi nisajjāya

original: sudhammāya devasabhāya paṭhamaṃ devesu tāvatiṃsesu nisinnesu tassā catūsu dvāresu
analyzed: sudhammāya deva sabhāya paṭhamam devesu tāvatiṃsesu nisinnesu tassā catūsu dvāresu

original: cattāro mahārājāno nisīdanti, idaṃ nesaṃ āsane nisajjāya cārittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: cattāraḥ mahā rājānaḥ nisīdanti idam na īsam āsane nisajjāya cārittam hoti

original: Yenatthenāti yena kiccena yena payojanena. Ārakkhatthanti ārakkhabhūtamatthaṃ. Vuttaṃ vacanaṃ etesanti vuttavacanā, mahārājāno.
analyzed: yena atthena ati yena kiccena yena payojanena ārakkha attham ti ārakkha bhūtam attham vuttam vacanam etesan ti vutta vacanāḥ mahā rājāno

original: 283. Atikkamitvāti abhibhavitvā.
analyzed: atikkamitvā iti abhibhavitvā

original: Sanaṅkumārakathāvaṇṇanā
284. Abhisambhavituṃ adhigantuṃ asakkuṇeyyo anabhisambhavanīyo. Tenāha “appattabbo”tiādi.
analyzed: abhisambhavitum adhigantum a sakkuṇeyyaḥ an abhisambhavanīyaḥ tena āha appattabba utiādi

original: Cakkhuyeva patho rūpadassanassa maggo upāyoti cakkhupatho, tasmiṃ cakkhupathasminti
analyzed: cakkhuyā iva pathaḥ rūpa dassanassa maggaḥ upāyaḥ ti cakkhu pathaḥ tasmin cakkhu pathasmin ti

analyzed: heṭṭhā heṭṭhā na cātumahārājikataḥ paṭṭhāya na api brahmapārisajjataḥ paṭṭhāya cātumahārājikā

original: hi tāvatiṃsānaṃ yathā jātirūpāni passituṃ sakkonti, tathā brahmāno heṭṭhimā uparimāna”nti
analyzed: hi tāvatiṃsānam yathā jāti rūpāni passitum sakkonti tathā brahmānaḥ heṭṭhimāḥ uparimānanti

original: sakkonti, māpitameva passituṃ sakkontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: sakkonti māpitam eva passitum sakkonti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Suṇantova niddaṃ okkamīti gatiyo upadhārento bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedena saṅkocaṃ āpannacittatāya. Mayhaṃ ayyakassāti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.
analyzed: suṇantaḥ iva niddam okkamīti gatiyaḥ upadhārentaḥ bahi visaṭa vitakka vicchedena saṅkocam āpanna citta tāya mayham ayyakassa ati bhagavantam sandhāya vadati

original: Pañca sikhā etassāti pañcasikho, pañcasikho viya pañcasikhoti āha “pañcasikhagandhabbasadiso”ti. Mamāyantīti piyāyanti.
analyzed: pañca sikhāḥ etassa ati pañca sikho pañca sikhaḥ viya pañca sikhaḥ iti āha pañca sikha gandhabba sadisaḥ iti mamāyanti iti piyāyanti

original: 285. Sumuttoti saradosehi suṭṭhu mutto. Yehi pittasemhādīhi palibuddhattā saro avissaṭṭho
analyzed: su muttaḥ ti sara dosehi suṭṭhu muttaḥ yehi pitta semha ādīhi palibuddha ttā saraḥ a vissaṭṭhaḥ

original: siyā, tadabhāvato vissaṭṭhoti dassento āha “apalibuddho”ti. Viññāpetīti viññeyyo,
analyzed: siyā tad abhāvataḥ vissaṭṭhaḥ ti dassentaḥ āha apalibuddhaḥ ti viññāpeti iti viññeyyaḥ

original: antogadhahetuattho kattusādhano esa viññeyyasaddoti āha “atthaviññāpano”ti. Sarassa
analyzed: antar gadha hetu attho kattu sādhano esa viññeyya saddo ti āha attha viññāpanaḥ ti sarassa

original: madhuratā nāma maddavanti āha “madhuro mudū”ti. Savanaṃ arahatīti savanīyo. Savanārahatāya
analyzed: madhuratā nāma āha madhuraḥ savanam arahati iti savanīyaḥ savana arahatāya

original: ca āpāthasukhatāyāti āha “kaṇṇasukho”ti. Bindūti piṇḍito. Ākoṭitabhinnakaṃsasaddo
analyzed: ca āpātha sukhatāya iti āha kaṇṇa sukho ti bindu iti piṇḍitaḥ ākoṭita bhinna kaṃsa saddaḥ

original: viya anekāvayavo ahutvā niravayavo, ekabhāvoti attho. Tenāha “ekagghano”ti, etenevassa
analyzed: aneka avayavaḥ a hutvā niravayavaḥ eka bhāvaḥ ti attho tena āha ekagghanaḥ ti etena iva assa

original: avisāritā saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā. Gambhīruppattiṭṭhānatāya cassa gambhīratāti āha “nābhimūlato”tiādi.
analyzed: a visāritā saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā gambhīra uppatti ṭṭhāna tāya ca ssa gambhīra tā iti āha nābhi mūlataḥ tiādi

original: Evaṃ samuṭṭhitoti jīvhādippahāramattasamuṭṭhito. Amadhuro ca hoti uppattiṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: evam samuṭṭhitaḥ ti jīvhā ādi ppahāra matta samuṭṭhitaḥ amadhuraḥ ca hoti uppatti ṭṭhānānam

original: parilahubhāvato. Na ca dūraṃ sāveti vīrabhāvābhāvato. Ninnādī suvipulabhāvato savisesaṃ
analyzed: parilahu bhāvataḥ na ca dūram vīra bhāva abhāvataḥ ninna ādī su vipula bhāvataḥ sa visesam

original: ninnādo, pāsaṃsaninnādo vā. Tenāha “mahāmegha…pe… yutto”ti.
analyzed: ninnādaḥ pāsaṃsa ninnādaḥ vā tena āha mahā meghape yuttā iti

original: Pacchimaṃ pacchimanti dutiyaṃ, catutthaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ, aṭṭhamañca padaṃ. Purimassa purimassāti
analyzed: pacchimam pacchimanti dutiyam catuttham chaṭṭham aṭṭhamam ca padam purimassa purimassa ati

original: yathākkamaṃ paṭhamassa, tatiyassa, pañcamassa, sattamassa ca. Atthoyevāti atthaniddeso
analyzed: yathākkamam paṭhamassa tatiyassa pañcamassa sattamassa ca attho yeva ati attha niddeso

original: eva. Vissaṭṭhatā hissa viññeyyatāya veditabbā, mañjubhāvo savanīyatāya, bindubhāvo

original: avisāritāya, gambhīrabhāvo ninnāditāyāti. Yathāparisanti ettha yathā-saddo parimāṇavācī,
analyzed: a visāritāya gambhīra bhāvaḥ ninnāditāya ati ettha yathā saddaḥ parimāṇa vācī

original: na pakārādivācīti āha “yattakā parisā”ti, tena parisappamāṇaṃ evassa saro niccharati,
analyzed: na pakāra ādi vāci iti āha yattakā parisāti tena parisappamāṇam evassa saraḥ niccharati

original: ayamassa dhammatāti dasseti. Tenāha “tattakamevā”tiādi.
analyzed: ayam assa dhamma tā ti dasseti tena āha tattakam eva atiādi

original: “Ye hi kecī”tiādi “yāvañca so bhagavā”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa hetukittanavasena
analyzed: ye hi keci itiādi yāvat ca saḥ bhagavā ati ādinā vuttassa atthassa hetu kittana vasena

original: samatthanaṃ saraṇesu nesaṃ niccasevanena, sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena chakāmasaggasampattianuppādanato.
analyzed: samatthanam saraṇesu nesam nicca sevanena sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena cha kāma sagga sampatti an uppādanato

original: Tenāha “ye hi keci…pe… vadatī”ti. Nibbematikagahitasaraṇeti maggenāgatasaraṇagamane.
analyzed: tena āha ye hi vadati iti maggena āgata saraṇa gamane

original: Te hi sabbaso samugghātitavicikicchatāya ratanattaye aveccappasādena samannāgatāyeva,
analyzed: te hi sabbaso samugghātita vicikicchatāya rata nattaye avecca ppasādena samannāgatāya iva

original: pothujjanikasaddhāya vasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ogāhetvā jānanti, aparaneyyabuddhino
analyzed: pothujjanika saddhāya vasena buddha ādīnam guṇe ogāhetvā jānanti aparaneyya buddhinaḥ

original: te pariyāyato nibbematikagahitasaraṇā veditabbā. Gandhabbadevagaṇanti gandhabbadevasamūhaṃ.
analyzed: te pariyāyataḥ nibbematika gahita saraṇāḥ veditabbāḥ gandhabba deva gaṇanti gandhabba deva samūham

original: Tukā vuccati khīriṇī yā tukātipi vuccati. Tassā cuṇṇaṃ tukāpiṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ koṭṭetvā
analyzed: tukā vuccati khīriṇī yā tukā atipi vuccati tassā cuṇṇam tukā piṭṭham tam koṭṭetvā

original: Bhāvitaiddhipādavaṇṇanā
analyzed: bhāvita aiddhipāda vaṇṇanā

original: samijjhanaṭṭhena, nippajjanassa kāraṇabhāvenāti attho. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
analyzed: samijjhana ṭṭhena nippajjanassa kāraṇa bhāvena ati attho patiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena ati adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: Iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo, iddhiyā adhigamupāyoti attho. Tena hi yasmā uparūpari visesasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: iddhiyā pādo ti iddhipādaḥ iddhiyā adhigama upāyo ti attho tena hi yasmai upari upari visesa saṅkhātam

original: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā “pādo”ti vuccati. Ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nippajjatīti

original: attho. Iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Evaṃ tāva “cattāro iddhipādā”ti
analyzed: attho iddhi eva pādaḥ iddhipādo iddhi koṭṭhāso ti attho evam tāva cattāro iddhipādā ti

original: ettha attho veditabbo. Iddhipahonakatāyāti iddhiyā nipphādane samatthabhāvāya. Iddhivisavitāyāti
analyzed: ettha atthaḥ veditabbaḥ iddhi pahonaka tāya ati iddhiyāḥ nipphādane samattha bhāvāya iddhi visavi tāya ati

original: iddhiyā nipphādane yogyabhāvāya. Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ yogyattho vi-pubbo su-saddo,
analyzed: iddhiyāḥ nipphādane yogya bhāvāya aneka attha ttā hi dhātūnam yogya tthaḥ vipubbaḥ su saddaḥ

original: visavanaṃ vā pajjanaṃ visavitā, tattha kāmakāritā visavitā. Tenāha “punappuna”ntiādi.
analyzed: visavanam vā pajjanam visavitā tattha kāma kāri tā visavitā tena āha punappunantiādi

analyzed: chandam ca bhikkhu adhipatim karitvā labhati samādhim labhati cittassa ekagga tam

original: 292. Kāraṇassa ekarūpattā imāni pana padānīti na kevalaṃ “tayidaṃ brahmacariya”ntiādīni padāni, atha kho “imamatthaṃ janavasabho yakkho”tiādīni padāni pīti.

original: Janavasabhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
6. Mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanā
293. Pañcakuṇḍalikoti vissaṭṭhapañcaveṇiko. Catumaggaṭṭhānesūti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ

analyzed: yāva khattiyā khattiye avadhim katvā sabbe deva manussā iti adhippāyaḥ tena āha khattiyā

analyzed: assa ati phalassa tanti kāraṇam dvinnam pi ekatas uppattiyā kāraṇam natthi pageva

original: tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ vāti. “Ettha cā”tiādi “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti vuttalokadhātuyā pamāṇaparicchedadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: tiṇṇam catunnam vā ti ettha ca atiādi ekissā lokadhātuyā ati vutta lokadhātuyā pamāṇa pariccheda dassana tham āraddham

original: Yāvatāti yattakena ṭhānena. Pariharantīti sineruṃ parikkhipantā parivattanti. Disāti
analyzed: yāvatā iti yattakena ṭhānena pariharanti iti sinerum parikkhipantā parivattanti disā ti

original: disāsu, bhummatthe etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Bhanti dibbanti. Virocanāti obhāsantā, virocanā
analyzed: disāsu bhumma tthe etam paccattavacanam bhanti dibbanti virocanā ati obhāsantā virocanā

original: vā sobhamānā candimasūriyā bhanti, tato eva disā ca bhanti. Tāva sahassadhāti tattako sahassaloko.
analyzed: vā candima sūriyāḥ bhanti tatas eva disā ca bhanti tāva sahassa dhāti tattako sahassa loko

original: Ettakanti imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā imināva saddhiṃ cakkavāḷaṃ dasasahassaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāpadānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Na paññāyatīti tīsu piṭakesu anāgatattā.
analyzed: ettakam ti imam cakkavāḷam majjhe katvā iminā ava saddhim cakkavāḷam dasa sahassam yat pana ittha vattabbam tat mahāpadāna vaṇṇanāyam vuttam eva na paññāyati iti tīsu piṭakesu anāgata ttā

original: Sanaṅkumārakathāvaṇṇanā
300. Vaṇṇenāti rūpasampattiyā. Suviññeyyattā taṃ anāmasitvā yasasaddasseva atthamāha. Alaṅkāraparivārenāti alaṅkārena ca parivārena ca. Puññasiriyāti puññiddhiyā.
analyzed: vaṇṇena ati rūpa sampattiyā su viññeyya ttā tam a nāmasitvā yasa saddassa iva attham āha alaṅkāra parivārena ati alaṅkārena ca parivārena ca puñña siriyā ati puññiddhiyā

original: 301. Sampasādaneti sampasādajanane. Saṃpubbo khā-saddo jānanattho “saṅkhāyetaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu viyāti āha “jānitvā modāmā”ti.
analyzed: sampasādane iti sampasāda janane saṃpubbaḥ khā saddaḥ jānana atthaḥ saṅkhāya itam paṭisevati itiādīsu viya iti āha jānitvā modāma iti

original: Govindabrāhmaṇavatthuvaṇṇanā
304. Yāva dīgharattanti yāva parimāṇato, aparimitakālaparidīpanametanti āha “ettakanti…pe…
analyzed: yāva yāva parimāṇataḥ aparimita kāla paridīpanam etat ti āha

original: aticiraratta”nti. Mahāpaññova so bhagavāti tena brahmunā anumatipucchāvasena devānaṃ
analyzed: mahā paññā uva so bhagavā iti tena brahmunā anumati pucchā vasena devānam

original: vuttanti dassento “mahāpaññova so bhagavā. Noti kathaṃ tumhe maññathā”ti āha. Sayamevetaṃ
analyzed: vuttanti dassento mahā paññaḥ eva so bhagavā no ti katham tumhe maññatha ati āha sayam eva etam

original: pañhaṃ byākātukāmo “bhūtapubbaṃ bho”ti ādiṃ āhāti sambandho. Evaṃ pana byākarontena
analyzed: pañham byākātu kāmaḥ bhūta pubbam bho ti ādim āha ati sambandhaḥ evam pana byākarontena

original: atthato ayampi attho vutto nāma hotīti dassento “anacchariyameta”nti ādimāha. Tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: atthataḥ ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ nāma hoti iti dassentaḥ anacchariyam etat ti ādim āha tiṇṇam

original: mārānanti kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamārānaṃ. “Anacchariyameta”nti vuttamevatthaṃ
analyzed: kilesa abhisaṅkhāra devaputta mārānam anat śariyam etat ti vuttam evattham

original: nigamanavasena “kimettha acchariya”nti punapi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nigamana vasena kim ettha acchariyan ti puna api vuttam

original: Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaatthānaṃ puro dhānato pure pure saṃvidhānato purohitoti
analyzed: raññaḥ diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika atthānam puras dhānataḥ pure pure saṃvidhānataḥ purohito ti

original: āha “sabbakiccāni anusāsanapurohito”ti. Govindiyābhisekenāti govindassa ṭhāne ṭhapanābhisekena.
analyzed: āha sabba kiccāni anusāsana purohito ti govindiya abhisekena ati govindassa ṭhāne ṭhapana abhisekena

original: Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ. Jotitattāti āvudhānaṃ
analyzed: tam kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kula paramparā gatam ṭhāna antaram

original: jotitattā. Pālanasamatthatāyāti rañño, aparimitassa ca sattakāyassa anatthato paripālanasamatthatāya.
analyzed: jotita ttā pālana samattha tāya ati raññaḥ aparimitassa ca satta kāyassa anatthataḥ paripālana samattha tāya

original: Sammā vossajjitvāti suṭṭhu tassevāgāravabhāvena vissajjitvā niyyātetvā. Taṃ tamatthaṃ kiccaṃ passatīti atthadaso.
analyzed: sammā vossajjitvā ti suṭṭhu tassa iva āgāra va bhāvena vissajjitvā niyyātetvā tam tam attham kiccam passati iti attha daso

original: 305. Bhavanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ bhavo, bhavati etenāti vā bhavo, vaḍḍhikāraṇaṃ sandhivasena
analyzed: bhavanam vaḍḍhanam bhavaḥ bhavati etena ati vā bhavaḥ vaḍḍhi kāraṇam sandhi vasena

original: ma-kārāgamo, o-kārassa ca a-kārādesaṃ katvā “bhavamatthū”ti vuttaṃ. Bhavantaṃ jotipālanti
analyzed: makāra āgamaḥ okārassa ca akāra ādesam katvā vuttam bhavantam jotipālanti

original: pana sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha “bhoto”ti. Mā paccabyāhāsīti mā paṭikkhipīti
analyzed: pana sāmi atthe upayoga vacananti āha bhoto ti mā paccabyāhāsi iti mā paṭikkhipi iti

original: attho. So pana paṭikkhepo paṭivacanaṃ hotīti āha “mā paṭibyāhāsī”ti. Abhisambhosīti
analyzed: atthaḥ saḥ pana paṭikkhepaḥ paṭivacanam hoti iti āha mā paṭibyāhāsi iti abhisambhosi iti

original: kammantānaṃ saṃvidhāne samattho hotīti āha “saṃvidahitvā”ti. Bhavābhavaṃ, paññañca
analyzed: kammantānam saṃvidhāne samatthaḥ hoti iti āha saṃvidahitvā iti bhava abhavam paññam ca

original: vindi paṭilabhīti govindo, mahanto govindo mahāgovindo. “Go”ti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ
analyzed: vindi paṭilabhi iti govindaḥ mahantaḥ govindaḥ mahāgovindaḥ go ti hi paññāyetam adhivacanam

original: gacchati atthe bujjhatīti.
analyzed: gacchati atthe bujjhati iti

original: Rajjasaṃvibhajanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: rajja saṃvibhajana vaṇṇanā

original: 306. Ekapitikā vemātukā kaniṭṭhabhātaro. Ayaṃ abhisittoti ayaṃ reṇu rājakumāro pitu accayena rajje abhisitto. Rājakārakāti rājaputtaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetāro.
analyzed: eka pitikā vemātukā kaniṭṭha bhātaraḥ ayam abhisittaḥ iti ayam reṇu rāja kumāro pitu accayena rajje abhisittaḥ rāja kārakā ati rāja puttam rajje patiṭṭhāpetāro

original: 307. Madentīti madanīyāti kattusādhanataṃ dassento “madakarā”ti āha. Madakaraṇaṃ pana pamādassa visesakāraṇanti vuttaṃ “pamādakarā”ti.
analyzed: madenti iti madanīyā ati kattu sādhanatam dassentaḥ mada karā iti āha mada karaṇam pana pamādassa visesa kāraṇanti vuttam pamāda karā ti

original: 308. Reṇussa rajjasamīpe dasagāvutamattavitthatāni hutvā aparabhāge tiyojanasataṃ vitthatattā sabbāni cha rajjāni sakaṭamukhāni paṭṭhapesi. Vitānasadisaṃ caturassabhāvato.
analyzed: reṇussa rajja samīpe dasa gāvuta matta vitthatāni hutvā apara bhāge ti yojana satam vitthata ttā sabbāni cha rajjāni sakaṭa mukhāni paṭṭhapesi vitāna sadisam catur assa bhāvato

original: 310. Sahāti gāthāya padaparipūraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa atthaṃ dassento “teneva sahā”ti
analyzed: saha iti gāthāya pada paripūraṇa attham vuttam tassa attham dassento tena iva saha iti

original: āha. Sahāti vā avinābhāvatthe nipāto, so saha āsuṃ satta bhāradhāti yojetabbo, tena
analyzed: āha saha iti vā a vinābhāva atthe nipātaḥ saḥ saha āsum satta bhāradhā ti yojetabbaḥ tena

original: te desantare vasantā vicittena sahabhāvino avinābhāvinoti dīpeti. Rajjabhāraṃ dhārenti
analyzed: te desantare vasantā vicittena sahabhāvinaḥ avinābhāvinaḥ iti dīpe iti rajja bhāram dhārenti

original: attani āropenti vahantīti bhāradhā.
analyzed: āropenti vahanti iti bhāradhā

original: Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kittisaddaabbhuggamanavaṇṇanā

analyzed: anupurohite ṭhapesi iti anupurohite katvā ṭhapesi anupurohite vā ṭhāne ṭhapesi

original: Tisavanaṃ karonte sandhāya “divasassa tikkhattu”nti vuttaṃ. Dvīsu sandhīsu savanaṃ
analyzed: ti savanam karonte sandhāya divasassa tikkhattum ti vuttam dvīsu sandhīsu savanam

original: pāpetvā nhātakālato pabhuti.
analyzed: nhāta kālataḥ

original: 312. Abhiuggacchīti uṭṭhahi udapādi. Acintetvāti “kathaṃ kho ahaṃ brahmunā saddhiṃ

original: manteyya”nti acintetvā evaṃ cittampi anuppādetvā. Tena samāgamanasseva abhāvato amantetvā.
analyzed: manteyyanti a cintetvā evam cittam pi an uppādetvā tena samāgamanassa iva abhāvataḥ a mantetvā

original: Taṃ disvāti taṃ karuṇābrahmavihārabhāvanaṃ brahmadassanūpāyaṃ disvā ñāṇacakkhunā.
analyzed: tam disvā ati tam karuṇā brahmavihāra bhāvanam brahma dassana upāyam disvā ñāṇa cakkhunā

original: 313. Evanti evaṃ rañño ārocetvā paṭisallānaṃ upagate. Sabbatthāti sabbesu channaṃ
analyzed: evam ti evam raññaḥ ārocetvā paṭisallānam upagate sabbattha ati sabbesu channam

analyzed: khattiyānam sattannam brāhmaṇa mahāsālānam sattannam nāṭaka satānam cattārīsāya

original: ca bhariyānaṃ āpucchanavāresu.
analyzed: ca bhariyānam āpucchana vāresu

original: 316. Sādisiyoti jātiyā sādisiyoti āha “samavaṇṇā samajātikā”ti.
analyzed: sādisiyā iti jātiyā sādisiyā iti āha sama vaṇṇā sama jātikā iti

analyzed: jhāna manasikārena bahi cittassa santhambhanam

original: agāraṃ, jhānasālanti attho. Gahitāvāti bhāvanānuyogena mahāsattena attano cittasantāne
analyzed: agāram jhāna sālanti atthaḥ bhāvanā anuyogena mahāsattena citta santāne

analyzed: uppādana vasena gahitā eva natthi jhānena iva vikkhambhita ttā visesataḥ hi ssa karuṇāya

original: bhāvitattā anabhirati ukkaṇṭhanā natthi, mettāya bhāvitattā bhayaparitassanā natthi.
analyzed: bhāvita ttā anabhirati ukkaṇṭhanā natthi mettāya bhāvita ttā bhaya paritassanā natthi

original: Ukkaṇṭhanāti pana brahmadassane ussukkaṃ, paritassanāti tadabhipatthanāti āha “brahmuno panā”tiādi.
analyzed: ukkaṇṭhanā ati pana brahma dassane ussukkam paritassanā ati tad abhipatthanā ati āha brahmuno pana atiādi

original: Brahmunāsākacchāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: brahmu nāsā kaccha vaṇṇanā

original: 318. Cittutrāsoti cittassa utrāsanamattaṃ. Kathanti sattanikāyanivāsaṭṭhānanāmagottādīnaṃ vasena kena pakārena. Tenāha “ki”ntiādi.
analyzed: citta utrāsaḥ ti cittassa kathanti satta nikāya nivāsa ṭhāna nāma gotta ādīnam vasena kena pakārena tena āha kintiādi

original: Soti ye te panakanasanantabandhasatanasanaṅkumārakālanāmakā loke pākaṭā paññātā brahmāno, tesu sanaṅkumāro nāmāhanti dasseti.
analyzed: so ti ye te panakana sanantabandha satana sanaṅkumāra kāla nāmakā loke pākaṭā paññātā brahmāno tesu sanaṅkumāraḥ nāma ahanti dasseti

original: Agghanti garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ dātabbaṃāhāraṃ. Madhusākanti madhurāhāraṃ, yaṃ kiñci atithino
analyzed: agghanti garuṭṭhā niyānam dātabbaṃāhāram madhusākanti madhura āhāram yam kiñci atithino

analyzed: dātabbam āhāram upacāra vasena evam vadati tena āha madhu sākam pucchāma ati

original: nimantanavasena pucchāma.
analyzed: nimantana vasena pucchāma

original: 319. Mahāsatto cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhitopi tesu “brahmasahabyatāya maggo”ti
analyzed: mahāsatto cattāraḥ brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhitaḥ api tesu brahma sahabya tāya maggoti

original: anibbematikatāya “kaṅkhī”ti avoca. Keci pana “tapokammena parikkhīṇasarīratāya, brahmasamāgamena
analyzed: a nibbematika tāya avoca keci pana tapo kammena parikkhīṇa sarīra tāya brahma samāgamena

original: bhayādisamuppattiyā ca paṭiladdhamattehi brahmavihārehi parihīno ahosi, tasmā avikkhambhitavicikicchatāya
analyzed: bhaya ādi samuppattiyā ca paṭiladdha mattehi brahmavihārehi parihīnaḥ ahosi tasmai a vikkhambhita vicikiccha tāya

original: ‘kaṅkhī’ti avocā”ti vadanti. Parassa vediyā viditā paravediyā, te pana tassa pākaṭā
analyzed: kaṅkhi iti avoca ati vadanti parassa vediyā viditā paravediyā te pana tassa pākaṭā

original: vibhūtāti āha “parassa pākaṭesu paravediyesū”ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “parena sayaṃ
analyzed: vibhūtā iti āha parassa pākaṭesu para vediyesu iti tattha kāraṇam āha parena sayam

original: abhisaṅkhatattā”ti. Mamāti kammaṃ mamaṃkāro, mamattanti āha “idaṃ mama…pe… taṇha”nti.
analyzed: mama ati kammam mamaṃkāraḥ āha idam mamape taṇhanti

original: “Mama”nti karoti etenāti hi mamaṃkāro, tathāpavattā taṇhā. Manujesūti niddhāraṇe
analyzed: karoti etena ati hi mamaṃkāro tathā pavattā taṇhā manujesu iti niddhāraṇe

original: bhummaṃ, na visayeti āha “manujesu yo kocī”ti. “Ekodibhūto”ti padassa bhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: bhummam na visaya iti āha manujesu yaḥ koci iti eka udi bhūtaḥ iti padassa bhāva attham

original: tāva dassento “ekībhūto”ti vatvā puna taṃ vivaranto “eko tiṭṭhanto eko nisīdanto”ti
analyzed: tāva dassento ekībhūto ti vatvā puna tam vivaranto ekaḥ tiṭṭhanto ekaḥ nisīdanto ti

original: āha. Tādisoti eko hutvā pavattanako. Bhūtoti jāto. Jhāne adhimutti nāma tasmiṃ nibbattite,
analyzed: āha tādisaḥ iti ekaḥ hutvā pavattanakaḥ bhūtoti jātaḥ jhāne adhimutti nāma tasmin nibbattite

original: anibbattite kuto adhimuttīti āha “jhānaṃ nibbattetvāti attho”ti. Vissagandho nāma
analyzed: a nibbattite kutas adhimutti iti āha jhānam nibbattetvā ati attho ti vissagandhaḥ nāma

original: kodhādikilesaparibhāvanāti tesaṃ vikkhambhanena vissagandhavirahito. Etesu dhammesūti
analyzed: kodha ādi kilesa paribhāvanā ati tesam vikkhambhanena vissa gandha virahitaḥ etesu dhammesu

original: pabbajjānaṃ vivekavāsakaruṇābrahmavihārādidhammesu.
analyzed: pabbajjānam viveka vāsa karuṇā brahmavihāra ādi dhammesu

original: 320. Avidvāti na viditavā. Āvaritāti kusalānaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ uppattinivāraṇena
analyzed: avidvā iti na viditavā āvaritā ati kusalānam uttari manussa dhammānam uppatti nivāraṇena

original: āvaritā. Pūtikāti byāpannacittatādinā pūtibhūtā. Kilesavasena duggandhaṃ vissagandhaṃ
analyzed: āvaritā pūtikā ati byāpanna citta tā ādinā pūti bhūtā kilesa vasena duggandham vissa gandham

original: vāyati. Nirayādiapāyesu nibbattanasīlatāya āpāyikāti āha “apāyūpagā”ti. Corādīhi
analyzed: vāyati niraya ādi apāyesu nibbattana sīla tāya āpāyikā iti āha apāyu upagā iti cora ādīhi

original: upaddutassa pavisitukāmassa pākārakavāṭaparikhādīhi viya nagaraṃ kodhādīhi nivuto
analyzed: upaddutassa pavisitu kāmassa pākāra kavāṭa parikhā ādīhi viya nagaram kodha ādīhi

original: pihito brahmaloko assāti nivutabrahmaloko. Pucchati “kenāvaṭā”ti vadanto.

original: Musāvādova mosavajjaṃ yathā bhisakkameva bhesajjaṃ. Kujjhanaṃ dussanaṃ. Diṭṭhādīsu
analyzed: musāvādaḥ uva mosavajjam yathā bhisakkam eva bhesajjam kujjhanam dussanam diṭṭha ādīsu

original: adiṭṭhādivāditāvasena paresaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ paravisaṃvādanaṃ. Sadisaṃ patirūpaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: a diṭṭha ādi vādi tā vasena paresam visaṃvādanam para visaṃvādanam sadisam patirūpam dassetvā

original: palobhanaṃ sadisaṃ dassetvā vañcanaṃ. Mittānaṃ vihiṃsanaṃ mettibhedo mittadubbhanaṃ.
analyzed: palobhanam sadisam dassetvā vañcanam mittānam vihiṃsanam metti bhedaḥ mitta dubbhanam

original: Daḷhamaccharitā thaddhamacchariyaṃ. Attani vijjamānaṃ nihīnataṃ, sadisataṃ vā atikkamitvā
analyzed: daḷhamaccharitā thaddhamacchariyam attani vijjamānam nihīna tam sadisa tam vai atikkamitvā

original: maññanaṃ. Paresaṃ sampattiyā asahanaṃ khīyanaṃ. Attasampattiyā nigūhanavasena, parehi
analyzed: maññanam paresam sampattiyāḥ asahanam khīyanam atta sampattiyāḥ nigūhana vasena parehi

original: sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanavasena ca vividhā icchā ruci etassāti vivicchā. Kadariyatāya
analyzed: ca vividhā icchā ruci vivicchā kadariya tāya

original: mudukaṃ macchariyaṃ. Yattha katthacīti sakasantake, parasantake, hīnātike cāti yattha
analyzed: mudukam macchariyam yattha katthaci iti saka santake para santake hīna atike ca ati yattha

original: evamāha, punapi evamāhā”ti, andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “evaṃ petā
analyzed: evam āha puna api evam āha ati andhakāram paviṭṭhāḥ viya honti tasmā vuttam evam petā

original: devatā na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhitu”nti. Yathādhammadesanāyaṃ pana kathetukamyatāvasena
analyzed: devatāḥ na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhitunti yathā dhamma desanā ayam pana kathetu kamya tā vasena

original: pucchanena sammoho hotīti. Sūriyo uggatoti āha devasaṅgho āsannatarabhāvena obhāsassa
analyzed: pucchanena sammohaḥ hoti iti sūriyaḥ uggataḥ ti āha deva saṅghaḥ āsannatara bhāvena obhāsassa

original: vipulauḷārabhāvato. Ekissā lokadhātuyāti sutte āgatanayena sabbattheva pana apubbaṃ
analyzed: vipula oḷāra bhāvataḥ ekissā lokadhātuyā ati sutte āgata nayena sabbattha iva pana apubbam

original: acarimaṃ dve buddhā na honteva. Tenevāha – “anantāsu…pe… addasā”ti.
analyzed: acarimam dve buddhāḥ na honta iva tena iva āha

original: Gāthāyaṃ pucchāmīti nimmitabuddho bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ okāsaṃ kārāpesi. Muninti
analyzed: gāthāyam pucchāmi iti nimmita buddhaḥ bhagavantam pucchitum okāsam kārāpesi munin ti

original: buddhamuniṃ. Pahūtapaññanti mahāpaññaṃ. Tiṇṇanti caturoghatiṇṇaṃ. Pāraṅgatanti nibbānappattaṃ,
analyzed: buddha munim pahūta paññam ti mahā paññam tiṇṇam ti catur ogha tiṇṇam pāraṅgatam nibbāna ppattam

original: sabbassa vā ñeyyassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gataṃ. Parinibbutaṃ saupādisesanibbānavasena.
analyzed: sabbassa vā ñeyyassa pāram pariyantam gatam parinibbutam sa aupādisesa nibbāna vasena

original: Ṭhitattanti avaṭṭhitacittaṃ lokadhammehi akampaneyyatāya. Nikkhamma gharā panujja
analyzed: ṭhitattam ti avaṭṭhita cittam loka dhammehi akampaneyya tāya nikkhamma gharā panujja

original: kāmeti vatthukāme panūditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma. Kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyāti
analyzed: kāmeti vatthu kāme panūditvā ghara āvāsā nikkhamma katham bhikkhu sammā saḥ loke paribbajeyya ati

original: so bhikkhu kathaṃ sammā paribbajeyya gaccheyya vihareyya, anupalitto hutvā lokaṃ
analyzed: so bhikkhu katham sammā paribbajeyya gaccheyya vihareyya an upalittaḥ hutvā lokaṃ

original: atikkameyyāti attho.
analyzed: atikkameyya ati attho

original: 334. Silokaṃ anukassāmīti ettha siloko nāma pādasamudayo, isīhi vuccamānā gāthātipi
analyzed: silokam anukassāmi iti ettha silokaḥ nāma pāda samudayaḥ isīhi vuccamānā

original: vuccati. Pādova niyatavaṇṇānupubbikānaṃ padānaṃ samūho, taṃ silokaṃ anukassāmi pavattayissāmīti
analyzed: vuccati pādaḥ uva niyata vaṇṇa ānupubbikānam padānam samūhaḥ tam silokam anukassāmi pavattayissāmi iti

original: atthoti āha “akkhara…pe… pavattayissāmī”ti. Yatthāti adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ. Āmeḍitalopenāyaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ iti āha akkharape pavattayissāmi iti yattha ati adhikaraṇe bhummam āma īḍita lopena ayam

original: niddesoti āha “yesu yesu ṭhānesū”ti. Bhummāti bhūmipaṭibaddhanivāsā. Taṃ taṃ nissitā
analyzed: niddeso ti āha yesu yesu ṭhānesu iti bhummā ati bhūmi paṭibaddha nivāsā tam tam nissitā

original: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ nissitavanto nissāya vasamānā, tehi saddhiṃ silokaṃ anukassāmīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tam tam ṭhānam nissitavantaḥ nissāya vasamānā tehi saddhim si lokam anukassāmi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: “Ye sitā girigabbhara”nti iminā tesaṃ vivekavāsaṃ dasseti, “pahitattā samāhitā”ti
analyzed: ye sitāḥ iminā tesam viveka vāsam dasseti pahita ttā samāhitā ti

original: iminā bhāvanābhiyogaṃ.
analyzed: iminā bhāvanā abhiyogam

original: Bahujanā pañcasatasaṅkhyattā. Paṭipakkhābhibhavanato, tejussadatāya ca sīhā viya
analyzed: bahujanā pañca sata saṅkhya tā paṭipakkha abhibhavanato tejussada tāya ca sīhāḥ

original: pavivittatāya nilīnā. Ekattanti ekībhāvaṃ. Odātacittā hutvā suddhāti arahattamaggādhigamena
analyzed: nilīnāḥ ekattanti ekībhāvam odāta cittāḥ hutvā suddhā ati arahatta magga adhigamena

original: pariyodātacittā hutvā suddhā, na kevalaṃ sarīrasuddhiyāva. Vippasannāti ariyamaggappasādena
analyzed: pariyodāta cittā hutvā suddhā na kevalam vippasannā ati ariya magga ppasādena

original: visesato pasannā. Cittassa āvilabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena anāvilā.
analyzed: visesataḥ pasannā cittassa āvila bhāva karānam kilesānam abhāvena anāvilā

original: Bhikkhū jānitvāti bhinnakilese bhikkhū “ime dibbacakkhunā ete devakāye passantīti
analyzed: bhikkhū jānitvā ti bhinna kilese bhikkhū ime dibba cakkhunā ete deva kāye passanti iti

original: jānitvā. Savanante jātattāti dhammassavanapariyosāne ariyajātiyā jātattā. Idaṃ sabbanti
analyzed: jānitvā savana ante jāta ttā ati dhammassavana pariyosāne ariya jātiyā jāta ttā idam sabbanti

original: idaṃ “bhiyyo pañcasate”tiādikaṃ sabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam bhiyyo pañca sata iti ādikam sabbam

original: Tadatthāya vīriyaṃ kariṃsūti dibbacakkhuñāṇābhinīhāravasena vīriyaṃ ussāhaṃ akaṃsu.
analyzed: tad atthāya vīriyam kariṃsu iti dibba cakkhu ñāṇa abhinīhāra vasena vīriyam ussāham akaṃsu

original: Tenāha “na taṃ tehī”tiādi. Sattarinti ta-kārassa ra-kārādesaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, sattatinti
analyzed: tena āha na tam tehi itiādi sattarin ti takārassa rakāra ādesam katvā vuttam sattatin ti

original: attho. “Sahassa”nti pana anuvattati, sattatiyogena bahuvacanaṃ. Tenāha “eke sahassaṃ.
analyzed: attho sahassanti pana anuvattati sattati yogena bahuvacanam tena āha eke sahassam

original: Eke sattatisahassānī”ti.
analyzed: eke sattati sahassāni iti

original: Anantanti antarahitaṃ, taṃ pana ativiya mahantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “vipula”nti.
analyzed: ananta anti anta rahitam tam pana mahantam nāma hoti iti āha vipula nti

original: Avekkhitvāti ñāṇacakkhunā visuṃ visuṃ avekkhitvā “vavatthitvānā”tipi paṭhanti, so
analyzed: avekkhitvā ti ñāṇa cakkhunā visum visum avekkhitvā paṭhanti so

original: evattho. Taṃ avekkhanaṃ nicchayakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha “vavatthapetvā”ti. Pubbe vuttagāthāsu
analyzed: evatthaḥ tam avekkhanam nicchaya karaṇam hoti iti āha vavatthapetvā ti pubbe vutta gāthāsu

original: tatiyagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ, catutthagāthāya purimaddhañca sandhāyāha “pubbe vuttagāthamevā”ti.
analyzed: tatiya gāthāya pacchimaddham catuttha gāthāya purimaddhañca sandhāya āha pubbe vutta gātham eva iti

original: Vijānanampi dassanaṃ evāti āha “passatha olokethā”ti. Vācāyatapavattitabhāvato “anupaṭipāṭiyāva kittayissāmī”ti vadati.
analyzed: vijānanam pi dassanam eva ati āha passatha oloketha ati vācā āyata pavattita bhāvataḥ anupaṭipāṭiya āva kittayissāmi iti vadati

original: 335. Satta sahassāni saṅkhāyāti satta sahassā. Yakkhāyevāti yakkhajātikā eva. Ānubhāvasampannāti
analyzed: satta sahassāni saṅkhāya ati satta sahassā yakkhāya iva ati yakkha jātikā eva ānubhāva sampannā ati

original: mahesakkhā. Iddhimantoti vā mahānubhāvā. Jutimantoti mahappabhā. Vaṇṇavantoti atikkantavaṇṇā.
analyzed: mahesakkhāḥ iddhimanto ti vā mahā anubhāvāḥ jutimanto ti mahappabhāḥ vaṇṇavanto ti atikkanta vaṇṇā

original: Yasassinoti mahāparivārā ceva patthaṭakittisaddā ca. Samiti-saddo samīpatthoti adhippāyenāha
analyzed: yasassino ti mahā parivārā ca iva patthaṭa kitti saddā ca samiti saddo samīpa tthaḥ ti adhippāyena āha

original: “bhikkhūnaṃ santika”nti.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam santikam ti

original: Hemavatapabbateti himavato samīpe ṭhitapabbate.
analyzed: hemavata pabbata iti himavataḥ samīpe ṭhita pabbate

original: Ete sabbepīti ete sattasahassā kāpilavatthavā, chasahassā hemavatā, tisahassā sātāgirāti yathāvuttā sabbepi soḷasasahassā.
analyzed: ete sabbe api iti ete satta sahassā kāpilavatthavā cha sahassā hemavatā ti sahassā sātāgirā ati yathā vuttā sabbe api soḷasa sahassā

original: Rājagahanagareti rājagahanagarassa samīpe. Tanti kumbhīraṃ.
analyzed: rājagaha nagara iti rājagaha nagarassa samīpe kumbhīram

original: 336. Kāmaṃ pācīnadisaṃ pasāsati, tathāpi catūsupi disāsu saparivāradīpesu catūsupi
analyzed: kāmam pācīna disam tathā api catūsupi disāsu sa parivāra dīpesu catūsupi

original: mahādīpesu gandhabbānaṃ jeṭṭhako, kathaṃ? Sabbe te tassa vase vattanti. Kumbhaṇḍānaṃ
analyzed: mahā dīpesu gandhabbānam jeṭṭhako katham sabbe te tassa vase vattanti kumbhaṇḍānam

original: adhipatītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: adhipati iti ādī supi esa iva nayoḥ

original: Tassāpi viruḷhassa. Tādisāyevāti dhataraṭṭhassa puttasadisā eva puthutthato, nāmato, balato, iddhiādivisesato ca.
analyzed: tassa api viruḷhassa tādisāya eva ati dhataraṭṭhassa putta sadisā eva puthutthataḥ nāmataḥ balataḥ iddhi ādi visesato ca

original: Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā paccekaṃ cattāro cattāro mahārājānoti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhanavasena. Tenāha “ayañcetthā”tiādi.
analyzed: sabba saṅgāhika vasena āti dasa sahassi lokadhātuyā paccekam cattāro cattāro mahārājāno ti tesam sabbesam saṅgaṇhana vasena tena āha ayam ca itthā itiādi

original: Caturo disāti catūsu disāsu. Caturo disā jalamānā samujjalantā obhāsentā. Yadi evaṃ mahatiyā parisāya āgatānaṃ kathaṃ kāpilavatthave vane ṭhitāti āha “te panā”tiādi.
analyzed: caturaḥ disā ati catūsu disāsu caturaḥ disā jalamānā samujjalantā obhāsentā yadi evam mahatiyā parisāya āgatānam katham kāpilavatthave vane ṭhitā iti āha te pana atiādi

original: 337. Tesaṃ mahārājānaṃ dāsāti yojanā. Māyāya yuttā, tasmā māyāvino. Vañcanaṃ etesu
analyzed: tesam mahā rājānam dāsāti yojanā māyāya yuttā tasmā māyāvinaḥ vañcanam etesu

original: atthi, vañcane vā niyuttāti vañcanikā. Kerāṭiyasāṭheyyenāti nihīnasaṭhena kammena.
analyzed: atthi vañcane vā niyuttā ati vañcanikā kerāṭiya sāṭheyyena ati nihīna saṭhena kammena

original: Māyā etesaṃ atthīti māyā, te ca paresaṃ vañcanatthaṃ yena māyākaraṇena “māyā”ti vuttā,
analyzed: māyā etesam atthi iti māyā te ca paresam vañcana attham yena māyā karaṇena māyā ati vuttā

original: taṃ dassento “māyākārakā”ti āha.
analyzed: tam dassentaḥ māyā kārakā iti āha

original: Ettakā dāsāti ettakā kuṭeṇḍuādikā nighaṇḍupariyosānā aṭṭhamahārājānaṃ dāsā.
analyzed: ettakā dāsā ati ettakā kuṭeṇḍu ādikā nighaṇḍu pariyosānā aṭṭha mahārājānam dāsā

original: Devarājānoti devā hutvā taṃtaṃdevakāyassa rājāno. Citto ca seno ca cittaseno cāti tayo ete devaputtā pāḷiyaṃ ekasesanayena vuttāti āha “citto cā”tiādi.
analyzed: deva rājāno ti devāḥ hutvā taṃ taṃ deva kāyassa rājāno citto ca seno ca cittaseno ca ati tayo ete deva puttā pāḷiyam ekasesa nayena vuttā ati āha citto ca atiādi

original: Bhikkhusaṅgho samito sannipatito etthāti bhikkhusaṅghasamiti, imaṃ vanaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅghaḥ samitaḥ sannipatitaḥ ettha ati bhikkhu saṅgha samiti imam vanam

original: 338. Nāgasadahavāsikāti nāgasadahanivāsino. Tattheko kira nāgarājā, cirakālaṃ vasato tassa parisā mahatī paramparāgatā atthi, taṃ sandhāyāha “tacchakanāgaparisāyā”ti.
analyzed: nāgasadaha vāsikā ati nāgasadaha nivāsinaḥ tattha ekaḥ kira nāga rājā cira kālam vasataḥ tassa parisā mahatī paramparā gatā atthi tam sandhāya āha tacchaka nāga parisāya iti

original: Yamunavāsinoti yamunāyaṃ vasanakanāgā. Nāgavohārenāti hatthināgavohārena.
analyzed: yamuna vāsinaḥ iti vasanaka nāgāḥ nāga vohārena ati hatthi nāga vohārena

original: Vuttappakāreti kambalassatare ṭhapetvā itare vuttappakāranāgā. Lobhābhibhūtāti āhāralobhena
analyzed: vutta ppakārā iti kambala ssatare ṭhapetvā itare vutta ppakāra nāgā lobha abhibhūtā ati āhāra lobhena

original: abhibhūtā. Dibbānubhāvatāti dibbānubhāvato, dibbānubhāvahetu vā dibbā. “Citrasupaṇṇā”ti
analyzed: abhibhūtā dibba anubhāvatā ati dibba anubhāvataḥ dibba anubhāva hetu vā dibbā citra supaṇṇā ati

original: nāmaṃ vicitrasundarapattavantatāya.
analyzed: nāmam

original: Upavhayantāti upecca kathentā. Kākolūkaahinakulādayo viya aññamaññaṃ jātisamudāgataverāpi
analyzed: upavhayantā ati upecca kathentā kāka ulūka ahi nakula ādayaḥ aññam aññam jāti samudāgata verā api

original: samānā mittā viya…pe… haṭṭhatuṭṭhacittā aññamaññasminti adhippāyo. Buddhaṃyeva te
analyzed: samānāḥ mittāḥ viyape haṭṭha tuṭṭha cittāḥ aññam aññasmin ti adhippāyaḥ buddham yeva te

original: saraṇaṃ gatā “buddhānubhāveneva mayaṃ aññamaññasmiṃ mettiṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti.
analyzed: saraṇam gatāḥ buddha anubhāvena iva mayam aññam aññasmin mettim paṭilabhimha ati

original: 339. Bhātaroti methunabhātaro. Tenāha “sujāya asurakaññāya kāraṇā”ti.
analyzed: bhātaro ti methuna bhātaro tena āha sujāya asura kaññāya kāraṇā iti

original: Tesūti asuresu. Kālakañcāti evaṃ nāmā. Mahābhismāti bhiṃsanakamahāsarīrā. Abhabbāti sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na bhabbā acchandikattā tādisassa chandasseva abhāvato.
analyzed: tesu iti asuresu kālakam ca ati evam nāmā mahā bhismā ati bhiṃsanaka mahā sarīrā abhabbā ati sammatta niyāmam okkamitum na bhabbā acchandika ttā tādisassa chandassa iva abhāvato

original: Balino mahāasurassa abbhatītattā tassa putte eva kittento bhagavā “satañca baliputtāna”nti ādimāha. So kira sukhumaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā upagacchi.
analyzed: balinaḥ mahā asurassa abbhatīta ttā tassa putte eva kittentaḥ bhagavā satam ca bali puttānam ti ādim āha saḥ kira sukhumam atta bhāvam māpetvā upagacchi

original: 340. Kammaṃ katvāti parikammaṃ katvā. Nibbattāti upacārajjhānena nibbattā. Appanājhānena
analyzed: kammam katvā ati parikammam katvā nibbattā ati upacāra jhānena nibbattā appanā jhānena

original: pana nibbattā brahmāno honti, te parato vakkhati “subrahmā”tiādinā, ayañca kāmāvacaradevatā
analyzed: pana nibbattāḥ brahmānaḥ honti te paratas vakkhati subrahma iti ādinā ayam ca kāmāvacara devatā

original: vuccati. Tenevāha – “mettākaruṇākāyikāti mettājhāne ca karuṇājhāne ca parikammaṃ
analyzed: vuccati tena iva āha mettā karuṇā kāyikā ati mettā jhāne ca karuṇā jhāne ca parikammam

original: katvā nibbattadevā”ti. Mettājhāne karuṇājhāneti mettājhānanimittaṃ karuṇājhānanimittaṃ, tadatthanti attho.
analyzed: katvā nibbatta devā ati mettā jhāne karuṇā jhāne iti mettā jhāna nimittam karuṇā jhāna nimittam tat attham ti attho

original: Te āpodevādayo yathāsakaṃ vaggavasena ṭhitattā dasadhā ṭhitā. Yāva karuṇākāyikā dasa devakāyā. Nānattavaṇṇāti nānāsabhāvavaṇṇavanto.
analyzed: te āpodeva ādayaḥ yathāsakam vagga vasena dasadhā ṭhitāḥ yāva karuṇā kāyikāḥ dasa deva kāyāḥ nānatta vaṇṇā ati nānā sabhāva vaṇṇavantaḥ

original: Veṇḍudevatāti veṇḍu nāma devatā, evaṃ sahali devatā. Asamadevatā, yamakadevatāti
analyzed: veṇḍu devatā ati veṇḍu nāma devatā evam devatā asama devatā yamaka devatā ati

original: “dve ayaniyo”ti vadanti, tappamukhā dve devanikāyāti. Candassūpanisā devā candassa
analyzed: dve ayaniyo ti vadanti tappamukhā dve devanikāyā ati candassa upanisā devā candassa

original: upanissayato vattamānā tassa purato ca pacchato ca passato ca dhāvanakadevā. Tenāha
analyzed: upanissayataḥ vattamānā tassa puratas ca pacchatas ca passatas ca dhāvanakadevā tena āha

original: “candanissitakā devā”ti. Sūriyassūpanisā, nakkhattanissitāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: canda nissitakā devā ti sūriyassa upanisā nakkhatta nissitā ti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: Kevalaṃ vātavāyanahetavo devatā vātavalāhakā. Tathā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasañcaraṇahetavo
analyzed: kevalam vāta vāyana hetavaḥ devatāḥ tathā kevalam abbha paṭala sañcaraṇa hetavaḥ

original: abbhavalāhakā. Uṇhappavattihetavo uṇhavalāhakā. Vassavalāhakā pana pajjunnasadisāti.
analyzed: abbha valāhakāḥ uṇha ppavatti hetavaḥ uṇha valāhakāḥ vassa valāhakā pana pajjunna sadisā ti

original: Te idha na vuttā. Vasudevatā nāma eko devanikāyo, tesaṃ pubbaṅgamattā vāsavo, sakko.
analyzed: te idha na vuttāḥ vasudevatāḥ nāma ekaḥ devanikāyo tesam pubbaṅga mattā vāsavaḥ sakko

original: Daseteti ete veṇḍudevatādayo vāsavapariyosānā dasa devakāyā.
analyzed: daseta iti ete veṇḍudevatā ādayaḥ vāsava pariyosānā dasa deva kāyā

original: Imānīti “jalamaggī”ti ca “sikhārivā”ti ca imāni tesaṃ nāmāni. Keci pana ma-kāro padasandhikaro
analyzed: imāni iti jalamaggī iti ca sikhārivā ati ca imāni tesam nāmāni keci pana makāro pada sandhi karo

original: “jalā”ti ca “aggī”ti ca “sikhārivā”ti ca imāni tesaṃ nāmānīti vadanti. Eteti tesu
analyzed: ca aggīti ca sikhārivāti ca imāni tesam nāmāni iti vadanti etā iti tesu

original: eva “ariṭṭhakā, rojā”ti ca vuttadevesu ekacce,umāpupphanibhāsino vaṇṇato umāpupphasadisāti

original: Yaṃ ceti ettha ceti nipātamattaṃ somanassassa adhippetattā. Catukkanayavaseneva ca

analyzed: suttantesu jhāna kathā iti vuttam dutiya tatiya jhāna vasena ati dvīsu iti sa vitakkam

analyzed: sa vicāram a vitakkam a vicāranti vuttesu dvīsu somanassesu

original: Avitakkaavicāra vipassanā paṇītatarā sammasitadhammavasenapi vipassanāya visesasiddhito,
analyzed: avitakka avicāra vipassanā paṇītatarā sammasita dhamma vasena api vipassanāya visesa siddhito

analyzed: iminā nayena yojanā veditabbā

analyzed: pavattiyā upekkhā vedanāya ca sabhāgā ettha upekkhā vāti ettha etasmin upekkhā niddese

original: Tañhi sandhāya “paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānavasena uppajjanakaupekkhā”ti vuttaṃ.

original: ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. Idanti yaṃ “satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ. Idha imasmiṃ
analyzed: ca anussaraṇa ṭṭhena idam ti yam satiyā iva sati paṭṭhānam ti vuttam idam idha imasmin

original: suttapadese adhippetaṃ.
analyzed: sutta padese adhippetam

original: Yadi evanti. Yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā
analyzed: yadi evanti yadi sati eva sati paṭṭhānam sati nāma ekaḥ dhammaḥ evam sante kasmā

original: “satipaṭṭhānā”ti bahuvacananti āha “satibahuttā”tiādi. Yadi bahukā tā satiyo, atha
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānā iti bahuvacananti āha sati bahuttā atiādi yadi atha

original: kasmā “maggo”ti ekavacananti yojanā. Maggaṭṭhenāti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo,
analyzed: kasmā maggo ti ekavacanam ti yojanā magga ṭṭhena ati niyyāna ṭṭhena niyyānikaḥ hi magga dhammo

original: teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattūpagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ
analyzed: tena iva niyyānika bhāvena ekattu upagataḥ ekantataḥ nibbānam gacchati atthikehi ca tad attham

original: maggīyatīti āha “vuttañheta”nti, attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati. Tattha catassopi
analyzed: āha vuttam hetat ti attanā ava pubbe vuttam paccāharati tattha catassaḥ api

original: cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. Aparabhāgeti ariyamaggakkhaṇe.
analyzed: cetā ati kāya anupassanā ādi vasena catubbidhā api ca etāḥ satiyaḥ apara bhāge ti ariya magga kkhaṇe

original: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ
analyzed: kiccam sādhayamānā ati pubba bhāge kāya ādīsu subha saññā ādi vidhamana vasena visum visum

original: pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe satiyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena
analyzed: pavattitvā magga kkhaṇe satiyā iva tattha catubbidhassa api vipallāsassa samuccheda vasena

original: pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchati. Catukiccasādhaneneva
analyzed: pahāna kiccam sādhayamānā ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena nibbānam gacchati catu kicca sādhanena iva

original: hettha bahuvacananiddeso. Evañca satīti evaṃ maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya “maggo”ti
analyzed: ha ittha bahuvacana niddeso evam ca sati iti evam maggaṭṭhena ekattam upādāya maggo ti

original: ekavacanena, ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya “cattāro”ti ca vattabbatāya sati
analyzed: eka vacanena ārammaṇa bhedena catubbidha tam upādāya cattāro iti ca vattabba tāya sati

original: vijjamānattā. Vacanānusandhinā “ekāyano aya”ntiādikā desanā sānusandhikāva, na ananusandhikāti
analyzed: vijjamānattā desanā sa anusandhikā eva na an anusandhikā ati

original: adhippāyo. Vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanena paṭipādetuṃ “mārasenappamaddana”nti suttapadaṃ
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ vuttam eva attham nidassanena paṭipādetum māra sena ppamaddanan ti sutta padam

original: ānetvā “yathā”tiādinā nidassanaṃ saṃsandati. “Tasmā”tiādi nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: ānetvā yathā atiādinā nidassanam saṃsandati tasmā atiādi nigamanam

original: Visesato kāyo, vedanā ca assādassa kāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu
analyzed: visesataḥ kāyaḥ vedanā ca assādassa kāraṇan ti tad pahāna attham tesu taṇhā vatthūsu oḷārika sukhumesu

original: asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ
analyzed: asubha dukkha bhāva dassanāni manda tikkha paññehi taṇhā caritehi sukarāni iti tāni tesam

original: “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni. Tathā “niccaṃ attā”ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu
analyzed: visuddhi maggaḥ ti vuttāni tathā niccam attā ati abhinivesa vatthu tāya diṭṭhiyāḥ visesa kāraṇesu

original: cittadhammesu aniccānattatādassanāni sarāgādivasena, saññāphassādivasena, nīvaraṇādivasena
analyzed: citta dhammesu anicca anatta tā dassanāni sa rāga ādi vasena saññā phassa ādi vasena nīvaraṇa ādi vasena

original: ca nātippabhedātippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ
analyzed: ca na ati ppabheda ati ppabheda gatesu tesu tad pahāna attham manda tikkha paññānam diṭṭhi caritānam

original: sukarānīti tesaṃ tāni “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni. Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi
analyzed: sukarāni iti tesam tāni visuddhi maggaḥ ti vuttāni ettha ca yathā citta dhammānam pi

original: taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati, tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi
analyzed: taṇhāya vatthu bhāvo sambhavati tathā kāya vedanānam pi sati pi catunnam pi

original: taṇhādiṭṭhivatthubhāve yo yassā sātisayapaccayo, taṃ dassanatthaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: taṇhā diṭṭhi vatthu bhāve yaḥ yassā sa atisaya paccayo tam dassana ttham visesa ggahaṇam

original: katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha
analyzed: katam ti daṭṭhabbam tikkha pañña samatha yānikaḥ oḷārika ārammaṇam pariggaṇhantaḥ tattha

original: aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ “oḷārikārammaṇe
analyzed: a ṭhatvā jhānam samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya vedanam pariggaṇhāti iti vuttam oḷārika ārammaṇe

original: asaṇṭhahanato”ti. Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte, dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti
analyzed: a saṇṭhahanato ti vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte dhammesu ca cittam pakkhandati iti

original: cittadhammānupassanānaṃ mandatikkhapaññavipassanāyānikānaṃ visuddhimaggatā vuttā.
analyzed: citta dhamma anupassanānam manda tikkha pañña vipassanā yānikānam visuddhi magga tā vuttā

original: Tesaṃ tatthāti ettha tattha-saddassa “pahānattha”nti etena yojanā. Parato tesaṃ tatthāti
analyzed: tesam tattha ati ettha tattha saddassa pahāna atthanti etena yojanā paratas tesam tattha ati

original: etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayo pañca kāmaguṇā sa visesā kāye labbhanti iti visesena kāyo

original: vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hotīti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu, santatighanaggahaṇavasena
analyzed: vatthu bhavesu sukha ggahaṇa vasena bhava ssādaḥ hoti iti bhava oghassa vedanā vatthu santati ghana ggahaṇa vasena

original: visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu, dhammesu vinibbhogassa
analyzed: visesataḥ citte attā abhinivesaḥ hoti iti diṭṭha oghassa cittam vatthu dhammesu vinibbhogassa

original: dukkarattā, dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā ca sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa
analyzed: dukkara ttā dhammānam dhamma matta tāya duppaṭivijjha ttā ca sammohaḥ hoti iti avijjoghassa

original: dhammā vatthu, tasmā tesu tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ cattārova vuttā.
analyzed: dhammā vatthu tasmā tesu tesam pahāna attham cattāro va vuttā

original: Evaṃ kāyādīnaṃ kāmoghādivatthubhāvakathaneneva kāmayogakāmāsavādīnampi vatthubhāvo
analyzed: evam kāya ādīnam kāma ogha ādi vatthu bhāva kathanena iva kāma yoga kāma āsava ādīnam pi vatthu bhāvaḥ

original: dīpito hoti oghehi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā. Yadaggena ca kāyo kāmoghādīnaṃ vatthu,
analyzed: dīpitaḥ hoti oghehi tesam atthataḥ an aññattā yad aggena ca kāyaḥ kāma ogha ādīnam vatthu

original: tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu. “Dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti
analyzed: tad aggena abhijjhā kāya ganthassa vatthu dukkhāya vedanāya paṭigha anusayaḥ anuseti iti

original: dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa
analyzed: dukkha dukkha vipariṇāma dukkha saṅkhāra dukkha bhūtā vedanā visesena byāpāda kāya ganthassa

original: vatthu. Citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhīti ādi parāmasanaṃ
analyzed: vatthu citte nicca ggahaṇa vasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhi iti ādi parāmasanam

original: hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu. Nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa
analyzed: hoti iti sīlabbata parāmāsassa cittam vatthu nāma rūpa paricchedena bhūtam bhūtataḥ a passantassa

original: bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu. Kāyassa
analyzed: bhava vibhava diṭṭhi saṅkhāto idaṃsacca abhinivesaḥ hoti iti tassa dhammā vatthu kāyassa

original: kāmupādānavatthutā vuttanayāva. Yadaggena hi kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena kāmupādānassapi
analyzed: kāma upādāna vatthu tā yad aggena hi kāyaḥ kāma oghassa vatthu tad aggena kāma upādānassa api

original: vatthu atthato abhinnattā. Sukhavedanassādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādikaṃ
analyzed: vatthu atthataḥ abhinna ttā sukha vedanā ssāda vasena para loka nirapekkhaḥ natthi dinna nti ādikam

original: parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu. Cittadhammānaṃ itarupādānavatthutā
analyzed: parāmāsam uppādeti iti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu citta dhammānam itara upādāna vatthu tā

original: tatiyacatutthaganthayojanāyaṃ vuttanayā eva. Kāyavedanānaṃ chandadosāgativatthutā
analyzed: eva kāya vedanānam chanda dosa āgati vatthu tā

original: kāmoghabyāpādakāyaganthayojanāyaṃ vuttanayā eva. Santatighanaggahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte
analyzed: eva santati ghana ggahaṇa vasena sa rāga ādi citte

original: sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu. Dhammasabhāvānavabodhe bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu.
analyzed: sammohaḥ hoti iti moha āgatiyā cittam vatthu dhamma sabhāva anavabodhe bhayam hoti iti bhaya āgatiyā dhammāḥ vatthu

original: Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayā, phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, saṅkhārapaccayā
analyzed: āhāra samudayā kāyassa samudayā phassa samudayā vedanānam samudayo saṅkhāra paccayā

original: viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vacanato kāyādīnaṃ samudayabhūtā kabaḷīkāraphassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāhārā
analyzed: viññāṇam viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpan ti vacanataḥ kāya ādīnam samudaya bhūtā kabaḷīkāra phassa manaḥ sañcetanā viññāṇa āhārā

original: kāyādiparijānanena pariññātā hontīti āha “catubbidhāhārapariññattha”nti. Pakaraṇanayoti
analyzed: kāya ādi parijānanena pariññātāḥ honti iti āha pakaraṇa nayo ti

original: nettipakaraṇavasena suttantasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.
analyzed: na itthi pakaraṇa vasena suttanta saṃvaṇṇanā anayo

original: Saraṇavasenāti kāyādīnaṃ, kusalādidhammānañca upadhāraṇavasena. Saranti gacchanti
analyzed: saraṇa vasena ati kāya ādīnam kusala ādi dhammānam ca upadhāraṇa vasena saranti gacchanti

original: nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo
analyzed: nibbānam sati iti imasmin atthe ekatte eka sabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇam samāgamaḥ

original: ekattasamosaraṇaṃ. Etadeva hi dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ekatta samosaraṇam etat eva hi dassetum yathā hi itiādi vuttam

original: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūto vā samānatāya eko satipaṭṭhānasabhāvo ekattaṃ, tattha samosaraṇaṃ
analyzed: eka nibbāna pavesa hetu bhūtaḥ vā samāna tāya ekaḥ sati paṭṭhāna sabhāvo ekattam tattha samosaraṇam

original: ekattasamosaraṇaṃ, taṃsabhāgatāva, ekanibbānapavesahetubhāvaṃ pana dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: ekatta samosaraṇam eka nibbāna pavesa hetu bhāvam pana dassetum yathā iti ādim āha

original: Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇattena vuttānīti
analyzed: etasmin atthe saraṇa ekatta samosaraṇāni saha iva sati paṭṭhāna eka bhāvassa kāraṇa ttena vuttāni iti

original: daṭṭhabbāni, purimasmiṃ visuṃ. Saraṇavasenāti vā gamanavasenāti atthe sati tadeva
analyzed: daṭṭhabbāni purimasmin visum saraṇa vasena ati vā gamana vasena ati atthe sati tat eva

original: gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti, samosaraṇe vā sati-saddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva
analyzed: gamanam samosaraṇanti samosaraṇe vā a vuccamāne

original: satīti sati-saddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti
analyzed: satī iti purimam sati bhāvassa kāraṇam pacchimam eka bhāvassa ati

original: nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti.
analyzed: nibbāna samosaraṇe pi tāni sati paṭṭhāna eka bhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti

original: “Cuddasavidhena, navavidhena, soḷasavidhena, pañcavidhenā”ti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ
analyzed: cuddasavidhena navavidhena soḷasavidhena pañcavidhena ati idam upari pāḷiyam āgatānam

original: ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tesaṃ pana anantarabhedavasena, tadanugatabhedavasena
analyzed: āna apāna pabba ādīnam vasena vuttam tesam pana anantara bheda vasena tad anugata bheda vasena

original: ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva, catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍasadisatā kāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanānubhāvassa daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ca bhāvanāya anekavidha tā catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānaka bhaṇḍa sadisa tā kāya anupassanā ādi taṃ taṃ sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanā anubhāvassa daṭṭhabbā

original: Kathetukamyatāpucchā itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato, niddesādivasena desetukamyatāya
analyzed: itarāsam asambhavataḥ niddesa ādi vasena desetu kamyatāya

original: ca tathā vuttattā. “Idhā”ti vuccamānapaṭipattisampādakassa bhikkhuno sannissayadassanaṃ,
analyzed: ca tathā vutta ttā idha ati vuccamāna paṭipatti sampādakassa bhikkhuno sannissaya dassanam

original: so cassa sannissayo sāsanato añño natthīti vuttaṃ “idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane”ti. Dhamma…pe…
analyzed: so ca ssa sannissayaḥ sāsanataḥ aññaḥ natthi iti vuttam idhā ti imasmim sāsane ti dhammape

original: lapanametaṃ tesaṃ attano sammukhābhimukhabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ, tañca dhammassa sakkaccasavanatthaṃ.
analyzed: lapanam etam tesam attano sammukha abhimukha bhāva karaṇa attham tat ca dhammassa sakkacca savana attham

original: “Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādi vacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
analyzed: gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaya itiādi vacanataḥ bhikkhu gocarāḥ ete dhammāḥ

original: yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti,
analyzed: yat idam kāya anupassanā ādayaḥ tattha yasmā kāya anupassanā ādi paṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti

original: tasmā “kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti bhikkhumhi taṃniyamatoti āha
analyzed: tasmā kāya anupassī viharati itiādinā bhikkhum dasseti bhikkhumhi tad niyamato ti āha

original: “paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato”ti. Satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā, sakalasāsanasampaṭiggāhakattā
analyzed: paṭipattiyāḥ bhikkhu bhāva dassanato ti satthu cariyā anuvidhāyaka ttā sakala sāsana sampaṭiggāhaka ttā

original: ca sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājanabhāvo. Tasmiṃ gahiteti bhikkhumhi gahite. Bhikkhuparisāya
analyzed: ca sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājana bhāvaḥ tasmin gahita iti bhikkhumhi gahite bhikkhu parisāya

original: jeṭṭhabhāvato rājagamanañāyena itarā parisāpi atthato gahitāva hontīti āha “sesā”tiādi.
analyzed: jeṭṭha bhāvataḥ rāja gamana ñāyena itarā parisā api atthataḥ gahitā ava honti iti āha sesa itiādi

original: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhajitvā itarampi vibhajituṃ “yo ca ima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam paṭhamam kāraṇam vibhajitvā itaram pi vibhajitum yaḥ ca iman tiādi vuttam

original: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādi visamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena
analyzed: samam careyya ati kāya ādi visama cariyam pahāya kāya ādīhi samam careyya rāga ādi vūpasamena

original: santo, indriyadamena danto, catumagganiyāmena niyato, seṭṭhacaritāya brahmacārī,
analyzed: santaḥ indriya damena danto catu magga niyāmena niyataḥ seṭṭha caritāya brahmacārī

original: sabbattha kāyadaṇḍādioropanena nidhāya daṇḍaṃ. Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi
analyzed: sabbattha kāya daṇḍa ādi oropanena nidhāya daṇḍam ariya bhāve ṭhitaḥ saḥ evarūpaḥ

original: “brāhmaṇo, samaṇo, bhikkhū”ti ca veditabbo.
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ samaṇaḥ bhikkhu iti ca veditabbaḥ

original: “Ayañceva kāyo, bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu khandhapañcakaṃ, tathā “sukhañca kāyena
analyzed: ayam ca iva kāyaḥ bahiddhā ca khandha pañcakam tathā sukham ca kāyena

original: paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādīsu, “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī”tiādīsu
analyzed: paṭisaṃvedeti iti ādīsu yā tasmin samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi iti ādīsu

original: ca vedanādayo cetasikā khandhā kāyoti vuccantīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kāyeti rūpakāye”ti
