original: Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ
analyzed: avisesena dvīhi pi nīvaraṇa pahānam vuttan ti katvā punar ekekena vuttam pahāna visesam

original: dassetuṃ “visesenā”ti āha. Atha vā “vineyya nīvaraṇānī”ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavinayavacanassa
analyzed: dassetum visesena ati āha atha vā vineyya nīvaraṇāni iti avatvā abhijjhā domanassa vinaya vacanassa

original: payojanaṃ dassento “visesenā”tiādimāha. Kāyānupassanābhāvanāya hi ujuvipaccanīkānaṃ
analyzed: payojanam dassentaḥ visesena ati ādim āha kāya anupassanā bhāvanāya hi uju vipaccanīkānam

original: anurodhavirodhādīnaṃ pahānadassanaṃ etassa payojananti. Kāyasampattimūlakassāti rūpabalayobbanārogyādisarīrasampadānimittassa.
analyzed: anurodha virodha ādīnam pahāna dassanam etassa payojanam ti kāya sampatti mūlakassa ati rūpa bala yobbana ārogya ādi sarīra sampadā nimittassa

original: Vuttavipariyāyato kāyavipattimūlako virodho veditabbo. Kāyabhāvanāyāti kāyānupassanābhāvanāya.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyataḥ kāya vipatti mūlakaḥ virodhaḥ veditabbaḥ kāya bhāvanāya ati kāya anupassanā bhāvanāya

original: Sā hi idha kāyabhāvanāti adhippetā. Subhasukhabhāvādīnanti ādi-saddena manuññaniccatādisaṅgaho
analyzed: sā hi idha kāya bhāvanā ati adhippetā ādi saddena manuñña nicca tā ādi saṅgaho

original: daṭṭhabbo. Asubhāsukhabhāvādīnanti ettha pana ādi-saddena amanuññaaniccatādīnaṃ.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ asubha asukha bhāva ādīnam ti ettha pana ādi saddena amanuñña anicca tā ādīnam

original: Tenāti anurodhādippahānavacanena. “Yogānubhāvo hī”tiādi vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tena ati anurodha ādi ppahāna vacanena yoga anubhāvaḥ hi itiādi pākaṭa karaṇam

original: Yogānubhāvo hi bhāvanānubhāvo. Yogasamatthoti yogamanuyuñjituṃ samattho. Purimena
analyzed: yoga anubhāvaḥ hi bhāvanā anubhāvaḥ yoga samatthaḥ iti yogam anuyuñjitum samatthaḥ purimena

original: hi “anurodhavirodhavippamutto”tiādivacanena bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa ānisaṃso vutto,
analyzed: hi anurodha virodha vippamuttaḥ ti ādi vacanena bhāvanam anuyuttassa ānisaṃsaḥ vutto

original: dutiyena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa paṭipatti. Na hi anurodhavirodhādīhi upaddutassa bhāvanā ijjhati.
analyzed: dutiyena bhāvanam anuyuñjantassa paṭipatti na hi anurodha virodha ādīhi upaddutassa bhāvanā ijjhati

original: Anupassīti etthāti “anupassī”ti etasmiṃ pade labbhamānāya anupassanāya anupassanājotanāya
analyzed: anupassī iti ettha ati anupassī iti etasmin pade labbhamānāya anupassanāya anupassana ājotanāya

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo, aññathā “anupassanāyā”ti karaṇavacanaṃ
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam vuttanti evamatthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ aññathā anupassanāya āti karaṇa vacanam

original: na yujjeyya. Anupassanā eva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ, na ettha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, yujjati
analyzed: na yujjeyya anupassanā eva hi kammaṭṭhānam na ettha ārammaṇam adhippetam yujjati

original: vā. Kāyapariharaṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa cettha atthasiddhattā
analyzed: vā kāya pariharaṇam vuttan ti sambandhaḥ kammaṭṭhāna pariharaṇassa ca ittha attha siddha tā

original: “kāyapariharaṇa”ntveva vuttaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānikassa hi kāyapariharaṇaṃ yāvadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: kāya pariharaṇam tu eva vuttam kammaṭṭhānikassa hi kāya pariharaṇam yāvat eva kammaṭṭhānam

original: pariharaṇatthanti. Kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa vā “ātāpī”tiādinā vuccamānattā “kāyapariharaṇa”ntveva
analyzed: pariharaṇa atthanti kammaṭṭhāna pariharaṇassa vā ātāpī iti ādinā vuccamāna ttā kāya pariharaṇam tu eva

original: vuttaṃ. Kāyaggahaṇena vā nāmakāyassāpi gahaṇaṃ, na rūpakāyasseva, teneva kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇampi
analyzed: vuttam kāya ggahaṇena vā nāma kāyassa api gahaṇam na rūpa kāyassa iva tena iva kammaṭṭhāna pariharaṇam pi

original: saṅgahitaṃ hoti, evañca katvā “viharatīti ettha vuttavihārenā”ti etthaggahaṇañca
analyzed: saṅgahitam hoti evam ca katvā viharati iti ettha vutta vihārena ati etthak gahaṇam ca

original: samatthitaṃ hoti “kāyānupassī viharatī”ti vihārassa visesetvā vuttattā. “Ātāpī”tiādi
analyzed: samatthitam hoti kāya anupassī viharati iti vihārassa visesetvā vutta ttā ātāpi itiādi

original: pana saṅkhepato vuttassa kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa saha sādhanena vitthāretvā dassanaṃ.
analyzed: pana saṅkhepataḥ vuttassa kammaṭṭhāna pariharaṇassa saha sādhanena vitthāretvā dassanam

original: Ātāpenāti ātāpaggahaṇena. “Satisampajaññenā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: ātāpena ati ātāpa gahaṇena sati sampajaññena ati ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ sabbatthaka kammaṭṭhānam ti

original: buddhānussati, mettā, maraṇassati, asubhabhāvanā ca. Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ
analyzed: buddha anussati mettā maraṇa ssati asubha bhāvanā ca idam hi catukkam yoginā parihariyamānam

original: “sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati, sabbattha kammaṭṭhānānuyogassārakkhabhūtattā
analyzed: sabbatthaka kammaṭṭhānan ti vuccati sabbattha kammaṭṭhāna anuyoga sārakkha bhūta ttā

original: satisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa pariharitabbattā satisampajaññaggahaṇena tassa
analyzed: sati sampajañña balena avicchinnassa pariharitabba ttā sati sampajañña ggahaṇena tassa

original: vuttatā vuttā. Satiyā vā samatho vutto tassā samādhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.
analyzed: vutta tā vuttā satiyāḥ vā samathaḥ vuttaḥ tassā samādhi kkhandhena saṅgahita ttā

original: Vibhaṅge pana attho vuttoti yojanā. Tenāti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena
analyzed: vibhaṅge pana atthaḥ vuttaḥ iti yojanā tena ati saddattham an ādiyitvā bhāva tthassa iva vibhajana vasena

original: pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saha. Aṭṭhakathānayoti saddatthassāpi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ
analyzed: pavattena vibhaṅga pāṭhena saha aṭṭhakathā nayo ti saddatthassa api vivaraṇa vasena yathāraham

original: vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo. Yathā saṃsandatīti yathā atthato, adhippāyato ca avilomento
analyzed: vuttaḥ attha saṃvaṇṇanā nayaḥ yathā saṃsandati iti yathā atthataḥ adhippāyato ca

original: aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti, evaṃ veditabbo.
analyzed: aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti evam veditabbaḥ

original: Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacaneti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā,
analyzed: vedanā ādīnam puna vacanā iti ettha nissaya paccaya bhāva vasena citta dhammānam vedanā sannissita ttā

original: pañcavokārabhave arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāppasaṅgepi
analyzed: pañcavokāra bhave arūpa dhammānam rūpa paṭibaddha vuttito ca vedanāya kāya ādi anupassanā appasaṅge pi

original: āpanne tato asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassanatthaṃ, ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthañca
analyzed: āpanne tatas a sammissataḥ vavatthānam dassana attham ghana vinibbhoga ādi dassana attham ca

original: dutiyaṃ vedanāggahaṇaṃ, tena na vedanāyaṃ kāyānupassī, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha
analyzed: dutiyam vedanā ggahaṇam tena na vedanā ayam kāya anupassī citta dhamma anupassī vā atha

original: kho vedanānupassī evāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena
analyzed: kho vedanā anupassī eva ati vedanā saṅkhāte vatthusmim vedanā anupassanā ākārassa iva dassanena

original: asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā “yasmiṃ samaye sukhā vedanā, na tasmiṃ
analyzed: a sammissataḥ vavatthānam dassitam hoti tathā yasmin samaye sukhā vedanā na tasmin

original: samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā
analyzed: samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā yasmin vā pana samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā

original: vā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā”ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe avatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ
analyzed: vā vedanā na tasmin samaye itarā vedanā ati vedanā bhāva sāmaññe avatvā tam tam vedanam

original: vinibbhujjitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti, tena tāsaṃ
analyzed: vinibbhujjitvā dassanena ghana vinibbhogaḥ dhuva bhāva vivekaḥ dassitaḥ hoti tena tāsam

original: khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena aniccatāya, tato eva dukkhatāya, anattatāya ca dassanaṃ
analyzed: khaṇa matta avaṭṭhāna dassanena anicca tāya tatas eva dukkha tāya anatta tāya ca dassanaṃ

original: vibhāvitaṃ hoti. Ghanavinibbhogādīti ādi-saddena ayampi attho veditabbo. Ayañhi vedanāyaṃ
analyzed: vibhāvitam hoti ghana vinibbhoga ādi iti ādi saddena ayam pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam hi vedanā ayam

original: vedanānupassī eva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi
analyzed: vedanā anupassī eva na añña dhamma anupassī kim vuttam hoti yathā nāma bālaḥ a maṇi sabhāve pi

original: udakapubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti, na evaṃ ayaṃ ṭhitiramaṇīyepi vedayite, pageva
analyzed: udaka pubbuḷake maṇi ākāra anupassī hoti na evam ayam ṭhiti ramaṇīye api vedayite pagā iva

original: itarasmiṃ manuññākārānupassī, atha kho khaṇapabhaṅguratāya, avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya
analyzed: itarasmim manuñña ākāra anupassī atha kho khaṇa pabhaṅgura tāya avasavatti tāya kilesa asuci paggharaṇa tāya

original: ca aniccaanattaasubhākārānupassī, vipariṇāmadukkhatāya, saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato
analyzed: ca anicca anatta asubha ākāra anupassī vipariṇāma dukkha tāya saṅkhāra dukkha tāya ca visesataḥ

original: dukkhānupassī yevāti. Evaṃ citta dhammesupi yathārahaṃ punavacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: dukkha anupassī yeva āti evam citta dhammesu pi yathāraham punavacane payojanam vattabbam

original: Lokiyā eva sammasanacārassa adhippetattā. “Kevalaṃ panidhā”tiādinā “idha ettakaṃ
analyzed: lokiyāḥ eva sammasana cārassa adhippeta ttā kevalam panidhā ti ādinā idha ettakam

original: veditabba”nti veditabbaparicchedaṃ dasseti. “Esa nayo”ti iminā yathā cittaṃ, dhammā
analyzed: veditabbam ti veditabba paricchedam dasseti esa nayo ti iminā yathā cittam dhammā

original: ca anupassitabbā, tathā tāni anupassanto citte cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassīti
analyzed: ca anupassitabbā tathā tāni anupassantaḥ citte citta anupassī dhammesu dhamma anupassī iti

original: veditabboti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Dukkhatoti dukkhasabhāvato, dukkhanti anupassitabbāti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ ti imam attham atidisati dukkhataḥ ti dukkha sabhāvataḥ dukkhanti anupassitabbā ti

original: attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: attho sesa pada dvaye pi esa iva nayo

original: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya “dukkhā”ti
analyzed: yaḥ sukham dukkhataḥ addāti yaḥ bhikkhu sukham vedanam vipariṇāma dukkha tāya dukkhāti

original: paññācakkhunā addakkhi. Dukkhaṃ addakkhi sallatoti dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ pīḷājananato,
analyzed: paññācakkhunā addakkhi dukkham addakkhi sallataḥ ti dukkham vedanam pīḷā jananato

original: antotudanato, dunnīharaṇato ca sallato addakkhi passi. Adukkhamasukhanti upekkhāvedanaṃ.
analyzed: antotudanataḥ dunnīharaṇataḥ ca sallataḥ addakkhi passi adukkham asukhanti upekkhā vedanaṃ

original: Santanti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya, paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca
analyzed: santanti sukha dukkhāni viya anoḷārika tāya paccaya vasena vūpasanta sabhāva tāya ca

original: santaṃ. Aniccatoti hutvāabhāvato, udayavayavantato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭipakkhato
analyzed: santam aniccato ti hutvā abhāvataḥ udaya vaya antataḥ tāvakālikataḥ nicca paṭipakkhato

original: ca “anicca”nti yo addakkhi. Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu ekaṃsena, paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya
analyzed: ca aniccanti yaḥ addakkhi sa ve sammaddasaḥ bhikkhu ekaṃsena paribyattam vā vedanāya

original: sammāpassanakoti attho.
analyzed: sammāpassanakaḥ ti attho

original: Dukkhātipīti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. Taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ
analyzed: dukkha atipi iti saṅkhāra dukkha tāya dukkhā tam dukkhasmin ti sabbam tam vedayitam

original: dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato. Sukhadukkhatopi
analyzed: dukkhasmin antogadham pariyāpannam vadāmi saṅkhāra dukkha tā an ativattanataḥ sukha dukkhataḥ pi

original: cāti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya, vipariṇāmaṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca
analyzed: ca ati sukha ādīnam ṭhiti vipariṇāma ñāṇa sukha tāya vipariṇāma ṭhiti aññāṇa dukkha tāya ca

original: vuttattā tissopi ca sukhato, tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Satta anupassanā
analyzed: vutta ttā tissaḥ api ca sukhataḥ tissaḥ api ca dukkhataḥ anupassitabbā ti atthaḥ satta anupassanā

original: heṭṭhā pakāsitā eva. Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ sukhādivibhāgato sesaṃ sāmisanirāmisādibhedaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā pakāsitāḥ eva sesanti yathā vuttam sukha ādi vibhāgato sesam sāmisa nirāmisa ādi bhedam

original: vedanānupassanāyaṃ vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: vedanā anupassanā ayam vattabbam

original: Ārammaṇa…pe… bhedānanti rūpādiārammaṇanānattassa nīlāditabbhedassa, chandādiadhipatinānattassa
analyzed: ārammaṇa pe bheda ananti rūpa ādi ārammaṇa nānattassa nīla ādi tad bhedassa chanda ādi adhipati nānattassa

original: hīnāditabbhedassa, ñāṇajhānādisahajātanānattassa sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikasavitakkāditabbhedassa,
analyzed: hīna ādi tad bhedassa ñāṇa jhāna ādi sahajāta nānattassa sa saṅkhārika asaṅkhārika sa vitakka ādi tad bhedassa

original: kāmāvacarādibhūminānattassa ukkaṭṭhamajjhimāditabbhedassa, kusalādikammanānattassa
analyzed: kāmāvacara ādi bhūmi nānattassa ukkaṭṭha majjhima ādi tad bhedassa kusala ādi kamma nānattassa

original: devagatisaṃvattaniyatāditabbhedassa, kaṇhasukkavipākanānattassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatāditabbhedassa,
analyzed: deva gati saṃvatta niyata ādi tad bhedassa kaṇha sukka vipāka nānattassa diṭṭha dhamma vedanīya tā ādi tad bhedassa

original: parittabhūmakādikiriyānānattassa tihetukāditabbhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: paritta bhūmaka ādi kiriyā nānattassa ti hetuka ādi tad bhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā

original: Ādi-saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca
analyzed: ādi saddena savatthuka avatthuka ādi nānattassa ca

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānanti phusanāditaṃtaṃlakkhaṇānañceva
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo sa lakkhaṇa sāmañña lakkhaṇānam ti phusana ādi tad tad lakkhaṇānam ca eva

original: aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇānañca vasenāti yojanā. Suññatadhammassāti anattatāsaṅkhātasuññatāsabhāvassa.
analyzed: anicca tā ādi sāmañña lakkhaṇānam ca vasena ati yojanā suññata dhammassa āti anatta tā saṅkhāta suñña tā sabhāvassa

original: Yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme“tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti, khandhā hontī”tiādinā
analyzed: yam vibhāvetum abhidhamma itasmin kho pana samaye dhammāḥ honti khandhāḥ honti itiādinā

original: suññatāvāradesanā pavattā, taṃ pahīnameva pubbe pahīnattā, tasmā tassa tassa puna
analyzed: suñña tā vāra desanā pavattā tam pahīnam eva pubbe pahīna ttā tasmā tassa tassa puna

original: pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Na hi kilesā pahīyamānā ārammaṇavibhāgena pahīyanti anāgatānaṃyeva
analyzed: pahānam na vattabbam na hi kilesāḥ pahīyamānāḥ ārammaṇa vibhāgena pahīyanti anāgatānam yeva

original: uppajjanārahānaṃ pahātabbattā, tasmā abhijjhādīnaṃ ekattha pahānaṃ vatvā itarattha
analyzed: uppajjana arahānam pahātabba ttā tasmai abhijjhā ādīnam ekattha pahānam vatvā itarattha

original: na vattabbaṃ evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “kāmañcetthā”tiādinā. Atha vā maggacittakkhaṇe
analyzed: na vattabbam eva ati imam attham dasseti kāmañca itthā iti ādinā atha vā magga citta kkhaṇe

original: ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Maggena
analyzed: ekattha pahīnam sabbattha pahīnam eva hoti iti visum visum pahānam na vattabbam maggena

original: hi pahīnāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Tattha purimāya codanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, na
analyzed: hi pahīnā ati vattabba tam arahanti tattha purimāya codanāya nānā puggala parihāraḥ na

original: hi ekassa pahīnaṃ tato aññassa pahīnaṃ nāma hoti. Pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro.
analyzed: hi ekassa pahīnam tatas aññassa pahīnam nāma hoti pacchimāya nānā citta kkhaṇika parihāro

original: Nānācittakkhaṇeti hi lokiyamaggacittakkhaṇeti adhippāyo. Pubbabhāgamaggo hi idhādhippeto.
analyzed: nānā cittakkhaṇā iti hi lokiya magga cittakkhaṇā iti adhippāyaḥ pubbabhāga maggaḥ hi idha adhippeto

original: Lokiyabhāvanāya ca kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu vikkhambhitaṃ hoti. Yadipi nappavatteyya,
analyzed: lokiya bhāvanāya ca kāye pahīnam na vedanā ādīsu vikkhambhitam hoti yadi pi

original: paṭipakkhabhāvanāya suppahīnattā tattha sā “abhijjhādomanassassa appavattī”ti na
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhāvanāya su pahīna ttā tattha sā abhijjhā domanassassa appavattī iti na

original: vattabbā, tasmā punapi tappahānaṃ vattabbameva. Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ
analyzed: vattabbā tasmā puna api tad pahānam vattabbam eva ekattha pahīnam sesesu pi pahīnam

analyzed: citta anupassanā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dhammānupassanā
analyzed: dhamma anupassanā

original: Nīvaraṇapabbavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nīvaraṇa pabba vaṇṇanā

analyzed: taṇhā appahīne sati yattha uppajjati pahāne pana sati tattha abhāvo

original: Maggasaccaniddesavaṇṇanā
402. Aññamaggapaṭikkhepanatthanti titthiyehi parikappitassa maggassa dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadābhāvapaṭikkhepanatthaṃ,

original: Mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
10. Pāyāsirājaññasuttavaṇṇanā
406. Bhagavatā evaṃ gahitanāmattāti yojanā. Yasmā rājaputtā loke “kumāro”ti voharīyanti. Ayañca rañño kittimaputto, tasmā āha “rañño…pe… sañjāniṃsū”ti.
analyzed: bhagavatā evam gahita nāma ttā iti yojanā yasmai rāja puttāḥ loke kumāraḥ iti ayam ca rañño kittima putto tasmai āha sañjāniṃsu iti

original: Assāti therassa. Puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca uppajjitvā
analyzed: assa ati therassa puññāni karontaḥ kappa sata sahassam devesu ca iva manussesu ca uppajjitvā

original: visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā. Tatiyadivaseti pabbataṃ āruḷhadivasato tatiye divase.

analyzed: tesam sāvaka bodhiyāḥ niyata tāya puñña sambhārassa ca sa atisaya ttā vinipātam a gantvā ekam buddha antaraṃpe anubhavantānam devatāya ati pubbe saha dhammacāriniyā suddhāvāsa devatāya

original: “Kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno”ti vatvā taṃ evassa uppannabhāvaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya

analyzed: itas citas parivattanam niddhunanam iti āha apara aparam karotha ati indriyāni a paribhinnāni iti

original: adhippāyena “tañcāyatanaṃ na paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: adhippāyena tat ca āyatanam na paṭisaṃvedeti iti vuttam

original: Saṅkhadhamaupamāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṅkha dhama aupamā vaṇṇanā

original: 426. Saṅkhaṃ dhamati, dhamāpetīti vā saṅkhadhamo. Upalāpetvāti uparūpari saddayogavasena sallāpetvā, saddayuttaṃ katvāti attho. Taṃ pana atthato dhamanamevāti āha “dhamitvā”ti.
analyzed: saṅkham dhamati dhamāpeti iti vā saṅkhadhamaḥ upalāpetvā ati upari upari sadda yoga vasena sallāpetvā sadda yuttam katvā iti attho tam pana atthataḥ dhamanam eva ati āha dhamitvā iti

original: Aggikajaṭilaupamāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: aggika jaṭila aupamā vaṇṇanā

original: 428. Āhito aggi etassa atthīti aggiko, svāssa aggikabhāvo yasmā aggihutamālāvedisampādanehi
analyzed: āhitaḥ aggi etassa atthi iti aggikaḥ aggika bhāvaḥ yasmai aggi huta mālā vedi sampādanehi

original: ceva indhanadhūmabarihisasappitelūpaharaṇehi balipupphadhūmagandhādiupahārehi ca
analyzed: indhana dhūma bari hisa sappi telu upaharaṇehi bali puppha dhūma gandha ādi upahārehi ca

original: tassa payirupāsanāya icchito, tasmā vuttaṃ “aggiparicārako”ti. Āyuṃ pāpuṇāpeyyanti
analyzed: tassa icchito tasmā vuttam aggi paricārako ti āyum pāpuṇāpeyyanti

original: yathā cirajīvī hoti, evaṃ āyuṃ pacchimavayaṃ pāpeyyaṃ. Vaḍḍhiṃ gameyyanti sarīrāvayave,
analyzed: yathā cira jīvī hoti evam āyum pacchima vayam pāpeyyam vaḍḍhim gameyyanti sarīra avayave

original: guṇāvayave ca phātiṃ pāpeyyaṃ. Araṇī yugaḷanti uttarāraṇī, adharāraṇīti araṇīdvayaṃ.
analyzed: guṇa avayave ca phātim pāpeyyam araṇī uttarāraṇī adharāraṇī iti araṇī dvayam

original: 429. Evanti “bālo pāyāsirājañño”tiādippakārena. Tayāti theraṃ sandhāya vadati. Vuttayuttakāraṇamakkhalakkhaṇenāti
analyzed: evam ti bālo pāyāsi rājañño ti ādi ppakārena tayā iti theram sandhāya vadati vutta yutta kāraṇa makkha lakkhaṇena ati

original: vuttayuttakāraṇassa makkhanasabhāvena. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇenāti samadhuraggahaṇalakkhaṇena.
analyzed: vutta yutta kāraṇassa makkhana sabhāvena yuga ggāha lakkhaṇena ati sa madhura ggahaṇa lakkhaṇena

original: Palāsenāti palāsetīti palāso, parassa guṇe uttaritare ḍaṃsitvā viya chaḍḍento attano
analyzed: palāsena ati palāseti iti palāso parassa guṇe uttaritare ḍaṃsitvā viya chaḍḍento attano

original: guṇehi same karotīti attho. Samakaraṇaraso hi palāso, tena palāsena.
analyzed: guṇehi same karoti iti attho sama karaṇa rasaḥ hi palāsaḥ tena palāsena

original: Dvesatthavāhaupamāvaṇṇanā
430. Haritakapattanti haritabbapattaṃ, appapattanti attho. Tenāha “antamaso”tiādi.
analyzed: haritaka pattanti haritabba pattam appapattanti attho tena āha antamasā itiādi

original: Sannaddhadhanukalāpanti ettha kalāpanti tūṇīramāha, tañca sannayhato dhanunā vinā
analyzed: sannaddha dhanu kalāpanti ettha kalāpanti tūṇīram āha tat ca dhanunā vinā

original: na sannayhatīti āha “sannaddhadhanukalāpa”nti. Āsittodakāni vaṭumānīti gamanamaggā
analyzed: na sannayhati iti āha sannaddha dhanu kalāpanti āsitta udakāni vaṭumāni iti gamana maggā

original: ceva taṃtaṃudakamaggā ca sammadeva devena phuṭṭhattā tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharitaudaka
analyzed: ca iva taṃ taṃ udaka maggā ca sammat eva devena taham taham paggharita odaka

original: sandamānaudakā. Tenāha “paripuṇṇasalilā maggā ca kandarā cā”ti.
analyzed: sandamāna audakā tena āha paripuṇṇa salilā maggā ca kandarā ca ati

original: Yathābhatenāti sakaṭesu yathāṭhapitena, yathā “amma ito karohī”ti vutte ṭhapesīti attho karaṇakiriyāya kiriyāsāmaññavācībhāvato. Tasmā yathāropitena, yathāgahitenāti attho vutto.
analyzed: yathā ābhatena ati sakaṭesu yathā ṭhapitena yathā amma itas karohi iti vutte ṭhapesi iti attho karaṇa kiriyāya kiriyā sāmañña vācībhāvato tasmā yathā āropitena yathā gahitena ati atthaḥ vutto

original: Akkhadhuttakaupamāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: akkhadhuttaka upamā vaṇṇanā

original: 434. Parājayaguḷanti yena guḷena, yāya salākāya ṭhitāya ca parājayo hoti, taṃ adassanaṃ
analyzed: parājaya guḷanti yena guḷena yāya salākāya ṭhitāya ca parājayaḥ hoti tam a dassanam

original: gamento gilati. Pajjohananti pakārehi juhanakammaṃ. Taṃ pana balidānavasena karīyatīti āha “balikamma”nti.
analyzed: gamentaḥ gilati pajjohananti pakārehi juhana kammam tam pana bali dāna vasena āha bali kamman ti

original: Sāṇabhārikaupamāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sāṇabhārika aupamā vaṇṇanā

original: 436. Gāmapattanti gāmo eva hutvā āpajjitabbaṃ, suññabhāvena anāvasitabbaṃ. Tenāha
analyzed: gāma pattanti gāmaḥ eva hutvā āpajjitabbam suñña bhāvena an āvasitabbam tena āha

original: “vuṭṭhitagāmapadeso”ti. Gāmapadanti yathā purisassa pādanikkhittaṭṭhānaṃ adhigataparicchedaṃ
analyzed: vuṭṭhita gāma padeso ti gāma padam ti yathā purisassa pāda nikkhitta ṭṭhānam adhigata paricchedam

original: “pada”nti vuccati, evaṃ gāmavāsīhi āvasitaṭṭhānaṃ adhigatanivutthāgāraṃ “gāmapada”nti
analyzed: padanti vuccati evam gāma vāsīhi āvasita ṭṭhānam adhigata nivuttha āgāram gāma padanti

original: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “ayamevattho”ti. Susannaddhoti sukhena gahetvā gamanayogyatāvasena
analyzed: vuttam tena āha ayam eva attho ti su sannaddhaḥ iti sukhena gahetvā gamana yogya tā vasena

original: suṭṭhu sajjito. Taṃ pana susajjanaṃ suṭṭhu bandhanavasenevāti āha “subaddho”ti.
analyzed: suṭṭhu sajjito tam pana su sajjanam suṭṭhu bandhana vasena iva ati āha su baddhaḥ iti

original: Ayādīnampi lohabhāve satipi loha-saddo sāsane tambalohe niruḷhoti āha “lohanti tambaloha”nti.
analyzed: aya ādīnam pi loha bhāve sati pi loha saddo sa āsane tamba lohe niruḷhaḥ iti āha lohanti tamba lohanti

original: Saraṇagamanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: saraṇa gamana vaṇṇanā

original: 437. Abhiraddhoti ārādhitacitto, sāsanassa ārādhitacittatā pasīdanavasenāti āha “abhippasanno”ti.
analyzed: abhiraddho ti ārādhita citto sāsanassa ārādhita citta tā pasīdana vasena ati āha abhippasanno ti

original: Pañhupaṭṭhānānīti pañhesu upaṭṭhānāni mayā pucchitatthesu tumhākaṃ vissajjanavasena ñāṇupaṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: pañhupaṭṭhānāni iti pañhesu upaṭṭhānāni mayā pucchita tthesu tumhākam vissajjana vasena ñāṇa upaṭṭhānāni

original: Yaññakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: yañña kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 438. Saṅghātanti saṃ-saddo padavaḍḍhanamattanti āha “ghāta”nti. Vipākaphalenāti sadisaphalena.
analyzed: saṅghātanti āha ghātanti vipāka phalena ati sadisa phalena

original: Mahapphalo na hoti gavādipāṇaghātena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Guṇānisaṃsenāti uddayaphalena.
analyzed: mahapphalaḥ na hoti gavā ādi pāṇaghātena upakkiliṭṭha bhāvataḥ guṇa ānisaṃsena ati uddaya phalena

original: Ānubhāvajutiyāti paṭipakkhavigamanajanitena sabhāvasaṅkhātena tejena. Na mahājutiko
analyzed: ānubhāva jutiyā ti paṭipakkha vigamana janitena sabhāva saṅkhātena tejena na mahā jutikaḥ

original: hoti aparisuddhabhāvato. Vipākavipphāratāyāti vipākaphalassa vipulatāya, pāripūriyāti
analyzed: hoti a parisuddha bhāvataḥ vipāka vipphāra tāya ati vipāka phalassa vipula tāya pāripūriyā ati

original: attho. Duṭṭhukhetteti usabhādidosehi dūsitakhette, taṃ pana vappābhāvato asāraṃ hotīti
analyzed: attho duṭṭhu khetta iti usabha ādi dosehi dūsita khette tam pana vappa abhāvataḥ asāram hoti iti

original: āha “nissārakhette”ti. Dubbhūmeti kucchitabhūmibhāge, svāssa kucchitabhāvo asāratāya
analyzed: āha nissāra khettā iti dubbhūmā iti kucchita bhūmi bhāge kucchita bhāvaḥ asāra tāya

original: vā siyā ninnatādidosavasena vā. Tattha paṭhamo pakkho paṭhamapadena dassitoti itaraṃ
analyzed: vā siyā ninna tā ādi dosa vasena vā tattha paṭhamaḥ pakkho paṭhama padena dassito ti itaram

original: dassento “visamabhūmibhāge”ti āha. Daṇḍābhighātādinā chinnabhinnāni. Pūtīnīti gomayalepadānādisukhena
analyzed: āha daṇḍa abhighāta ādinā chinna bhinnāni pūtīni iti gomaya lepa dāna ādi sukhena

original: asukkhāpitattā pūtibhāvaṃ gatāni. Tāni pana yasmā sāravantāni na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ
analyzed: a sukkhāpita ttā pūti bhāvam gatāni tāni pana yasmā sāravantāni na honti tasmā vuttam

original: “nissārānī”ti. Vātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca vinaṭṭhabījasāmatthiyāni. Tenāha
analyzed: nissārāni iti vāta ātapa hatāni iti vātena ca ātapena ca vinaṭṭha bīja sāmatthiyāni tena āha

original: “pariyādinnatejānī”ti. Yaṃ yathājātavīhiādigatena taṇḍulena aṅkuruppādanayogyabījasāmatthiyaṃ,
analyzed: yam yathā jāta vīhi ādi gatena taṇḍulena aṅkura uppādana yogya bīja sāmatthiyam

original: taṃ taṇḍulasāro, tassa ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tathāuppajjanameva. Etāni pana bījāni na tādisāni
analyzed: tam taṇḍulasāraḥ tassa ādānam gahaṇam tathā uppajjanam eva etāni pana bījāni na tādisāni

original: khaṇḍādidosavantatāya. Dhārāya khette anuppavesanaṃ nāma vassanameva, taṃ paṭikkhepavasena
analyzed: khaṇḍa ādi dosavanta tāya dhārāya khette anuppavesanam nāma vassanam eva tam paṭikkhepa vasena

original: dassento āha “na sammā vasseyyā”ti. Aṅkuramūlapattādīhīti cettha aṅkurakandādīhi
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha na sammā vasseyya ati aṅkura mūla patta ādīhi iti ca ittha aṅkura kanda ādīhi

original: uddhaṃ vuddhiṃ, mūlajaṭādīhi heṭṭhā viruḷhiṃ, pattapupphādīhi samantato ca vepullanti yojanā.
analyzed: uddham vuddhim mūla jaṭā ādīhi heṭṭhā viruḷhim patta puppha ādīhi samantataḥ ca vepullanti yojanā

original: Aparūpaghātenāti paresaṃ vibādhanena. Uppannapaccayatoti nibbattitaghāsacchādanādideyyadhammato.
analyzed: apara upaghātena ati paresam vibādhanena uppanna paccayataḥ ti nibbattita ghāsa chādana ādi deyya dhammato

original: Gavādighātenapi hi tattha paṭiggāhakānaṃ ghāso saṅkīyati. “Aparūpaghātitāyā”ti idaṃ
analyzed: go ādi ghātena api hi tattha paṭiggāhakānam ghāsaḥ saṅkīyati aparūpa ghātitāya ati idam

original: sīlavantatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ. Guṇātirekanti guṇātirittaṃ, sīlādilokuttaraguṇehi visiṭṭhanti
analyzed: kāraṇa vacanam guṇa atirekanti guṇa atirittam sīla ādi lokuttara guṇehi visiṭṭhanti

original: attho. Vipulāti saddhāsampadādivasena uḷārā.
analyzed: atthaḥ vipulā ati saddhā sampad ādi vasena uḷārā

original: Uttaramāṇavavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: uttaramāṇava vatthu vaṇṇanā

original: 439. Atha kho tehi sakuṇḍakehi taṇḍulehi siddhaṃbhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hotīti āha
analyzed: atha kho tehi sa kuṇḍakehi taṇḍulehi siddhaṃbhattam uttaṇḍulam eva hoti iti āha

original: “uttaṇḍulabhatta”nti. Bilaṅgaṃ vuccati āranālaṃ bilaṅgato nibbattanato, tadeva kañjiyato
analyzed: uttaṇḍulabhattanti bilaṅgam vuccati āranālam bilaṅgataḥ nibbattanataḥ tat eva kañjiyataḥ

original: jātanti kañjiyaṃ, taṃ dutiyaṃ etassāti bilaṅgadutiyaṃ, taṃ “kañjikadutiya”nti ca
analyzed: kañjiyam tam dutiyam etassa ati bilaṅga dutiyam tam kañjika dutiyanti ca

original: vuttaṃ. Dhorakānīti dhoviyāni. Yasmā thūlatarānipi “thūlānī”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
analyzed: vuttam dhorakāni iti dhoviyāni yasmā thūlatarāni pi thūlāni iti vattabbatam arahanti

original: tasmā “thūlāni cā”ti vuttaṃ. Guḷadasānīti suttānaṃ thūlatāya, kañjikassa bahalatāya
analyzed: tasmā thūlāni ca ati vuttam guḷa dasāni iti suttānam thūla tāya kañjikassa bahala tāya

original: ca piṇḍitadasāni. Tenāha “puñjapuñja…pe… dasānī”ti. Anuddisatīti anu anu katheti.
analyzed: ca piṇḍita dasāni tena āha puñja puñjape dasāni iti anuddisati iti anu anu kathā iti

original: 440. Asakkaccanti na sakkaccaṃ anādarakāraṃ, taṃ pana kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvena
analyzed: a sakkaccanti na sakkaccam an ādara kāram tam pana kamma phala saddhāya abhāvena

original: hotīti āha “saddhāvirahita”nti. Acittīkatanti cittīkārapaccupaṭṭhāpanavasena na cittīkataṃ.
analyzed: hoti iti āha saddhā virahitam ti acittīkatam ti cittīkāra paccupaṭṭhāpana vasena na cittīkatam

original: Tenāha “cittīkāravirahita”ntiādi. Cittīkārarahitaṃ vā acittīkataṃ, yathā kataṃ paresaṃ
analyzed: tena āha cittīkāra virahita ntiādi cittīkāra rahitam vā acittīkatam yathā katam paresam

original: vimhayāvahaṃ hoti, tathā akataṃ. Cittassa uḷārapaṇītabhāvo pana asakkaccadāneneva
analyzed: vimhaya āvaham hoti tathā a katam cittassa uḷāra paṇīta bhāvo pana a sakkacca dānena iva

original: bādhito. Apaviddhanti chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ viya apaviddhaṃ katvā, etena tasmiṃ dāne
analyzed: bādhitaḥ chaḍḍanīya dhammam viya apaviddham katvā etena tasmim dāne

original: gāravākaraṇaṃ vadati. Serīsakaṃ nāmāti “serīsaka”nti evaṃ nāmakaṃ. Tucchanti parijanaparicchedavirahato rittaṃ.
analyzed: gāravākaraṇam vadati serīsakam nāma ati evam nāmakam parijana pariccheda virahataḥ rittam

original: Pāyāsidevaputtavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pāyāsideva putta vaṇṇanā

original: 441. Tassānubhāvenāti tassa dānassa ānubhāvena. Sirīsarukkhoti pabhassarakhandhaviṭapasākhāpalāsasampanno
analyzed: tassa anubhāvena ati tassa dānassa ānubhāvena sirīsa rukkhaḥ ti pabhassara khandha viṭapa sākhā palāsa sampannaḥ

original: manuññadassano dibbo sirīsarukkho. Aṭṭhāsīti phalassa kammasarikkhataṃ dassento vimānadvāre
analyzed: manuññadassanaḥ dibbaḥ sirīsa rukkho aṭṭhāsi iti phalassa kamma sarikkha tam dassento vimāna dvāre

original: nibbattitvā aṭṭhāsi. Pubbāciṇṇavasenāti purimajātiyaṃ tattha nivāsaparicayanavasena.
analyzed: nibbattitvā aṭṭhāsi pubba āciṇṇa vasena ati purima jātiyam tattha nivāsa paricayana vasena

original: Na kevalaṃ pubbāciṇṇavaseneva, atha kho utusukhumavasena pīti dassento “tattha kirassa
analyzed: na kevalam pubba āciṇṇa vasena iva atha kho utu sukhuma vasena pi iti dassento tattha kirassa

original: utusukhaṃ hotī”ti āha.
analyzed: utu sukham hoti iti āha

original: Soti uttaro māṇavo. Yadi asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā pāyāsi tattha nibbatto, pāyāsissa
analyzed: saḥ ti uttaraḥ māṇavaḥ yadi asakkaccam dānam da tvā pāyāsi tattha nibbattaḥ pāyāsissa

original: paricārikā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā kathaṃ tattha nibbattāti āha “pāyāsissa panā”ti.
analyzed: paricārikā sakkaccam dānam da tvā katham tattha nibbattā iti āha pāyāsissa pana iti

original: Nikantivasenāti pāyāsimhi sāpekkhāvasena, pubbepi vā tattha nivutthapubbatāya. Disācārikavimānanti
analyzed: nikanti vasena āti pāyāsimhi sa apekkhā vasena pubbe pi vā tattha nivuttha pubba tāya disācārika vimānan ti

original: ākāsaṭṭhaṃ hutvā disāsu vicaraṇakavimānaṃ, na rukkhapabbatasikharādisambandhaṃ. Vaṭṭaniaṭaviyanti vimānavīthiyanti.
analyzed: ākāsaṭṭham hutvā disāsu vicaraṇaka vimānam na rukkha pabbata sikhara ādi sambandham vaṭṭa niaṭaviyanti vimāna vīthiyanti

original: Pāyāsirājaññasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
Niṭṭhitā ca mahāvaggaṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca mahā vagga ṭṭhakathāya līna attha ppakāsanā

original: Mahāvaggaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: mahā vagga ṭīkā niṭṭhitā
